GV01rv_hn01u:1: RV_1,001.01a agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3: RV_1,001.02a agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta |
GV01rv_hn01u:5: RV_1,001.03a agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn01u:7: RV_1,001.04a agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
GV01rv_hn01u:9: RV_1,001.05a agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:11: RV_1,001.06a yad aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:13: RV_1,001.07a upa tvāgne dive-dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam |
GV01rv_hn01u:15: RV_1,001.08a rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim |
GV01rv_hn01u:17: RV_1,001.09a sa naḥ piteva sūnave 'gne sūpāyano bhava |
GV01rv_hn01u:19: RV_1,002.01a vāyav ā yāhi darśateme somā araṅkṛtāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:21: RV_1,002.02a vāya ukthebhir jarante tvām acchā jaritāraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:23: RV_1,002.03a vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:25: RV_1,002.04a indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhir ā gatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:27: RV_1,002.05a vāyav indraś ca cetathaḥ sutānāṃ vājinīvasū |
GV01rv_hn01u:28: RV_1,002.05c tāv ā yātam upa dravat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:29: RV_1,002.06a vāyav indraś ca sunvata ā yātam upa niṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn01u:31: RV_1,002.07a mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam |
GV01rv_hn01u:35: RV_1,002.09a kavī no mitrāvaruṇā tuvijātā urukṣayā |
GV01rv_hn01u:37: RV_1,003.01a aśvinā yajvarīr iṣo dravatpāṇī śubhas patī |
GV01rv_hn01u:39: RV_1,003.02a aśvinā purudaṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:41: RV_1,003.03a dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:43: RV_1,003.04a indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:45: RV_1,003.05a indrā yāhi dhiyeṣito viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:47: RV_1,003.06a indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:49: RV_1,003.07a omāsaś carṣaṇīdhṛto viśve devāsa ā gata |
GV01rv_hn01u:51: RV_1,003.08a viśve devāso apturaḥ sutam ā ganta tūrṇayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:53: RV_1,003.09a viśve devāso asridha ehimāyāso adruhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:55: RV_1,003.10a pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:59: RV_1,003.12a maho arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā |
GV01rv_hn01u:61: RV_1,004.01a surūpakṛtnum ūtaye sudughām iva goduhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:63: RV_1,004.02a upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba |
GV01rv_hn01u:65: RV_1,004.03a athā te antamānāṃ vidyāma sumatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:66: RV_1,004.03c mā no ati khya ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:67: RV_1,004.04a parehi vigram astṛtam indram pṛcchā vipaścitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:68: RV_1,004.04c yas te sakhibhya ā varam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:69: RV_1,004.05a uta bruvantu no nido nir anyataś cid ārata |
GV01rv_hn01u:71: RV_1,004.06a uta naḥ subhagāṃ arir voceyur dasma kṛṣṭayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:73: RV_1,004.07a em āśum āśave bhara yajñaśriyaṃ nṛmādanam |
GV01rv_hn01u:75: RV_1,004.08a asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:77: RV_1,004.09a taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn01u:79: RV_1,004.10a yo rāyo 'vanir mahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā |
GV01rv_hn01u:81: RV_1,005.01a ā tv etā ni ṣīdatendram abhi pra gāyata |
GV01rv_hn01u:85: RV_1,005.03a sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām |
GV01rv_hn01u:86: RV_1,005.03c gamad vājebhir ā sa naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:87: RV_1,005.04a yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:89: RV_1,005.05a sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:91: RV_1,005.06a tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:93: RV_1,005.07a ā tvā viśantv āśavaḥ somāsa indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:95: RV_1,005.08a tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvām ukthā śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn01u:97: RV_1,005.09a akṣitotiḥ saned imaṃ vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam |
GV01rv_hn01u:99: RV_1,005.10a mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:101: RV_1,006.01a yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantam pari tasthuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:103: RV_1,006.02a yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe |
GV01rv_hn01u:105: RV_1,006.03a ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase |
GV01rv_hn01u:107: RV_1,006.04a ād aha svadhām anu punar garbhatvam erire |
GV01rv_hn01u:109: RV_1,006.05a vīḷu cid ārujatnubhir guhā cid indra vahnibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:111: RV_1,006.06a devayanto yathā matim acchā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:113: RV_1,006.07a indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā |
GV01rv_hn01u:115: RV_1,006.08a anavadyair abhidyubhir makhaḥ sahasvad arcati |
GV01rv_hn01u:117: RV_1,006.09a ataḥ parijmann ā gahi divo vā rocanād adhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:119: RV_1,006.10a ito vā sātim īmahe divo vā pārthivād adhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:121: RV_1,007.01a indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:123: RV_1,007.02a indra id dharyoḥ sacā sammiśla ā vacoyujā |
GV01rv_hn01u:125: RV_1,007.03a indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi |
GV01rv_hn01u:127: RV_1,007.04a indra vājeṣu no 'va sahasrapradhaneṣu ca |
GV01rv_hn01u:129: RV_1,007.05a indraṃ vayam mahādhana indram arbhe havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:131: RV_1,007.06a sa no vṛṣann amuṃ caruṃ satrādāvann apā vṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:133: RV_1,007.07a tuñje-tuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:135: RV_1,007.08a vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭīr iyarty ojasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:137: RV_1,007.09a ya ekaś carṣaṇīnāṃ vasūnām irajyati |
GV01rv_hn01u:139: RV_1,007.10a indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:141: RV_1,008.01a endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham |
GV01rv_hn01u:143: RV_1,008.02a ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai |
GV01rv_hn01u:145: RV_1,008.03a indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi |
GV01rv_hn01u:147: RV_1,008.04a vayaṃ śūrebhir astṛbhir indra tvayā yujā vayam |
GV01rv_hn01u:149: RV_1,008.05a mahāṃ indraḥ paraś ca nu mahitvam astu vajriṇe |
GV01rv_hn01u:151: RV_1,008.06a samohe vā ya āśata naras tokasya sanitau |
GV01rv_hn01u:153: RV_1,008.07a yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:155: RV_1,008.08a evā hy asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī |
GV01rv_hn01u:157: RV_1,008.09a evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:159: RV_1,008.10a evā hy asya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:161: RV_1,009.01a indrehi matsy andhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:163: RV_1,009.02a em enaṃ sṛjatā sute mandim indrāya mandine |
GV01rv_hn01u:165: RV_1,009.03a matsvā suśipra mandibhi stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn01u:167: RV_1,009.04a asṛgram indra te giraḥ prati tvām ud ahāsata |
GV01rv_hn01u:169: RV_1,009.05a saṃ codaya citram arvāg rādha indra vareṇyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:170: RV_1,009.05c asad it te vibhu prabhu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:171: RV_1,009.06a asmān su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:173: RV_1,009.07a saṃ gomad indra vājavad asme pṛthu śravo bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn01u:175: RV_1,009.08a asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam |
GV01rv_hn01u:177: RV_1,009.09a vasor indraṃ vasupatiṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanta ṛgmiyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:179: RV_1,009.10a sute-sute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata ed ariḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:181: RV_1,010.01a gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇo 'rcanty arkam arkiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:182: RV_1,010.01c brahmāṇas tvā śatakrata ud vaṃśam iva yemire ||
GV01rv_hn01u:183: RV_1,010.02a yat sānoḥ sānum āruhad bhūry aspaṣṭa kartvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:184: RV_1,010.02c tad indro arthaṃ cetati yūthena vṛṣṇir ejati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:185: RV_1,010.03a yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā |
GV01rv_hn01u:186: RV_1,010.03c athā na indra somapā girām upaśrutiṃ cara ||
GV01rv_hn01u:187: RV_1,010.04a ehi stomāṃ abhi svarābhi gṛṇīhy ā ruva |
GV01rv_hn01u:188: RV_1,010.04c brahma ca no vaso sacendra yajñaṃ ca vardhaya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:189: RV_1,010.05a uktham indrāya śaṃsyaṃ vardhanam puruniṣṣidhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:190: RV_1,010.05c śakro yathā suteṣu ṇo rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:191: RV_1,010.06a tam it sakhitva īmahe taṃ rāye taṃ suvīrye |
GV01rv_hn01u:192: RV_1,010.06c sa śakra uta naḥ śakad indro vasu dayamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:193: RV_1,010.07a suvivṛtaṃ sunirajam indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:194: RV_1,010.07c gavām apa vrajaṃ vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:195: RV_1,010.08a nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇam invataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:196: RV_1,010.08c jeṣaḥ svarvatīr apaḥ saṃ gā asmabhyaṃ dhūnuhi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:197: RV_1,010.09a āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havaṃ nū cid dadhiṣva me giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:198: RV_1,010.09c indra stomam imam mama kṛṣvā yujaś cid antaram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:199: RV_1,010.10a vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamaṃ vājeṣu havanaśrutam |
GV01rv_hn01u:201: RV_1,010.11a ā tū na indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutam piba |
GV01rv_hn01u:202: RV_1,010.11c navyam āyuḥ pra sū tira kṛdhī sahasrasām ṛṣim ||
GV01rv_hn01u:203: RV_1,010.12a pari tvā girvaṇo gira imā bhavantu viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:204: RV_1,010.12c vṛddhāyum anu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:205: RV_1,011.01a indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:206: RV_1,011.01c rathītamaṃ rathīnāṃ vājānāṃ satpatim patim ||
GV01rv_hn01u:207: RV_1,011.02a sakhye ta indra vājino mā bhema śavasas pate |
GV01rv_hn01u:208: RV_1,011.02c tvām abhi pra ṇonumo jetāram aparājitam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:209: RV_1,011.03a pūrvīr indrasya rātayo na vi dasyanty ūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:210: RV_1,011.03c yadī vājasya gomata stotṛbhyo maṃhate magham ||
GV01rv_hn01u:211: RV_1,011.04a purām bhindur yuvā kavir amitaujā ajāyata |
GV01rv_hn01u:212: RV_1,011.04c indro viśvasya karmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:213: RV_1,011.05a tvaṃ valasya gomato 'pāvar adrivo bilam |
GV01rv_hn01u:214: RV_1,011.05c tvāṃ devā abibhyuṣas tujyamānāsa āviṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:215: RV_1,011.06a tavāhaṃ śūra rātibhiḥ praty āyaṃ sindhum āvadan |
GV01rv_hn01u:216: RV_1,011.06c upātiṣṭhanta girvaṇo viduṣ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:217: RV_1,011.07a māyābhir indra māyinaṃ tvaṃ śuṣṇam avātiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:218: RV_1,011.07c viduṣ ṭe tasya medhirās teṣāṃ śravāṃsy ut tira ||
GV01rv_hn01u:219: RV_1,011.08a indram īśānam ojasābhi stomā anūṣata |
GV01rv_hn01u:220: RV_1,011.08c sahasraṃ yasya rātaya uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:221: RV_1,012.01a agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam |
GV01rv_hn01u:223: RV_1,012.02a agnim-agniṃ havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim |
GV01rv_hn01u:225: RV_1,012.03a agne devāṃ ihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:227: RV_1,012.04a tāṃ uśato vi bodhaya yad agne yāsi dūtyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:229: RV_1,012.05a ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ prati ṣma riṣato daha |
GV01rv_hn01u:231: RV_1,012.06a agnināgniḥ sam idhyate kavir gṛhapatir yuvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:233: RV_1,012.07a kavim agnim upa stuhi satyadharmāṇam adhvare |
GV01rv_hn01u:235: RV_1,012.08a yas tvām agne haviṣpatir dūtaṃ deva saparyati |
GV01rv_hn01u:237: RV_1,012.09a yo agniṃ devavītaye haviṣmāṃ āvivāsati |
GV01rv_hn01u:239: RV_1,012.10a sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devāṃ ihā vaha |
GV01rv_hn01u:240: RV_1,012.10c upa yajñaṃ haviś ca naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:241: RV_1,012.11a sa na stavāna ā bhara gāyatreṇa navīyasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:243: RV_1,012.12a agne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhir devahūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:245: RV_1,013.01a susamiddho na ā vaha devāṃ agne haviṣmate |
GV01rv_hn01u:247: RV_1,013.02a madhumantaṃ tanūnapād yajñaṃ deveṣu naḥ kave |
GV01rv_hn01u:249: RV_1,013.03a narāśaṃsam iha priyam asmin yajña upa hvaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:251: RV_1,013.04a agne sukhatame rathe devāṃ īḷita ā vaha |
GV01rv_hn01u:253: RV_1,013.05a stṛṇīta barhir ānuṣag ghṛtapṛṣṭham manīṣiṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:255: RV_1,013.06a vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:257: RV_1,013.07a naktoṣāsā supeśasāsmin yajña upa hvaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:259: RV_1,013.08a tā sujihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī |
GV01rv_hn01u:261: RV_1,013.09a iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:263: RV_1,013.10a iha tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ viśvarūpam upa hvaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:265: RV_1,013.11a ava sṛjā vanaspate deva devebhyo haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:267: RV_1,013.12a svāhā yajñaṃ kṛṇotanendrāya yajvano gṛhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:269: RV_1,014.01a aibhir agne duvo giro viśvebhiḥ somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:271: RV_1,014.02a ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:273: RV_1,014.03a indravāyū bṛhaspatim mitrāgnim pūṣaṇam bhagam |
GV01rv_hn01u:275: RV_1,014.04a pra vo bhriyanta indavo matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:277: RV_1,014.05a īḷate tvām avasyavaḥ kaṇvāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:279: RV_1,014.06a ghṛtapṛṣṭhā manoyujo ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:281: RV_1,014.07a tān yajatrāṃ ṛtāvṛdho 'gne patnīvatas kṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:283: RV_1,014.08a ye yajatrā ya īḍyās te te pibantu jihvayā |
GV01rv_hn01u:285: RV_1,014.09a ākīṃ sūryasya rocanād viśvān devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:287: RV_1,014.10a viśvebhiḥ somyam madhv agna indreṇa vāyunā |
GV01rv_hn01u:289: RV_1,014.11a tvaṃ hotā manurhito 'gne yajñeṣu sīdasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:291: RV_1,014.12a yukṣvā hy aruṣī rathe harito deva rohitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:293: RV_1,015.01a indra somam piba ṛtunā tvā viśantv indavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:295: RV_1,015.02a marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrād yajñam punītana |
GV01rv_hn01u:297: RV_1,015.03a abhi yajñaṃ gṛṇīhi no gnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā |
GV01rv_hn01u:299: RV_1,015.04a agne devāṃ ihā vaha sādayā yoniṣu triṣu |
GV01rv_hn01u:301: RV_1,015.05a brāhmaṇād indra rādhasaḥ pibā somam ṛtūṃr anu |
GV01rv_hn01u:303: RV_1,015.06a yuvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhṛtavrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḷabham |
GV01rv_hn01u:307: RV_1,015.08a draviṇodā dadātu no vasūni yāni śṛṇvire |
GV01rv_hn01u:309: RV_1,015.09a draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata |
GV01rv_hn01u:311: RV_1,015.10a yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhir draviṇodo yajāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:312: RV_1,015.10c adha smā no dadir bhava ||
GV01rv_hn01u:313: RV_1,015.11a aśvinā pibatam madhu dīdyagnī śucivratā |
GV01rv_hn01u:315: RV_1,015.12a gārhapatyena santya ṛtunā yajñanīr asi |
GV01rv_hn01u:317: RV_1,016.01a ā tvā vahantu harayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:319: RV_1,016.02a imā dhānā ghṛtasnuvo harī ihopa vakṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:321: RV_1,016.03a indram prātar havāmaha indram prayaty adhvare |
GV01rv_hn01u:323: RV_1,016.04a upa naḥ sutam ā gahi haribhir indra keśibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:325: RV_1,016.05a semaṃ na stomam ā gahy upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam |
GV01rv_hn01u:327: RV_1,016.06a ime somāsa indavaḥ sutāso adhi barhiṣi |
GV01rv_hn01u:329: RV_1,016.07a ayaṃ te stomo agriyo hṛdispṛg astu śantamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:331: RV_1,016.08a viśvam it savanaṃ sutam indro madāya gacchati |
GV01rv_hn01u:333: RV_1,016.09a semaṃ naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa gobhir aśvaiḥ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn01u:335: RV_1,017.01a indrāvaruṇayor ahaṃ samrājor ava ā vṛṇe |
GV01rv_hn01u:337: RV_1,017.02a gantārā hi stho 'vase havaṃ viprasya māvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:339: RV_1,017.03a anukāmaṃ tarpayethām indrāvaruṇa rāya ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:341: RV_1,017.04a yuvāku hi śacīnāṃ yuvāku sumatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:345: RV_1,017.06a tayor id avasā vayaṃ sanema ni ca dhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn01u:347: RV_1,017.07a indrāvaruṇa vām ahaṃ huve citrāya rādhase |
GV01rv_hn01u:349: RV_1,017.08a indrāvaruṇa nū nu vāṃ siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:351: RV_1,017.09a pra vām aśnotu suṣṭutir indrāvaruṇa yāṃ huve |
GV01rv_hn01u:353: RV_1,018.01a somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate |
GV01rv_hn01u:355: RV_1,018.02a yo revān yo amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:356: RV_1,018.02c sa naḥ siṣaktu yas turaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:357: RV_1,018.03a mā naḥ śaṃso araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:359: RV_1,018.04a sa ghā vīro na riṣyati yam indro brahmaṇas patiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:361: RV_1,018.05a tvaṃ tam brahmaṇas pate soma indraś ca martyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:363: RV_1,018.06a sadasas patim adbhutam priyam indrasya kāmyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:365: RV_1,018.07a yasmād ṛte na sidhyati yajño vipaścitaś cana |
GV01rv_hn01u:367: RV_1,018.08a ād ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtim prāñcaṃ kṛṇoty adhvaram |
GV01rv_hn01u:371: RV_1,019.01a prati tyaṃ cārum adhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:373: RV_1,019.02a nahi devo na martyo mahas tava kratum paraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:375: RV_1,019.03a ye maho rajaso vidur viśve devāso adruhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:377: RV_1,019.04a ya ugrā arkam ānṛcur anādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:379: RV_1,019.05a ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:381: RV_1,019.06a ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate |
GV01rv_hn01u:383: RV_1,019.07a ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudram arṇavam |
GV01rv_hn01u:385: RV_1,019.08a ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram ojasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:387: RV_1,019.09a abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyam madhu |
GV01rv_hn01u:389: RV_1,020.01a ayaṃ devāya janmane stomo viprebhir āsayā |
GV01rv_hn01u:391: RV_1,020.02a ya indrāya vacoyujā tatakṣur manasā harī |
GV01rv_hn01u:393: RV_1,020.03a takṣan nāsatyābhyām parijmānaṃ sukhaṃ ratham |
GV01rv_hn01u:395: RV_1,020.04a yuvānā pitarā punaḥ satyamantrā ṛjūyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:397: RV_1,020.05a saṃ vo madāso agmatendreṇa ca marutvatā |
GV01rv_hn01u:399: RV_1,020.06a uta tyaṃ camasaṃ navaṃ tvaṣṭur devasya niṣkṛtam |
GV01rv_hn01u:401: RV_1,020.07a te no ratnāni dhattana trir ā sāptāni sunvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:405: RV_1,021.01a ihendrāgnī upa hvaye tayor it stomam uśmasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:407: RV_1,021.02a tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsatendrāgnī śumbhatā naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:409: RV_1,021.03a tā mitrasya praśastaya indrāgnī tā havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:411: RV_1,021.04a ugrā santā havāmaha upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam |
GV01rv_hn01u:413: RV_1,021.05a tā mahāntā sadaspatī indrāgnī rakṣa ubjatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:415: RV_1,021.06a tena satyena jāgṛtam adhi pracetune pade |
GV01rv_hn01u:417: RV_1,022.01a prātaryujā vi bodhayāśvināv eha gacchatām |
GV01rv_hn01u:419: RV_1,022.02a yā surathā rathītamobhā devā divispṛśā |
GV01rv_hn01u:421: RV_1,022.03a yā vāṃ kaśā madhumaty aśvinā sūnṛtāvatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:423: RV_1,022.04a nahi vām asti dūrake yatrā rathena gacchathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:425: RV_1,022.05a hiraṇyapāṇim ūtaye savitāram upa hvaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:427: RV_1,022.06a apāṃ napātam avase savitāram upa stuhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:429: RV_1,022.07a vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasoś citrasya rādhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:431: RV_1,022.08a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata savitā stomyo nu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:433: RV_1,022.09a agne patnīr ihā vaha devānām uśatīr upa |
GV01rv_hn01u:435: RV_1,022.10a ā gnā agna ihāvase hotrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratīm |
GV01rv_hn01u:437: RV_1,022.11a abhi no devīr avasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:439: RV_1,022.12a ihendrāṇīm upa hvaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:441: RV_1,022.13a mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñam mimikṣatām |
GV01rv_hn01u:443: RV_1,022.14a tayor id ghṛtavat payo viprā rihanti dhītibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:447: RV_1,022.16a ato devā avantu no yato viṣṇur vicakrame |
GV01rv_hn01u:449: RV_1,022.17a idaṃ viṣṇur vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam |
GV01rv_hn01u:451: RV_1,022.18a trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:453: RV_1,022.19a viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe |
GV01rv_hn01u:455: RV_1,022.20a tad viṣṇoḥ paramam padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:457: RV_1,022.21a tad viprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate |
GV01rv_hn01u:459: RV_1,023.01a tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahy āśīrvantaḥ sutā ime |
GV01rv_hn01u:463: RV_1,023.03a indravāyū manojuvā viprā havanta ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:465: RV_1,023.04a mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe varuṇaṃ somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:467: RV_1,023.05a ṛtena yāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtasya jyotiṣas patī |
GV01rv_hn01u:469: RV_1,023.06a varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvan mitro viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:471: RV_1,023.07a marutvantaṃ havāmaha indram ā somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:475: RV_1,023.09a hata vṛtraṃ sudānava indreṇa sahasā yujā |
GV01rv_hn01u:477: RV_1,023.10a viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:479: RV_1,023.11a jayatām iva tanyatur marutām eti dhṛṣṇuyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:481: RV_1,023.12a haskārād vidyutas pary ato jātā avantu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:483: RV_1,023.13a ā pūṣañ citrabarhiṣam āghṛṇe dharuṇaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:485: RV_1,023.14a pūṣā rājānam āghṛṇir apagūḷhaṃ guhā hitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:487: RV_1,023.15a uto sa mahyam indubhiḥ ṣaḍ yuktāṃ anuseṣidhat |
GV01rv_hn01u:489: RV_1,023.16a ambayo yanty adhvabhir jāmayo adhvarīyatām |
GV01rv_hn01u:491: RV_1,023.17a amūr yā upa sūrye yābhir vā sūryaḥ saha |
GV01rv_hn01u:493: RV_1,023.18a apo devīr upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:495: RV_1,023.19a apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:497: RV_1,023.20a apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā |
GV01rv_hn01u:498: RV_1,023.20c agniṃ ca viśvaśambhuvam āpaś ca viśvabheṣajīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:499: RV_1,023.21a āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama |
GV01rv_hn01u:501: RV_1,023.22a idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi |
GV01rv_hn01u:502: RV_1,023.22c yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:503: RV_1,023.23a āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi |
GV01rv_hn01u:504: RV_1,023.23c payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:505: RV_1,023.24a sam māgne varcasā sṛja sam prajayā sam āyuṣā |
GV01rv_hn01u:506: RV_1,023.24c vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:507: RV_1,024.01a kasya nūnaṃ katamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma |
GV01rv_hn01u:508: RV_1,024.01c ko no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:509: RV_1,024.02a agner vayam prathamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma |
GV01rv_hn01u:510: RV_1,024.02c sa no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:511: RV_1,024.03a abhi tvā deva savitar īśānaṃ vāryāṇām |
GV01rv_hn01u:513: RV_1,024.04a yaś cid dhi ta itthā bhagaḥ śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:515: RV_1,024.05a bhagabhaktasya te vayam ud aśema tavāvasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:517: RV_1,024.06a nahi te kṣatraṃ na saho na manyuṃ vayaś canāmī patayanta āpuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:518: RV_1,024.06c nemā āpo animiṣaṃ carantīr na ye vātasya praminanty abhvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:519: RV_1,024.07a abudhne rājā varuṇo vanasyordhvaṃ stūpaṃ dadate pūtadakṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:520: RV_1,024.07c nīcīnā sthur upari budhna eṣām asme antar nihitāḥ ketavaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:522: RV_1,024.08a uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaś cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavā u |
GV01rv_hn01u:523: RV_1,024.08c apade pādā pratidhātave 'kar utāpavaktā hṛdayāvidhaś cit ||
GV01rv_hn01u:524: RV_1,024.09a śataṃ te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram urvī gabhīrā sumatiṣ ṭe astu
GV01rv_hn01u:525: RV_1,024.09c bādhasva dūre nirṛtim parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumugdhy
GV01rv_hn01u:527: RV_1,024.10a amī ya ṛkṣā nihitāsa uccā naktaṃ dadṛśre kuha cid diveyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:528: RV_1,024.10c adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni vicākaśac candramā naktam eti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:529: RV_1,024.11a tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad ā śāste yajamāno
GV01rv_hn01u:531: RV_1,024.11c aheḷamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:532: RV_1,024.12a tad in naktaṃ tad divā mahyam āhus tad ayaṃ keto hṛda ā vi caṣṭe |
GV01rv_hn01u:533: RV_1,024.12c śunaḥśepo yam ahvad gṛbhītaḥ so asmān rājā varuṇo mumoktu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:534: RV_1,024.13a śunaḥśepo hy ahvad gṛbhītas triṣv ādityaṃ drupadeṣu baddhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:535: RV_1,024.13c avainaṃ rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyād vidvāṃ adabdho vi mumoktu pāśān
GV01rv_hn01u:536: RV_1,024.14a ava te heḷo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:537: RV_1,024.14c kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni ||
GV01rv_hn01u:538: RV_1,024.15a ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya
GV01rv_hn01u:539: RV_1,024.15c athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:540: RV_1,025.01a yac cid dhi te viśo yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam |
GV01rv_hn01u:542: RV_1,025.02a mā no vadhāya hatnave jihīḷānasya rīradhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:544: RV_1,025.03a vi mṛḷīkāya te mano rathīr aśvaṃ na saṃditam |
GV01rv_hn01u:546: RV_1,025.04a parā hi me vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaiṣṭaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:548: RV_1,025.05a kadā kṣatraśriyaṃ naram ā varuṇaṃ karāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:550: RV_1,025.06a tad it samānam āśāte venantā na pra yucchataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:552: RV_1,025.07a vedā yo vīnām padam antarikṣeṇa patatām |
GV01rv_hn01u:554: RV_1,025.08a veda māso dhṛtavrato dvādaśa prajāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:556: RV_1,025.09a veda vātasya vartanim uror ṛṣvasya bṛhataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:558: RV_1,025.10a ni ṣasāda dhṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:560: RV_1,025.11a ato viśvāny adbhutā cikitvāṃ abhi paśyati |
GV01rv_hn01u:562: RV_1,025.12a sa no viśvāhā sukratur ādityaḥ supathā karat |
GV01rv_hn01u:564: RV_1,025.13a bibhrad drāpiṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇo vasta nirṇijam |
GV01rv_hn01u:566: RV_1,025.14a na yaṃ dipsanti dipsavo na druhvāṇo janānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:568: RV_1,025.15a uta yo mānuṣeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:570: RV_1,025.16a parā me yanti dhītayo gāvo na gavyūtīr anu |
GV01rv_hn01u:572: RV_1,025.17a saṃ nu vocāvahai punar yato me madhv ābhṛtam |
GV01rv_hn01u:574: RV_1,025.18a darśaṃ nu viśvadarśataṃ darśaṃ ratham adhi kṣami |
GV01rv_hn01u:576: RV_1,025.19a imam me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḷaya |
GV01rv_hn01u:578: RV_1,025.20a tvaṃ viśvasya medhira divaś ca gmaś ca rājasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:580: RV_1,025.21a ud uttamam mumugdhi no vi pāśam madhyamaṃ cṛta |
GV01rv_hn01u:582: RV_1,026.01a vasiṣvā hi miyedhya vastrāṇy ūrjām pate |
GV01rv_hn01u:584: RV_1,026.02a ni no hotā vareṇyaḥ sadā yaviṣṭha manmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:586: RV_1,026.03a ā hi ṣmā sūnave pitāpir yajaty āpaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:588: RV_1,026.04a ā no barhī riśādaso varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn01u:590: RV_1,026.05a pūrvya hotar asya no mandasva sakhyasya ca |
GV01rv_hn01u:591: RV_1,026.05c imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:592: RV_1,026.06a yac cid dhi śaśvatā tanā devaṃ-devaṃ yajāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:594: RV_1,026.07a priyo no astu viśpatir hotā mandro vareṇyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:596: RV_1,026.08a svagnayo hi vāryaṃ devāso dadhire ca naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:598: RV_1,026.09a athā na ubhayeṣām amṛta martyānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:600: RV_1,026.10a viśvebhir agne agnibhir imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:602: RV_1,027.01a aśvaṃ na tvā vāravantaṃ vandadhyā agniṃ namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:604: RV_1,027.02a sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā pṛthupragāmā suśevaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:606: RV_1,027.03a sa no dūrāc cāsāc ca ni martyād aghāyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:608: RV_1,027.04a imam ū ṣu tvam asmākaṃ saniṃ gāyatraṃ navyāṃsam |
GV01rv_hn01u:610: RV_1,027.05a ā no bhaja parameṣv ā vājeṣu madhyameṣu |
GV01rv_hn01u:612: RV_1,027.06a vibhaktāsi citrabhāno sindhor ūrmā upāka ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:614: RV_1,027.07a yam agne pṛtsu martyam avā vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:616: RV_1,027.08a nakir asya sahantya paryetā kayasya cit |
GV01rv_hn01u:618: RV_1,027.09a sa vājaṃ viśvacarṣaṇir arvadbhir astu tarutā |
GV01rv_hn01u:620: RV_1,027.10a jarābodha tad viviḍḍhi viśe-viśe yajñiyāya |
GV01rv_hn01u:622: RV_1,027.11a sa no mahāṃ animāno dhūmaketuḥ puruścandraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:624: RV_1,027.12a sa revāṃ iva viśpatir daivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:626: RV_1,027.13a namo mahadbhyo namo arbhakebhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āśinebhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:627: RV_1,027.13c yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsam ā vṛkṣi devāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:628: RV_1,028.01a yatra grāvā pṛthubudhna ūrdhvo bhavati sotave |
GV01rv_hn01u:629: RV_1,028.01c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:630: RV_1,028.02a yatra dvāv iva jaghanādhiṣavaṇyā kṛtā |
GV01rv_hn01u:631: RV_1,028.02c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:632: RV_1,028.03a yatra nāry apacyavam upacyavaṃ ca śikṣate |
GV01rv_hn01u:633: RV_1,028.03c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:634: RV_1,028.04a yatra manthāṃ vibadhnate raśmīn yamitavā iva |
GV01rv_hn01u:635: RV_1,028.04c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:636: RV_1,028.05a yac cid dhi tvaṃ gṛhe-gṛha ulūkhalaka yujyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:637: RV_1,028.05c iha dyumattamaṃ vada jayatām iva dundubhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:638: RV_1,028.06a uta sma te vanaspate vāto vi vāty agram it |
GV01rv_hn01u:639: RV_1,028.06c atho indrāya pātave sunu somam ulūkhala ||
GV01rv_hn01u:640: RV_1,028.07a āyajī vājasātamā tā hy uccā vijarbhṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:642: RV_1,028.08a tā no adya vanaspatī ṛṣvāv ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:644: RV_1,028.09a uc chiṣṭaṃ camvor bhara somam pavitra ā sṛja |
GV01rv_hn01u:645: RV_1,028.09c ni dhehi gor adhi tvaci ||
GV01rv_hn01u:646: RV_1,029.01a yac cid dhi satya somapā anāśastā iva smasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:647: RV_1,029.01c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:649: RV_1,029.02a śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:650: RV_1,029.02c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:652: RV_1,029.03a ni ṣvāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām abudhyamāne |
GV01rv_hn01u:653: RV_1,029.03c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:655: RV_1,029.04a sasantu tyā arātayo bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:656: RV_1,029.04c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:658: RV_1,029.05a sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam pāpayāmuyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:659: RV_1,029.05c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:661: RV_1,029.06a patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūraṃ vāto vanād adhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:662: RV_1,029.06c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:664: RV_1,029.07a sarvam parikrośaṃ jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:665: RV_1,029.07c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:667: RV_1,030.01a ā va indraṃ kriviṃ yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum |
GV01rv_hn01u:669: RV_1,030.02a śataṃ vā yaḥ śucīnāṃ sahasraṃ vā samāśirām |
GV01rv_hn01u:670: RV_1,030.02c ed u nimnaṃ na rīyate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:671: RV_1,030.03a saṃ yan madāya śuṣmiṇa enā hy asyodare |
GV01rv_hn01u:673: RV_1,030.04a ayam u te sam atasi kapota iva garbhadhim |
GV01rv_hn01u:674: RV_1,030.04c vacas tac cin na ohase ||
GV01rv_hn01u:675: RV_1,030.05a stotraṃ rādhānām pate girvāho vīra yasya te |
GV01rv_hn01u:677: RV_1,030.06a ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā na ūtaye 'smin vāje śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn01u:681: RV_1,030.08a ā ghā gamad yadi śravat sahasriṇībhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:683: RV_1,030.09a anu pratnasyaukaso huve tuvipratiṃ naram |
GV01rv_hn01u:684: RV_1,030.09c yaṃ te pūrvam pitā huve ||
GV01rv_hn01u:685: RV_1,030.10a taṃ tvā vayaṃ viśvavārā śāsmahe puruhūta |
GV01rv_hn01u:689: RV_1,030.12a tathā tad astu somapāḥ sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu |
GV01rv_hn01u:691: RV_1,030.13a revatīr naḥ sadhamāda indre santu tuvivājāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:693: RV_1,030.14a ā gha tvāvān tmanāpta stotṛbhyo dhṛṣṇav iyānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:695: RV_1,030.15a ā yad duvaḥ śatakratav ā kāmaṃ jaritṝṇām |
GV01rv_hn01u:697: RV_1,030.16a śaśvad indraḥ popruthadbhir jigāya nānadadbhiḥ śāśvasadbhir
GV01rv_hn01u:699: RV_1,030.16c sa no hiraṇyarathaṃ daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa no
GV01rv_hn01u:703: RV_1,030.18a samānayojano hi vāṃ ratho dasrāv amartyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:705: RV_1,030.19a ny aghnyasya mūrdhani cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:707: RV_1,030.20a kas ta uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje marto amartye |
GV01rv_hn01u:709: RV_1,030.21a vayaṃ hi te amanmahy āntād ā parākāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:711: RV_1,030.22a tvaṃ tyebhir ā gahi vājebhir duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:713: RV_1,031.01a tvam agne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣir devo devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:715: RV_1,031.01c tava vrate kavayo vidmanāpaso 'jāyanta maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:716: RV_1,031.02a tvam agne prathamo aṅgirastamaḥ kavir devānām pari bhūṣasi vratam |
GV01rv_hn01u:717: RV_1,031.02c vibhur viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiro dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cid āyave ||
GV01rv_hn01u:718: RV_1,031.03a tvam agne prathamo mātariśvana āvir bhava sukratūyā vivasvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:719: RV_1,031.03c arejetāṃ rodasī hotṛvūrye 'saghnor bhāram ayajo maho vaso ||
GV01rv_hn01u:720: RV_1,031.04a tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:721: RV_1,031.04c śvātreṇa yat pitror mucyase pary ā tvā pūrvam anayann āparam punaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:722: RV_1,031.05a tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭivardhana udyatasruce bhavasi
GV01rv_hn01u:724: RV_1,031.05c ya āhutim pari vedā vaṣaṭkṛtim ekāyur agre viśa āvivāsasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:725: RV_1,031.06a tvam agne vṛjinavartaniṃ naraṃ sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe |
GV01rv_hn01u:726: RV_1,031.06c yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane dabhrebhiś cit samṛtā haṃsi bhūyasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:727: RV_1,031.07a tvaṃ tam agne amṛtatva uttame martaṃ dadhāsi śravase dive-dive |
GV01rv_hn01u:728: RV_1,031.07c yas tātṛṣāṇa ubhayāya janmane mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi praya ā ca sūraye
GV01rv_hn01u:729: RV_1,031.08a tvaṃ no agne sanaye dhanānāṃ yaśasaṃ kāruṃ kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:730: RV_1,031.08c ṛdhyāma karmāpasā navena devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:731: RV_1,031.09a tvaṃ no agne pitror upastha ā devo deveṣv anavadya jāgṛviḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:732: RV_1,031.09c tanūkṛd bodhi pramatiś ca kārave tvaṃ kalyāṇa vasu viśvam
GV01rv_hn01u:734: RV_1,031.10a tvam agne pramatis tvam pitāsi nas tvaṃ vayaskṛt tava jāmayo vayam |
GV01rv_hn01u:735: RV_1,031.10c saṃ tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ saṃ sahasriṇaḥ suvīraṃ yanti vratapām
GV01rv_hn01u:737: RV_1,031.11a tvām agne prathamam āyum āyave devā akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim |
GV01rv_hn01u:738: RV_1,031.11c iḷām akṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīm pitur yat putro mamakasya jāyate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:739: RV_1,031.12a tvaṃ no agne tava deva pāyubhir maghono rakṣa tanvaś ca vandya |
GV01rv_hn01u:740: RV_1,031.12c trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asy animeṣaṃ rakṣamāṇas tava vrate
GV01rv_hn01u:741: RV_1,031.13a tvam agne yajyave pāyur antaro 'niṣaṅgāya caturakṣa idhyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:742: RV_1,031.13c yo rātahavyo 'vṛkāya dhāyase kīreś cin mantram manasā vanoṣi
GV01rv_hn01u:744: RV_1,031.14a tvam agna uruśaṃsāya vāghate spārhaṃ yad rekṇaḥ paramaṃ vanoṣi tat |
GV01rv_hn01u:745: RV_1,031.14c ādhrasya cit pramatir ucyase pitā pra pākaṃ śāssi pra diśo viduṣṭaraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:746: RV_1,031.15a tvam agne prayatadakṣiṇaṃ naraṃ varmeva syūtam pari pāsi viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:747: RV_1,031.15c svādukṣadmā yo vasatau syonakṛj jīvayājaṃ yajate sopamā divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:748: RV_1,031.16a imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣo na imam adhvānaṃ yam agāma dūrāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:749: RV_1,031.16c āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānām bhṛmir asy ṛṣikṛn martyānām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:750: RV_1,031.17a manuṣvad agne aṅgirasvad aṅgiro yayātivat sadane pūrvavac chuce |
GV01rv_hn01u:751: RV_1,031.17c accha yāhy ā vahā daivyaṃ janam ā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:752: RV_1,031.18a etenāgne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā |
GV01rv_hn01u:753: RV_1,031.18c uta pra ṇeṣy abhi vasyo asmān saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:754: RV_1,032.01a indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī |
GV01rv_hn01u:755: RV_1,032.01c ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:756: RV_1,032.02a ahann ahim parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa |
GV01rv_hn01u:757: RV_1,032.02c vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:758: RV_1,032.03a vṛṣāyamāṇo 'vṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:759: RV_1,032.03c ā sāyakam maghavādatta vajram ahann enam prathamajām ahīnām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:760: RV_1,032.04a yad indrāhan prathamajām ahīnām ān māyinām amināḥ prota māyāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:761: RV_1,032.04c āt sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsaṃ tādītnā śatruṃ na kilā vivitse
GV01rv_hn01u:762: RV_1,032.05a ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsam indro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena |
GV01rv_hn01u:763: RV_1,032.05c skandhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇāhiḥ śayata upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:764: RV_1,032.06a ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tuvibādham ṛjīṣam |
GV01rv_hn01u:765: RV_1,032.06c nātārīd asya samṛtiṃ vadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:766: RV_1,032.07a apād ahasto apṛtanyad indram āsya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna |
GV01rv_hn01u:767: RV_1,032.07c vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:768: RV_1,032.08a nadaṃ na bhinnam amuyā śayānam mano ruhāṇā ati yanty āpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:769: RV_1,032.08c yāś cid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīr babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn01u:770: RV_1,032.09a nīcāvayā abhavad vṛtraputrendro asyā ava vadhar jabhāra |
GV01rv_hn01u:771: RV_1,032.09c uttarā sūr adharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:772: RV_1,032.10a atiṣṭhantīnām aniveśanānāṃ kāṣṭhānām madhye nihitaṃ śarīram |
GV01rv_hn01u:773: RV_1,032.10c vṛtrasya niṇyaṃ vi caranty āpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayad indraśatruḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:774: RV_1,032.11a dāsapatnīr ahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:775: RV_1,032.11c apām bilam apihitaṃ yad āsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ apa tad vavāra
GV01rv_hn01u:776: RV_1,032.12a aśvyo vāro abhavas tad indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan deva ekaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:777: RV_1,032.12c ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn ||
GV01rv_hn01u:778: RV_1,032.13a nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirad
GV01rv_hn01u:780: RV_1,032.13c indraś ca yad yuyudhāte ahiś cotāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:781: RV_1,032.14a aher yātāraṃ kam apaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīr agacchat |
GV01rv_hn01u:782: RV_1,032.14c nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhīto ataro rajāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:783: RV_1,032.15a indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:784: RV_1,032.15c sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn01u:785: RV_1,033.01a etāyāmopa gavyanta indram asmākaṃ su pramatiṃ vāvṛdhāti |
GV01rv_hn01u:786: RV_1,033.01c anāmṛṇaḥ kuvid ād asya rāyo gavāṃ ketam param āvarjate naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:787: RV_1,033.02a uped ahaṃ dhanadām apratītaṃ juṣṭāṃ na śyeno vasatim patāmi |
GV01rv_hn01u:788: RV_1,033.02c indraṃ namasyann upamebhir arkair ya stotṛbhyo havyo asti yāman ||
GV01rv_hn01u:789: RV_1,033.03a ni sarvasena iṣudhīṃr asakta sam aryo gā ajati yasya vaṣṭi |
GV01rv_hn01u:790: RV_1,033.03c coṣkūyamāṇa indra bhūri vāmam mā paṇir bhūr asmad adhi
GV01rv_hn01u:792: RV_1,033.04a vadhīr hi dasyuṃ dhaninaṃ ghanenaṃ ekaś carann upaśākebhir indra |
GV01rv_hn01u:793: RV_1,033.04c dhanor adhi viṣuṇak te vy āyann ayajvānaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:794: RV_1,033.05a parā cic chīrṣā vavṛjus ta indrāyajvāno yajvabhi spardhamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:795: RV_1,033.05c pra yad divo hariva sthātar ugra nir avratāṃ adhamo rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:796: RV_1,033.06a ayuyutsann anavadyasya senām ayātayanta kṣitayo navagvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:797: RV_1,033.06c vṛṣāyudho na vadhrayo niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhir indrāc citayanta āyan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:798: RV_1,033.07a tvam etān rudato jakṣataś cāyodhayo rajasa indra pāre |
GV01rv_hn01u:799: RV_1,033.07c avādaho diva ā dasyum uccā pra sunvata stuvataḥ śaṃsam āvaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:800: RV_1,033.08a cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyā hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:801: RV_1,033.08c na hinvānāsas titirus ta indram pari spaśo adadhāt sūryeṇa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:802: RV_1,033.09a pari yad indra rodasī ubhe abubhojīr mahinā viśvataḥ sīm |
GV01rv_hn01u:803: RV_1,033.09c amanyamānāṃ abhi manyamānair nir brahmabhir adhamo dasyum indra ||
GV01rv_hn01u:804: RV_1,033.10a na ye divaḥ pṛthivyā antam āpur na māyābhir dhanadām
GV01rv_hn01u:806: RV_1,033.10c yujaṃ vajraṃ vṛṣabhaś cakra indro nir jyotiṣā tamaso gā
GV01rv_hn01u:808: RV_1,033.11a anu svadhām akṣarann āpo asyāvardhata madhya ā nāvyānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:809: RV_1,033.11c sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indra ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhann abhi dyūn ||
GV01rv_hn01u:810: RV_1,033.12a ny āvidhyad ilībiśasya dṛḷhā vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinac chuṣṇam indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:811: RV_1,033.12c yāvat taro maghavan yāvad ojo vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum
GV01rv_hn01u:812: RV_1,033.13a abhi sidhmo ajigād asya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇā puro
GV01rv_hn01u:814: RV_1,033.13c saṃ vajreṇāsṛjad vṛtram indraḥ pra svām matim atirac chāśadānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:815: RV_1,033.14a āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan prāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum |
GV01rv_hn01u:816: RV_1,033.14c śaphacyuto reṇur nakṣata dyām uc chvaitreyo nṛṣāhyāya tasthau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:817: RV_1,033.15a āvaḥ śamaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tugryāsu kṣetrajeṣe maghavañ chvitryaṃ gām |
GV01rv_hn01u:818: RV_1,033.15c jyok cid atra tasthivāṃso akrañ chatrūyatām adharā vedanākaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:819: RV_1,034.01a triś cin no adyā bhavataṃ navedasā vibhur vāṃ yāma uta rātir aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:820: RV_1,034.01c yuvor hi yantraṃ himyeva vāsaso 'bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:821: RV_1,034.02a trayaḥ pavayo madhuvāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśva id
GV01rv_hn01u:823: RV_1,034.02c traya skambhāsa skabhitāsa ārabhe trir naktaṃ yāthas trir v
GV01rv_hn01u:825: RV_1,034.03a samāne ahan trir avadyagohanā trir adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:826: RV_1,034.03c trir vājavatīr iṣo aśvinā yuvaṃ doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaś ca
GV01rv_hn01u:828: RV_1,034.04a trir vartir yātaṃ trir anuvrate jane triḥ suprāvye tredheva
GV01rv_hn01u:830: RV_1,034.04c trir nāndyaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ triḥ pṛkṣo asme akṣareva
GV01rv_hn01u:832: RV_1,034.05a trir no rayiṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ trir devatātā trir
GV01rv_hn01u:834: RV_1,034.05c triḥ saubhagatvaṃ trir uta śravāṃsi nas triṣṭhaṃ vāṃ sūre
GV01rv_hn01u:836: RV_1,034.06a trir no aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā triḥ pārthivāni trir u dattam adbhyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:837: RV_1,034.06c omānaṃ śaṃyor mamakāya sūnave tridhātu śarma vahataṃ śubhas patī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:838: RV_1,034.07a trir no aśvinā yajatā dive-dive pari tridhātu pṛthivīm
GV01rv_hn01u:840: RV_1,034.07c tisro nāsatyā rathyā parāvata ātmeva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:841: RV_1,034.08a trir aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhis traya āhāvās tredhā haviṣ kṛtam |
GV01rv_hn01u:842: RV_1,034.08c tisraḥ pṛthivīr upari pravā divo nākaṃ rakṣethe dyubhir aktubhir hitam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:843: RV_1,034.09a kva trī cakrā trivṛto rathasya kva trayo vandhuro ye sanīḷāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:844: RV_1,034.09c kadā yogo vājino rāsabhasya yena yajñaṃ nāsatyopayāthaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:845: RV_1,034.10a ā nāsatyā gacchataṃ hūyate havir madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:846: RV_1,034.10c yuvor hi pūrvaṃ savitoṣaso ratham ṛtāya citraṃ ghṛtavantam iṣyati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:847: RV_1,034.11a ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātam madhupeyam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:848: RV_1,034.11c prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:849: RV_1,034.12a ā no aśvinā trivṛtā rathenārvāñcaṃ rayiṃ vahataṃ suvīram |
GV01rv_hn01u:850: RV_1,034.12c śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:851: RV_1,035.01a hvayāmy agnim prathamaṃ svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvase
GV01rv_hn01u:852: RV_1,035.01c hvayāmi rātrīṃ jagato niveśanīṃ hvayāmi devaṃ savitāram ūtaye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:853: RV_1,035.02a ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtam martyaṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn01u:854: RV_1,035.02c hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:855: RV_1,035.03a yāti devaḥ pravatā yāty udvatā yāti śubhrābhyāṃ yajato haribhyām |
GV01rv_hn01u:856: RV_1,035.03c ā devo yāti savitā parāvato 'pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:857: RV_1,035.04a abhīvṛtaṃ kṛśanair viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyaśamyaṃ yajato bṛhantam |
GV01rv_hn01u:858: RV_1,035.04c āsthād rathaṃ savitā citrabhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīṃ dadhānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:859: RV_1,035.05a vi janāñ chyāvāḥ śitipādo akhyan rathaṃ hiraṇyapraugaṃ vahantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:860: RV_1,035.05c śaśvad viśaḥ savitur daivyasyopasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:861: RV_1,035.06a tisro dyāvaḥ savitur dvā upasthāṃ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ
GV01rv_hn01u:862: RV_1,035.06c āṇiṃ na rathyam amṛtādhi tasthur iha bravītu ya u tac ciketat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:863: RV_1,035.07a vi suparṇo antarikṣāṇy akhyad gabhīravepā asuraḥ sunīthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:864: RV_1,035.07c kvedānīṃ sūryaḥ kaś ciketa katamāṃ dyāṃ raśmir asyā tatāna ||
GV01rv_hn01u:865: RV_1,035.08a aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta
GV01rv_hn01u:867: RV_1,035.08c hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:868: RV_1,035.09a hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate
GV01rv_hn01u:869: RV_1,035.09c apāmīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti
GV01rv_hn01u:870: RV_1,035.10a hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ |
GV01rv_hn01u:871: RV_1,035.10c apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānān asthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:872: RV_1,035.11a ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:873: RV_1,035.11c tebhir no adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva ||
GV01rv_hn01u:874: RV_1,036.01a pra vo yahvam purūṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:875: RV_1,036.01c agniṃ sūktebhir vacobhir īmahe yaṃ sīm id anya īḷate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:876: RV_1,036.02a janāso agniṃ dadhire sahovṛdhaṃ haviṣmanto vidhema te |
GV01rv_hn01u:877: RV_1,036.02c sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā ihāvitā bhavā vājeṣu santya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:878: RV_1,036.03a pra tvā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam |
GV01rv_hn01u:879: RV_1,036.03c mahas te sato vi caranty arcayo divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:880: RV_1,036.04a devāsas tvā varuṇo mitro aryamā saṃ dūtam pratnam indhate |
GV01rv_hn01u:881: RV_1,036.04c viśvaṃ so agne jayati tvayā dhanaṃ yas te dadāśa martyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:882: RV_1,036.05a mandro hotā gṛhapatir agne dūto viśām asi |
GV01rv_hn01u:883: RV_1,036.05c tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devā akṛṇvata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:884: RV_1,036.06a tve id agne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvam ā hūyate haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:885: RV_1,036.06c sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā utāparaṃ yakṣi devān suvīryā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:886: RV_1,036.07a taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate |
GV01rv_hn01u:887: RV_1,036.07c hotrābhir agnim manuṣaḥ sam indhate titirvāṃso ati sridhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:888: RV_1,036.08a ghnanto vṛtram ataran rodasī apa uru kṣayāya cakrire |
GV01rv_hn01u:889: RV_1,036.08c bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumny āhutaḥ krandad aśvo gaviṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:890: RV_1,036.09a saṃ sīdasva mahāṃ asi śocasva devavītamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:891: RV_1,036.09c vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:892: RV_1,036.10a yaṃ tvā devāso manave dadhur iha yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana |
GV01rv_hn01u:893: RV_1,036.10c yaṃ kaṇvo medhyātithir dhanaspṛtaṃ yaṃ vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:894: RV_1,036.11a yam agnim medhyātithiḥ kaṇva īdha ṛtād adhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:895: RV_1,036.11c tasya preṣo dīdiyus tam imā ṛcas tam agniṃ vardhayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:896: RV_1,036.12a rāyas pūrdhi svadhāvo 'sti hi te 'gne deveṣv āpyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:897: RV_1,036.12c tvaṃ vājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa no mṛḷa mahāṃ asi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:898: RV_1,036.13a ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā |
GV01rv_hn01u:899: RV_1,036.13c ūrdhvo vājasya sanitā yad añjibhir vāghadbhir vihvayāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:900: RV_1,036.14a ūrdhvo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso ni ketunā viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha |
GV01rv_hn01u:901: RV_1,036.14c kṛdhī na ūrdhvāñ carathāya jīvase vidā deveṣu no duvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:902: RV_1,036.15a pāhi no agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrter arāvṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:903: RV_1,036.15c pāhi rīṣata uta vā jighāṃsato bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:904: RV_1,036.16a ghaneva viṣvag vi jahy arāvṇas tapurjambha yo asmadhruk |
GV01rv_hn01u:905: RV_1,036.16c yo martyaḥ śiśīte aty aktubhir mā naḥ sa ripur īśata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:906: RV_1,036.17a agnir vavne suvīryam agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam |
GV01rv_hn01u:907: RV_1,036.17c agniḥ prāvan mitrota medhyātithim agniḥ sātā upastutam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:908: RV_1,036.18a agninā turvaśaṃ yadum parāvata ugrādevaṃ havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:909: RV_1,036.18c agnir nayan navavāstvam bṛhadrathaṃ turvītiṃ dasyave sahaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:910: RV_1,036.19a ni tvām agne manur dadhe jyotir janāya śaśvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:911: RV_1,036.19c dīdetha kaṇva ṛtajāta ukṣito yaṃ namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:912: RV_1,036.20a tveṣāso agner amavanto arcayo bhīmāso na pratītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:913: RV_1,036.20c rakṣasvinaḥ sadam id yātumāvato viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:914: RV_1,037.01a krīḷaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutam anarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham |
GV01rv_hn01u:916: RV_1,037.02a ye pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sākaṃ vāśībhir añjibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:918: RV_1,037.03a iheva śṛṇva eṣāṃ kaśā hasteṣu yad vadān |
GV01rv_hn01u:920: RV_1,037.04a pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe |
GV01rv_hn01u:922: RV_1,037.05a pra śaṃsā goṣv aghnyaṃ krīḷaṃ yac chardho mārutam |
GV01rv_hn01u:924: RV_1,037.06a ko vo varṣiṣṭha ā naro divaś ca gmaś ca dhūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:925: RV_1,037.06c yat sīm antaṃ na dhūnutha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:926: RV_1,037.07a ni vo yāmāya mānuṣo dadhra ugrāya manyave |
GV01rv_hn01u:928: RV_1,037.08a yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvāṃ iva viśpatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:930: RV_1,037.09a sthiraṃ hi jānam eṣāṃ vayo mātur niretave |
GV01rv_hn01u:931: RV_1,037.09c yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:932: RV_1,037.10a ud u tye sūnavo giraḥ kāṣṭhā ajmeṣv atnata |
GV01rv_hn01u:934: RV_1,037.11a tyaṃ cid ghā dīrgham pṛthum miho napātam amṛdhram |
GV01rv_hn01u:936: RV_1,037.12a maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janāṃ acucyavītana |
GV01rv_hn01u:938: RV_1,037.13a yad dha yānti marutaḥ saṃ ha bruvate 'dhvann ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:940: RV_1,037.14a pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vo duvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:942: RV_1,037.15a asti hi ṣmā madāya vaḥ smasi ṣmā vayam eṣām |
GV01rv_hn01u:944: RV_1,038.01a kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyaḥ pitā putraṃ na hastayoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:946: RV_1,038.02a kva nūnaṃ kad vo arthaṃ gantā divo na pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:947: RV_1,038.02c kva vo gāvo na raṇyanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:948: RV_1,038.03a kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā |
GV01rv_hn01u:950: RV_1,038.04a yad yūyam pṛśnimātaro martāsaḥ syātana |
GV01rv_hn01u:952: RV_1,038.05a mā vo mṛgo na yavase jaritā bhūd ajoṣyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:954: RV_1,038.06a mo ṣu ṇaḥ parā-parā nirṛtir durhaṇā vadhīt |
GV01rv_hn01u:956: RV_1,038.07a satyaṃ tveṣā amavanto dhanvañ cid ā rudriyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:958: RV_1,038.08a vāśreva vidyun mimāti vatsaṃ na mātā siṣakti |
GV01rv_hn01u:960: RV_1,038.09a divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyenodavāhena |
GV01rv_hn01u:962: RV_1,038.10a adha svanān marutāṃ viśvam ā sadma pārthivam |
GV01rv_hn01u:964: RV_1,038.11a maruto vīḷupāṇibhiś citrā rodhasvatīr anu |
GV01rv_hn01u:966: RV_1,038.12a sthirā vaḥ santu nemayo rathā aśvāsa eṣām |
GV01rv_hn01u:968: RV_1,038.13a acchā vadā tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim |
GV01rv_hn01u:970: RV_1,038.14a mimīhi ślokam āsye parjanya iva tatanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:972: RV_1,038.15a vandasva mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam |
GV01rv_hn01u:974: RV_1,039.01a pra yad itthā parāvataḥ śocir na mānam asyatha |
GV01rv_hn01u:975: RV_1,039.01c kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kaṃ yātha kaṃ ha dhūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:976: RV_1,039.02a sthirā vaḥ santv āyudhā parāṇude vīḷū uta pratiṣkabhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:977: RV_1,039.02c yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:978: RV_1,039.03a parā ha yat sthiraṃ hatha naro vartayathā guru |
GV01rv_hn01u:979: RV_1,039.03c vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyā vy āśāḥ parvatānām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:980: RV_1,039.04a nahi vaḥ śatrur vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyāṃ riśādasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:981: RV_1,039.04c yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāso nū cid ādhṛṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:982: RV_1,039.05a pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn |
GV01rv_hn01u:983: RV_1,039.05c pro ārata maruto durmadā iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:984: RV_1,039.06a upo ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:985: RV_1,039.06c ā vo yāmāya pṛthivī cid aśrod abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:986: RV_1,039.07a ā vo makṣū tanāya kaṃ rudrā avo vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:987: RV_1,039.07c gantā nūnaṃ no 'vasā yathā puretthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:988: RV_1,039.08a yuṣmeṣito maruto martyeṣita ā yo no abhva īṣate |
GV01rv_hn01u:989: RV_1,039.08c vi taṃ yuyota śavasā vy ojasā vi yuṣmākābhir ūtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:990: RV_1,039.09a asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvaṃ dada pracetasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:991: RV_1,039.09c asāmibhir maruta ā na ūtibhir gantā vṛṣṭiṃ na vidyutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:992: RV_1,039.10a asāmy ojo bibhṛthā sudānavo 'sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:993: RV_1,039.10c ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyava iṣuṃ na sṛjata dviṣam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:994: RV_1,040.01a ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devayantas tvemahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:995: RV_1,040.01c upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūr bhavā sacā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:996: RV_1,040.02a tvām id dhi sahasas putra martya upabrūte dhane hite |
GV01rv_hn01u:997: RV_1,040.02c suvīryam maruta ā svaśvyaṃ dadhīta yo va ācake ||
GV01rv_hn01u:998: RV_1,040.03a praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devy etu sūnṛtā |
GV01rv_hn01u:999: RV_1,040.03c acchā vīraṃ naryam paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1000: RV_1,040.04a yo vāghate dadāti sūnaraṃ vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1001: RV_1,040.04c tasmā iḷāṃ suvīrām ā yajāmahe supratūrtim anehasam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1002: RV_1,040.05a pra nūnam brahmaṇas patir mantraṃ vadaty ukthyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1003: RV_1,040.05c yasminn indro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okāṃsi cakrire ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1004: RV_1,040.06a tam id vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvam mantraṃ devā anehasam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1005: RV_1,040.06c imāṃ ca vācam pratiharyathā naro viśved vāmā vo aśnavat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1006: RV_1,040.07a ko devayantam aśnavaj janaṃ ko vṛktabarhiṣam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1007: RV_1,040.07c pra-pra dāśvān pastyābhir asthitāntarvāvat kṣayaṃ dadhe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1008: RV_1,040.08a upa kṣatram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhir bhaye cit sukṣitiṃ dadhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1009: RV_1,040.08c nāsya vartā na tarutā mahādhane nārbhe asti vajriṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1010: RV_1,041.01a yaṃ rakṣanti pracetaso varuṇo mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1011: RV_1,041.01c nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1012: RV_1,041.02a yam bāhuteva piprati pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1014: RV_1,041.03a vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puro ghnanti rājāna eṣām |
GV01rv_hn01u:1016: RV_1,041.04a sugaḥ panthā anṛkṣara ādityāsa ṛtaṃ yate |
GV01rv_hn01u:1018: RV_1,041.05a yaṃ yajñaṃ nayathā nara ādityā ṛjunā pathā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1019: RV_1,041.05c pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1020: RV_1,041.06a sa ratnam martyo vasu viśvaṃ tokam uta tmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1022: RV_1,041.07a kathā rādhāma sakhāya stomam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1024: RV_1,041.08a mā vo ghnantam mā śapantam prati voce devayantam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1025: RV_1,041.08c sumnair id va ā vivāse ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1026: RV_1,041.09a caturaś cid dadamānād bibhīyād ā nidhātoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1028: RV_1,042.01a sam pūṣann adhvanas tira vy aṃho vimuco napāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:1029: RV_1,042.01c sakṣvā deva pra ṇas puraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1030: RV_1,042.02a yo naḥ pūṣann agho vṛko duḥśeva ādideśati |
GV01rv_hn01u:1031: RV_1,042.02c apa sma tam patho jahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1032: RV_1,042.03a apa tyam paripanthinam muṣīvāṇaṃ huraścitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1034: RV_1,042.04a tvaṃ tasya dvayāvino 'ghaśaṃsasya kasya cit |
GV01rv_hn01u:1036: RV_1,042.05a ā tat te dasra mantumaḥ pūṣann avo vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1040: RV_1,042.07a ati naḥ saścato naya sugā naḥ supathā kṛṇu |
GV01rv_hn01u:1042: RV_1,042.08a abhi sūyavasaṃ naya na navajvāro adhvane |
GV01rv_hn01u:1044: RV_1,042.09a śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṃsi ca śiśīhi prāsy udaram |
GV01rv_hn01u:1046: RV_1,042.10a na pūṣaṇam methāmasi sūktair abhi gṛṇīmasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1048: RV_1,043.01a kad rudrāya pracetase mīḷhuṣṭamāya tavyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:1050: RV_1,043.02a yathā no aditiḥ karat paśve nṛbhyo yathā gave |
GV01rv_hn01u:1052: RV_1,043.03a yathā no mitro varuṇo yathā rudraś ciketati |
GV01rv_hn01u:1056: RV_1,043.05a yaḥ śukra iva sūryo hiraṇyam iva rocate |
GV01rv_hn01u:1058: RV_1,043.06a śaṃ naḥ karaty arvate sugam meṣāya meṣye |
GV01rv_hn01u:1060: RV_1,043.07a asme soma śriyam adhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām |
GV01rv_hn01u:1062: RV_1,043.08a mā naḥ somaparibādho mārātayo juhuranta |
GV01rv_hn01u:1063: RV_1,043.08c ā na indo vāje bhaja ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1064: RV_1,043.09a yās te prajā amṛtasya parasmin dhāmann ṛtasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:1065: RV_1,043.09c mūrdhā nābhā soma vena ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1066: RV_1,044.01a agne vivasvad uṣasaś citraṃ rādho amartya |
GV01rv_hn01u:1067: RV_1,044.01c ā dāśuṣe jātavedo vahā tvam adyā devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1068: RV_1,044.02a juṣṭo hi dūto asi havyavāhano 'gne rathīr adhvarāṇām |
GV01rv_hn01u:1069: RV_1,044.02c sajūr aśvibhyām uṣasā suvīryam asme dhehi śravo bṛhat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1070: RV_1,044.03a adyā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe vasum agnim purupriyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1071: RV_1,044.03c dhūmaketum bhāṛjīkaṃ vyuṣṭiṣu yajñānām adhvaraśriyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1072: RV_1,044.04a śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭham atithiṃ svāhutaṃ juṣṭaṃ janāya dāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1073: RV_1,044.04c devāṃ acchā yātave jātavedasam agnim īḷe vyuṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1074: RV_1,044.05a staviṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ viśvasyāmṛta bhojana |
GV01rv_hn01u:1075: RV_1,044.05c agne trātāram amṛtam miyedhya yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1076: RV_1,044.06a suśaṃso bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣṭhya madhujihvaḥ svāhutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1077: RV_1,044.06c praskaṇvasya pratirann āyur jīvase namasyā daivyaṃ janam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1078: RV_1,044.07a hotāraṃ viśvavedasaṃ saṃ hi tvā viśa indhate |
GV01rv_hn01u:1079: RV_1,044.07c sa ā vaha puruhūta pracetaso 'gne devāṃ iha dravat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1080: RV_1,044.08a savitāram uṣasam aśvinā bhagam agniṃ vyuṣṭiṣu kṣapaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1081: RV_1,044.08c kaṇvāsas tvā sutasomāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ svadhvara ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1082: RV_1,044.09a patir hy adhvarāṇām agne dūto viśām asi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1083: RV_1,044.09c uṣarbudha ā vaha somapītaye devāṃ adya svardṛśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1084: RV_1,044.10a agne pūrvā anūṣaso vibhāvaso dīdetha viśvadarśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1085: RV_1,044.10c asi grāmeṣv avitā purohito 'si yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1086: RV_1,044.11a ni tvā yajñasya sādhanam agne hotāram ṛtvijam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1087: RV_1,044.11c manuṣvad deva dhīmahi pracetasaṃ jīraṃ dūtam amartyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1088: RV_1,044.12a yad devānām mitramahaḥ purohito 'ntaro yāsi dūtyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1089: RV_1,044.12c sindhor iva prasvanitāsa ūrmayo 'gner bhrājante arcayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1090: RV_1,044.13a śrudhi śrutkarṇa vahnibhir devair agne sayāvabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1091: RV_1,044.13c ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitro aryamā prātaryāvāṇo adhvaram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1092: RV_1,044.14a śṛṇvantu stomam marutaḥ sudānavo 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1093: RV_1,044.14c pibatu somaṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrato 'śvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1094: RV_1,045.01a tvam agne vasūṃr iha rudrāṃ ādityāṃ uta |
GV01rv_hn01u:1095: RV_1,045.01c yajā svadhvaraṃ janam manujātaṃ ghṛtapruṣam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1096: RV_1,045.02a śruṣṭīvāno hi dāśuṣe devā agne vicetasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1097: RV_1,045.02c tān rohidaśva girvaṇas trayastriṃśatam ā vaha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1099: RV_1,045.03c aṅgirasvan mahivrata praskaṇvasya śrudhī havam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1101: RV_1,045.04c rājantam adhvarāṇām agniṃ śukreṇa śociṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1102: RV_1,045.05a ghṛtāhavana santyemā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1103: RV_1,045.05c yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavo havante 'vase tvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1104: RV_1,045.06a tvāṃ citraśravastama havante vikṣu jantavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1106: RV_1,045.07a ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijaṃ dadhire vasuvittamam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1107: RV_1,045.07c śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ viprā agne diviṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1108: RV_1,045.08a ā tvā viprā acucyavuḥ sutasomā abhi prayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1109: RV_1,045.08c bṛhad bhā bibhrato havir agne martāya dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1111: RV_1,045.09c ihādya daivyaṃ janam barhir ā sādayā vaso ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1112: RV_1,045.10a arvāñcaṃ daivyaṃ janam agne yakṣva sahūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1113: RV_1,045.10c ayaṃ somaḥ sudānavas tam pāta tiroahnyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1114: RV_1,046.01a eṣo uṣā apūrvyā vy ucchati priyā divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1116: RV_1,046.02a yā dasrā sindhumātarā manotarā rayīṇām |
GV01rv_hn01u:1118: RV_1,046.03a vacyante vāṃ kakuhāso jūrṇāyām adhi viṣṭapi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1119: RV_1,046.03c yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1120: RV_1,046.04a haviṣā jāro apām piparti papurir narā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1122: RV_1,046.05a ādāro vām matīnāṃ nāsatyā matavacasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1124: RV_1,046.06a yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1126: RV_1,046.07a ā no nāvā matīnāṃ yātam pārāya gantave |
GV01rv_hn01u:1128: RV_1,046.08a aritraṃ vāṃ divas pṛthu tīrthe sindhūnāṃ rathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1130: RV_1,046.09a divas kaṇvāsa indavo vasu sindhūnām pade |
GV01rv_hn01u:1132: RV_1,046.10a abhūd u bhā u aṃśave hiraṇyam prati sūryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1134: RV_1,046.11a abhūd u pāram etave panthā ṛtasya sādhuyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1136: RV_1,046.12a tat-tad id aśvinor avo jaritā prati bhūṣati |
GV01rv_hn01u:1138: RV_1,046.13a vāvasānā vivasvati somasya pītyā girā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1140: RV_1,046.14a yuvor uṣā anu śriyam parijmanor upācarat |
GV01rv_hn01u:1142: RV_1,046.15a ubhā pibatam aśvinobhā naḥ śarma yacchatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1144: RV_1,047.01a ayaṃ vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1145: RV_1,047.01c tam aśvinā pibataṃ tiroahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1146: RV_1,047.02a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathenā yātam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1147: RV_1,047.02c kaṇvāso vām brahma kṛṇvanty adhvare teṣāṃ su śṛṇutaṃ havam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1148: RV_1,047.03a aśvinā madhumattamam pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1149: RV_1,047.03c athādya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1150: RV_1,047.04a triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1151: RV_1,047.04c kaṇvāso vāṃ sutasomā abhidyavo yuvāṃ havante aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1152: RV_1,047.05a yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvataṃ yuvam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1153: RV_1,047.05c tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ avataṃ śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1154: RV_1,047.06a sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣo vahatam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1155: RV_1,047.06c rayiṃ samudrād uta vā divas pary asme dhattam puruspṛham ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1156: RV_1,047.07a yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhi turvaśe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1157: RV_1,047.07c ato rathena suvṛtā na ā gataṃ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1158: RV_1,047.08a arvāñcā vāṃ saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa |
GV01rv_hn01u:1159: RV_1,047.08c iṣam pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānava ā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1160: RV_1,047.09a tena nāsatyā gataṃ rathena sūryatvacā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1161: RV_1,047.09c yena śaśvad ūhathur dāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1162: RV_1,047.10a ukthebhir arvāg avase purūvasū arkaiś ca ni hvayāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1163: RV_1,047.10c śaśvat kaṇvānāṃ sadasi priye hi kaṃ somam papathur aśvinā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1164: RV_1,048.01a saha vāmena na uṣo vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1165: RV_1,048.01c saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1166: RV_1,048.02a aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvasuvido bhūri cyavanta vastave |
GV01rv_hn01u:1167: RV_1,048.02c ud īraya prati mā sūnṛtā uṣaś coda rādho maghonām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1168: RV_1,048.03a uvāsoṣā ucchāc ca nu devī jīrā rathānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:1169: RV_1,048.03c ye asyā ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1170: RV_1,048.04a uṣo ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate mano dānāya sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1171: RV_1,048.04c atrāha tat kaṇva eṣāṃ kaṇvatamo nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1172: RV_1,048.05a ā ghā yoṣeva sūnary uṣā yāti prabhuñjatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:1173: RV_1,048.05c jarayantī vṛjanam padvad īyata ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1174: RV_1,048.06a vi yā sṛjati samanaṃ vy arthinaḥ padaṃ na vety odatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:1175: RV_1,048.06c vayo nakiṣ ṭe paptivāṃsa āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1177: RV_1,048.07c śataṃ rathebhiḥ subhagoṣā iyaṃ vi yāty abhi mānuṣān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1178: RV_1,048.08a viśvam asyā nānāma cakṣase jagaj jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī |
GV01rv_hn01u:1179: RV_1,048.08c apa dveṣo maghonī duhitā diva uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1180: RV_1,048.09a uṣa ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitar divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1181: RV_1,048.09c āvahantī bhūry asmabhyaṃ saubhagaṃ vyucchantī diviṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1182: RV_1,048.10a viśvasya hi prāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ tve vi yad ucchasi sūnari |
GV01rv_hn01u:1183: RV_1,048.10c sā no rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1184: RV_1,048.11a uṣo vājaṃ hi vaṃsva yaś citro mānuṣe jane |
GV01rv_hn01u:1185: RV_1,048.11c tenā vaha sukṛto adhvarāṃ upa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1186: RV_1,048.12a viśvān devāṃ ā vaha somapītaye 'ntarikṣād uṣas tvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1187: RV_1,048.12c sāsmāsu dhā gomad aśvāvad ukthyam uṣo vājaṃ suvīryam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1188: RV_1,048.13a yasyā ruśanto arcayaḥ prati bhadrā adṛkṣata |
GV01rv_hn01u:1189: RV_1,048.13c sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ supeśasam uṣā dadātu sugmyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1190: RV_1,048.14a ye cid dhi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrva ūtaye juhūre 'vase mahi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1191: RV_1,048.14c sā na stomāṃ abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasoṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1192: RV_1,048.15a uṣo yad adya bhānunā vi dvārāv ṛṇavo divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1193: RV_1,048.15c pra no yacchatād avṛkam pṛthu cchardiḥ pra devi gomatīr iṣaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1194: RV_1,048.16a saṃ no rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā mimikṣvā sam iḷābhir ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1195: RV_1,048.16c saṃ dyumnena viśvaturoṣo mahi saṃ vājair vājinīvati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1196: RV_1,049.01a uṣo bhadrebhir ā gahi divaś cid rocanād adhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1197: RV_1,049.01c vahantv aruṇapsava upa tvā somino gṛham ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1198: RV_1,049.02a supeśasaṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ yam adhyasthā uṣas tvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1199: RV_1,049.02c tenā suśravasaṃ janam prāvādya duhitar divaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1200: RV_1,049.03a vayaś cit te patatriṇo dvipac catuṣpad arjuni |
GV01rv_hn01u:1201: RV_1,049.03c uṣaḥ prārann ṛtūṃr anu divo antebhyas pari ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1202: RV_1,049.04a vyucchantī hi raśmibhir viśvam ābhāsi rocanam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1203: RV_1,049.04c tāṃ tvām uṣar vasūyavo gīrbhiḥ kaṇvā ahūṣata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1204: RV_1,050.01a ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1206: RV_1,050.02a apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1208: RV_1,050.03a adṛśram asya ketavo vi raśmayo janāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn01u:1210: RV_1,050.04a taraṇir viśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛd asi sūrya |
GV01rv_hn01u:1212: RV_1,050.05a pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣān |
GV01rv_hn01u:1214: RV_1,050.06a yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn01u:1216: RV_1,050.07a vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahā mimāno aktubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1218: RV_1,050.08a sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya |
GV01rv_hn01u:1220: RV_1,050.09a ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1222: RV_1,050.10a ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram |
GV01rv_hn01u:1223: RV_1,050.10c devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1224: RV_1,050.11a udyann adya mitramaha ārohann uttarāṃ divam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1225: RV_1,050.11c hṛdrogam mama sūrya harimāṇaṃ ca nāśaya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1226: RV_1,050.12a śukeṣu me harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1227: RV_1,050.12c atho hāridraveṣu me harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1228: RV_1,050.13a ud agād ayam ādityo viśvena sahasā saha |
GV01rv_hn01u:1229: RV_1,050.13c dviṣantam mahyaṃ randhayan mo ahaṃ dviṣate radham ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1230: RV_1,051.01a abhi tyam meṣam puruhūtam ṛgmiyam indraṃ gīrbhir madatā vasvo
GV01rv_hn01u:1232: RV_1,051.01c yasya dyāvo na vicaranti mānuṣā bhuje maṃhiṣṭham abhi vipram
GV01rv_hn01u:1234: RV_1,051.02a abhīm avanvan svabhiṣṭim ūtayo 'ntarikṣaprāṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1235: RV_1,051.02c indraṃ dakṣāsa ṛbhavo madacyutaṃ śatakratuṃ javanī
GV01rv_hn01u:1237: RV_1,051.03a tvaṃ gotram aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apotātraye śatadureṣu gātuvit |
GV01rv_hn01u:1238: RV_1,051.03c sasena cid vimadāyāvaho vasv ājāv adriṃ vāvasānasya nartayan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1239: RV_1,051.04a tvam apām apidhānāvṛṇor apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumad vasu |
GV01rv_hn01u:1240: RV_1,051.04c vṛtraṃ yad indra śavasāvadhīr ahim ād it sūryaṃ divy ārohayo dṛśe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1241: RV_1,051.05a tvam māyābhir apa māyino 'dhamaḥ svadhābhir ye adhi śuptāv ajuhvata |
GV01rv_hn01u:1242: RV_1,051.05c tvam pipror nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānaṃ dasyuhatyeṣv āvitha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1243: RV_1,051.06a tvaṃ kutsaṃ śuṣṇahatyeṣv āvithārandhayo 'tithigvāya śambaram
GV01rv_hn01u:1244: RV_1,051.06c mahāntaṃ cid arbudaṃ ni kramīḥ padā sanād eva dasyuhatyāya
GV01rv_hn01u:1246: RV_1,051.07a tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryag ghitā tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate |
GV01rv_hn01u:1247: RV_1,051.07c tava vajraś cikite bāhvor hito vṛścā śatror ava viśvāni
GV01rv_hn01u:1249: RV_1,051.08a vi jānīhy āryān ye ca dasyavo barhiṣmate randhayā śāsad
GV01rv_hn01u:1251: RV_1,051.08c śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvet tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana
GV01rv_hn01u:1252: RV_1,051.09a anuvratāya randhayann apavratān ābhūbhir indraḥ śnathayann
GV01rv_hn01u:1254: RV_1,051.09c vṛddhasya cid vardhato dyām inakṣata stavāno vamro vi jaghāna
GV01rv_hn01u:1256: RV_1,051.10a takṣad yat ta uśanā sahasā saho vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1257: RV_1,051.10c ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇo manoyuja ā pūryamāṇam avahann abhi
GV01rv_hn01u:1259: RV_1,051.11a mandiṣṭa yad uśane kāvye sacāṃ indro vaṅkū vaṅkutarādhi tiṣṭhati |
GV01rv_hn01u:1260: RV_1,051.11c ugro yayiṃ nir apaḥ srotasāsṛjad vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitā airayat
GV01rv_hn01u:1262: RV_1,051.12a ā smā rathaṃ vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtā yeṣu mandase |
GV01rv_hn01u:1263: RV_1,051.12c indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākano 'narvāṇaṃ ślokam ā rohase divi
GV01rv_hn01u:1264: RV_1,051.13a adadā arbhām mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:1265: RV_1,051.13c menābhavo vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1266: RV_1,051.14a indro aśrāyi sudhyo nireke pajreṣu stomo duryo na yūpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1267: RV_1,051.14c aśvayur gavyū rathayur vasūyur indra id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1268: RV_1,051.15a idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarāje satyaśuṣmāya tavase 'vāci |
GV01rv_hn01u:1269: RV_1,051.15c asminn indra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhis tava śarman syāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1270: RV_1,052.01a tyaṃ su meṣam mahayā svarvidaṃ śataṃ yasya subhvaḥ sākam
GV01rv_hn01u:1272: RV_1,052.01c atyaṃ na vājaṃ havanasyadaṃ ratham endraṃ vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1273: RV_1,052.02a sa parvato na dharuṇeṣv acyutaḥ sahasramūtis taviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1274: RV_1,052.02c indro yad vṛtram avadhīn nadīvṛtam ubjann arṇāṃsi jarhṛṣāṇo andhasā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1275: RV_1,052.03a sa hi dvaro dvariṣu vavra ūdhani candrabudhno madavṛddho manīṣibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1276: RV_1,052.03c indraṃ tam ahve svapasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭharātiṃ sa hi paprir
GV01rv_hn01u:1278: RV_1,052.04a ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ samudraṃ na subhvaḥ svā
GV01rv_hn01u:1280: RV_1,052.04c taṃ vṛtrahatye anu tasthur ūtayaḥ śuṣmā indram avātā ahrutapsavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1281: RV_1,052.05a abhi svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyato raghvīr iva pravaṇe sasrur
GV01rv_hn01u:1283: RV_1,052.05c indro yad vajrī dhṛṣamāṇo andhasā bhinad valasya paridhīṃr iva tritaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1284: RV_1,052.06a parīṃ ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavo 'po vṛtvī rajaso budhnam
GV01rv_hn01u:1286: RV_1,052.06c vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvano nijaghantha hanvor indra tanyatum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1287: RV_1,052.07a hradaṃ na hi tvā nyṛṣanty ūrmayo brahmāṇīndra tava yāni
GV01rv_hn01u:1289: RV_1,052.07c tvaṣṭā cit te yujyaṃ vāvṛdhe śavas tatakṣa vajram abhibhūtyojasam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1290: RV_1,052.08a jaghanvāṃ u haribhiḥ sambhṛtakratav indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyann apaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1291: RV_1,052.08c ayacchathā bāhvor vajram āyasam adhārayo divy ā sūryaṃ dṛśe
GV01rv_hn01u:1292: RV_1,052.09a bṛhat svaścandram amavad yad ukthyam akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇaṃ divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1293: RV_1,052.09c yan mānuṣapradhanā indram ūtayaḥ svar nṛṣāco maruto 'madann
GV01rv_hn01u:1295: RV_1,052.10a dyauś cid asyāmavāṃ aheḥ svanād ayoyavīd bhiyasā vajra indra
GV01rv_hn01u:1297: RV_1,052.10c vṛtrasya yad badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasābhinac chiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1298: RV_1,052.11a yad in nv indra pṛthivī daśabhujir ahāni viśvā tatananta
GV01rv_hn01u:1300: RV_1,052.11c atrāha te maghavan viśrutaṃ saho dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā
GV01rv_hn01u:1302: RV_1,052.12a tvam asya pāre rajaso vyomanaḥ svabhūtyojā avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1303: RV_1,052.12c cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojaso 'paḥ svaḥ paribhūr eṣy ā divam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1304: RV_1,052.13a tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patir bhūḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1305: RV_1,052.13c viśvam āprā antarikṣam mahitvā satyam addhā nakir anyas tvāvān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1306: RV_1,052.14a na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyaco na sindhavo rajaso antam
GV01rv_hn01u:1308: RV_1,052.14c nota svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyata eko anyac cakṛṣe viśvam
GV01rv_hn01u:1310: RV_1,052.15a ārcann atra marutaḥ sasminn ājau viśve devāso amadann anu tvā
GV01rv_hn01u:1311: RV_1,052.15c vṛtrasya yad bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvam indra praty ānaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:1313: RV_1,053.01a ny ū ṣu vācam pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1314: RV_1,053.01c nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatām ivāvidan na duṣṭutir draviṇodeṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:1316: RV_1,053.02a duro aśvasya dura indra gor asi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1317: RV_1,053.02c śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyas tam idaṃ gṛṇīmasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1318: RV_1,053.03a śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama taved idam abhitaś cekite vasu |
GV01rv_hn01u:1319: RV_1,053.03c ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1320: RV_1,053.04a ebhir dyubhiḥ sumanā ebhir indubhir nirundhāno amatiṃ gobhir aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1321: RV_1,053.04c indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhir yutadveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1322: RV_1,053.05a sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrair
GV01rv_hn01u:1324: RV_1,053.05c saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1325: RV_1,053.06a te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate
GV01rv_hn01u:1326: RV_1,053.06c yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇy aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1327: RV_1,053.07a yudhā yudham upa ghed eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ sam idaṃ haṃsy ojasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1328: RV_1,053.07c namyā yad indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1329: RV_1,053.08a tvaṃ karañjam uta parṇayaṃ vadhīs tejiṣṭhayātithigvasya
GV01rv_hn01u:1331: RV_1,053.08c tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro 'nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1332: RV_1,053.09a tvam etāñ janarājño dvir daśābandhunā suśravasopajagmuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1333: RV_1,053.09c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1334: RV_1,053.10a tvam āvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhis tava trāmabhir indra tūrvayāṇam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1335: RV_1,053.10c tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1336: RV_1,053.11a ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyas te śivatamā asāma |
GV01rv_hn01u:1337: RV_1,053.11c tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1338: RV_1,054.01a mā no asmin maghavan pṛtsv aṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1339: RV_1,054.01c akrandayo nadyo roruvad vanā kathā na kṣoṇīr bhiyasā sam
GV01rv_hn01u:1341: RV_1,054.02a arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantam indram mahayann abhi ṣṭuhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:1342: RV_1,054.02c yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabho nyṛñjate
GV01rv_hn01u:1343: RV_1,054.03a arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyaṃ vacaḥ svakṣatraṃ yasya dhṛṣato dhṛṣan
GV01rv_hn01u:1345: RV_1,054.03c bṛhacchravā asuro barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puro haribhyāṃ vṛṣabho ratho hi ṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1346: RV_1,054.04a tvaṃ divo bṛhataḥ sānu kopayo 'va tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram
GV01rv_hn01u:1348: RV_1,054.04c yan māyino vrandino mandinā dhṛṣac chitāṃ gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1349: RV_1,054.05a ni yad vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cid vrandino roruvad vanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1350: RV_1,054.05c prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yad adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kas tvā
GV01rv_hn01u:1352: RV_1,054.06a tvam āvitha naryaṃ turvaśaṃ yaduṃ tvaṃ turvītiṃ vayyaṃ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn01u:1353: RV_1,054.06c tvaṃ ratham etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane tvam puro navatiṃ dambhayo
GV01rv_hn01u:1355: RV_1,054.07a sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvaj jano rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati |
GV01rv_hn01u:1356: RV_1,054.07c ukthā vā yo abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānur asmā uparā pinvate divaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1357: RV_1,054.08a asamaṃ kṣatram asamā manīṣā pra somapā apasā santu neme |
GV01rv_hn01u:1358: RV_1,054.08c ye ta indra daduṣo vardhayanti mahi kṣatraṃ sthaviraṃ vṛṣṇyaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:1360: RV_1,054.09a tubhyed ete bahulā adridugdhāś camūṣadaś camasā indrapānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1361: RV_1,054.09c vy aśnuhi tarpayā kāmam eṣām athā mano vasudeyāya kṛṣva ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1362: RV_1,054.10a apām atiṣṭhad dharuṇahvaraṃ tamo 'ntar vṛtrasya jaṭhareṣu parvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1363: RV_1,054.10c abhīm indro nadyo vavriṇā hitā viśvā anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1364: RV_1,054.11a sa śevṛdham adhi dhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḷ indra tavyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1365: RV_1,054.11c rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1366: RV_1,055.01a divaś cid asya varimā vi papratha indraṃ na mahnā pṛthivī cana prati |
GV01rv_hn01u:1367: RV_1,055.01c bhīmas tuviṣmāñ carṣaṇibhya ātapaḥ śiśīte vajraṃ tejase na vaṃsagaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1368: RV_1,055.02a so arṇavo na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritā varīmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1369: RV_1,055.02c indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhma ojasā panasyate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1370: RV_1,055.03a tvaṃ tam indra parvataṃ na bhojase maho nṛmṇasya dharmaṇām
GV01rv_hn01u:1372: RV_1,055.03c pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmā ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1373: RV_1,055.04a sa id vane namasyubhir vacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇa indriyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:1374: RV_1,055.04c vṛṣā chandur bhavati haryato vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yad
GV01rv_hn01u:1376: RV_1,055.05a sa in mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhma ojasā janebhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1377: RV_1,055.05c adhā cana śrad dadhati tviṣīmata indrāya vajraṃ nighanighnate vadham ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1378: RV_1,055.06a sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasā vināśayan |
GV01rv_hn01u:1379: RV_1,055.06c jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvann avṛkāṇi yajyave 'va sukratuḥ sartavā apaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1381: RV_1,055.07a dānāya manaḥ somapāvann astu te 'rvāñcā harī vandanaśrud ā
GV01rv_hn01u:1383: RV_1,055.07c yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayo ya indra te na tvā ketā ā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1384: RV_1,055.08a aprakṣitaṃ vasu bibharṣi hastayor aṣāḷhaṃ sahas tanvi śruto dadhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:1385: RV_1,055.08c āvṛtāso 'vatāso na kartṛbhis tanūṣu te kratava indra bhūrayaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1386: RV_1,056.01a eṣa pra pūrvīr ava tasya camriṣo 'tyo na yoṣām ud ayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1387: RV_1,056.01c dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayaṃ ratham āvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1388: RV_1,056.02a taṃ gūrtayo nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1389: RV_1,056.02c patiṃ dakṣasya vidathasya nū saho giriṃ na venā adhi roha tejasā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1390: RV_1,056.03a sa turvaṇir mahāṃ areṇu pauṃsye girer bhṛṣṭir na bhrājate
GV01rv_hn01u:1392: RV_1,056.03c yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyaso made dudhra ābhūṣu rāmayan ni
GV01rv_hn01u:1394: RV_1,056.04a devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhotaya indraṃ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1395: RV_1,056.04c yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tama iyarti reṇum bṛhad arhariṣvaṇiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1396: RV_1,056.05a vi yat tiro dharuṇam acyutaṃ rajo 'tiṣṭhipo diva ātāsu barhaṇā |
GV01rv_hn01u:1397: RV_1,056.05c svarmīḷhe yan mada indra harṣyāhan vṛtraṃ nir apām aubjo
GV01rv_hn01u:1399: RV_1,056.06a tvaṃ divo dharuṇaṃ dhiṣa ojasā pṛthivyā indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:1400: RV_1,056.06c tvaṃ sutasya made ariṇā apo vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyārujaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1401: RV_1,057.01a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matim bhare |
GV01rv_hn01u:1402: RV_1,057.01c apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1403: RV_1,057.02a adha te viśvam anu hāsad iṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā haviṣmataḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:1404: RV_1,057.02c yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1405: RV_1,057.03a asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharā panīyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:1406: RV_1,057.03c yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotir akāri harito nāyase ||
GV01rv_hn01u:1407: RV_1,057.04a ime ta indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi
GV01rv_hn01u:1409: RV_1,057.04c nahi tvad anyo girvaṇo giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīr iva prati no harya tad vacaḥ ||
