GV01rv_hn01u:2478: RV_1,108.02c tāvāṃ ayam pātave somo astv aram indrāgnī manase yuvabhyām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2479: RV_1,108.03a cakrāthe hi sadhryaṅ nāma bhadraṃ sadhrīcīnā vṛtrahaṇā uta sthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2480: RV_1,108.03c tāv indrāgnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2481: RV_1,108.04a samiddheṣv agniṣv ānajānā yatasrucā barhir u tistirāṇā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2482: RV_1,108.04c tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhir arvāg endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam
GV01rv_hn01u:2483: RV_1,108.05a yānīndrāgnī cakrathur vīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇy uta vṛṣṇyāni |
GV01rv_hn01u:2484: RV_1,108.05c yā vām pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibataṃ sutasya
GV01rv_hn01u:2485: RV_1,108.06a yad abravam prathamaṃ vāṃ vṛṇāno 'yaṃ somo asurair no
GV01rv_hn01u:2487: RV_1,108.06c tāṃ satyāṃ śraddhām abhy ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2488: RV_1,108.07a yad indrāgnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe yad brahmaṇi rājani vā
GV01rv_hn01u:2490: RV_1,108.07c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2491: RV_1,108.08a yad indrāgnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yad druhyuṣv anuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2492: RV_1,108.08c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2493: RV_1,108.09a yad indrāgnī avamasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām paramasyām uta sthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2494: RV_1,108.09c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2495: RV_1,108.10a yad indrāgnī paramasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām avamasyām uta sthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2496: RV_1,108.10c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2497: RV_1,108.11a yad indrāgnī divi ṣṭho yat pṛthivyāṃ yat parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv
GV01rv_hn01u:2499: RV_1,108.11c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2500: RV_1,108.12a yad indrāgnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2501: RV_1,108.12c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2502: RV_1,108.13a evendrāgnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvāsmabhyaṃ saṃ jayataṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:2504: RV_1,108.13c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2506: RV_1,109.01a vi hy akhyam manasā vasya icchann indrāgnī jñāsa uta vā sajātān |
GV01rv_hn01u:2507: RV_1,109.01c nānyā yuvat pramatir asti mahyaṃ sa vāṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantīm
GV01rv_hn01u:2509: RV_1,109.02a aśravaṃ hi bhūridāvattarā vāṃ vijāmātur uta vā ghā syālāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:2510: RV_1,109.02c athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyām indrāgnī stomaṃ janayāmi navyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2511: RV_1,109.03a mā cchedma raśmīṃr iti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇāṃ śaktīr anuyacchamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2512: RV_1,109.03c indrāgnibhyāṃ kaṃ vṛṣaṇo madanti tā hy adrī dhiṣaṇāyā upasthe
GV01rv_hn01u:2513: RV_1,109.04a yuvābhyāṃ devī dhiṣaṇā madāyendrāgnī somam uśatī sunoti |
GV01rv_hn01u:2514: RV_1,109.04c tāv aśvinā bhadrahastā supāṇī ā dhāvatam madhunā pṛṅktam apsu
GV01rv_hn01u:2515: RV_1,109.05a yuvām indrāgnī vasuno vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtrahatye |
GV01rv_hn01u:2516: RV_1,109.05c tāv āsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethāṃ sutasya
GV01rv_hn01u:2517: RV_1,109.06a pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu pra pṛthivyā riricāthe divaś ca |
GV01rv_hn01u:2518: RV_1,109.06c pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyo mahitvā prendrāgnī viśvā bhuvanāty anyā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2519: RV_1,109.07a ā bharataṃ śikṣataṃ vajrabāhū asmāṃ indrāgnī avataṃ śacībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2520: RV_1,109.07c ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya yebhiḥ sapitvam pitaro na āsan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2521: RV_1,109.08a purandarā śikṣataṃ vajrahastāsmāṃ indrāgnī avatam bhareṣu |
GV01rv_hn01u:2522: RV_1,109.08c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2524: RV_1,110.01a tatam me apas tad u tāyate punaḥ svādiṣṭhā dhītir ucathāya śasyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:2525: RV_1,110.01c ayaṃ samudra iha viśvadevyaḥ svāhākṛtasya sam u tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2526: RV_1,110.02a ābhogayam pra yad icchanta aitanāpākāḥ prāñco mama ke cid
GV01rv_hn01u:2528: RV_1,110.02c saudhanvanāsaś caritasya bhūmanāgacchata savitur dāśuṣo gṛham
GV01rv_hn01u:2529: RV_1,110.03a tat savitā vo 'mṛtatvam āsuvad agohyaṃ yac chravayanta aitana |
GV01rv_hn01u:2530: RV_1,110.03c tyaṃ cic camasam asurasya bhakṣaṇam ekaṃ santam akṛṇutā caturvayam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2531: RV_1,110.04a viṣṭvī śamī taraṇitvena vāghato martāsaḥ santo amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2532: RV_1,110.04c saudhanvanā ṛbhavaḥ sūracakṣasaḥ saṃvatsare sam apṛcyanta
GV01rv_hn01u:2534: RV_1,110.05a kṣetram iva vi mamus tejanenaṃ ekam pātram ṛbhavo jehamānam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2535: RV_1,110.05c upastutā upamaṃ nādhamānā amartyeṣu śrava icchamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2536: RV_1,110.06a ā manīṣām antarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ sruceva ghṛtaṃ juhavāma vidmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2537: RV_1,110.06c taraṇitvā ye pitur asya saścira ṛbhavo vājam aruhan divo
GV01rv_hn01u:2539: RV_1,110.07a ṛbhur na indraḥ śavasā navīyān ṛbhur vājebhir vasubhir vasur
GV01rv_hn01u:2541: RV_1,110.07c yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priye 'bhi tiṣṭhema pṛtsutīr asunvatām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2542: RV_1,110.08a niś carmaṇa ṛbhavo gām apiṃśata saṃ vatsenāsṛjatā mātaram punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2543: RV_1,110.08c saudhanvanāsaḥ svapasyayā naro jivrī yuvānā pitarākṛṇotana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2544: RV_1,110.09a vājebhir no vājasātāv aviḍḍhy ṛbhumāṃ indra citram ā darṣi
GV01rv_hn01u:2546: RV_1,110.09c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2548: RV_1,111.01a takṣan rathaṃ suvṛtaṃ vidmanāpasas takṣan harī indravāhā vṛṣaṇvasū |
GV01rv_hn01u:2549: RV_1,111.01c takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavo yuvad vayas takṣan vatsāya mātaraṃ sacābhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2550: RV_1,111.02a ā no yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumad vayaḥ kratve dakṣāya suprajāvatīm iṣam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2551: RV_1,111.02c yathā kṣayāma sarvavīrayā viśā tan naḥ śardhāya dhāsathā sv
GV01rv_hn01u:2553: RV_1,111.03a ā takṣata sātim asmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ sātiṃ rathāya sātim arvate
GV01rv_hn01u:2555: RV_1,111.03c sātiṃ no jaitrīṃ sam maheta viśvahā jāmim ajāmim pṛtanāsu
GV01rv_hn01u:2557: RV_1,111.04a ṛbhukṣaṇam indram ā huva ūtaya ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ somapītaye
GV01rv_hn01u:2558: RV_1,111.04c ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnam aśvinā te no hinvantu sātaye dhiye
GV01rv_hn01u:2560: RV_1,111.05a ṛbhur bharāya saṃ śiśātu sātiṃ samaryajid vājo asmāṃ aviṣṭu |
GV01rv_hn01u:2561: RV_1,111.05c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2563: RV_1,112.01a īḷe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvacittaye 'gniṃ gharmaṃ surucaṃ yāmann
GV01rv_hn01u:2565: RV_1,112.01c yābhir bhare kāram aṃśāya jinvathas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2567: RV_1,112.02a yuvor dānāya subharā asaścato ratham ā tasthur vacasaṃ na
GV01rv_hn01u:2569: RV_1,112.02c yābhir dhiyo 'vathaḥ karmann iṣṭaye tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2571: RV_1,112.03a yuvaṃ tāsāṃ divyasya praśāsane viśāṃ kṣayatho amṛtasya majmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2572: RV_1,112.03c yābhir dhenum asvam pinvatho narā tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2573: RV_1,112.04a yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇir vibhūṣati |
GV01rv_hn01u:2574: RV_1,112.04c yābhis trimantur abhavad vicakṣaṇas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2575: RV_1,112.05a yābhī rebhaṃ nivṛtaṃ sitam adbhya ud vandanam airayataṃ svar
GV01rv_hn01u:2577: RV_1,112.05c yābhiḥ kaṇvam pra siṣāsantam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2579: RV_1,112.06a yābhir antakaṃ jasamānam āraṇe bhujyuṃ yābhir avyathibhir jijinvathuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2580: RV_1,112.06c yābhiḥ karkandhuṃ vayyaṃ ca jinvathas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2582: RV_1,112.07a yābhiḥ śucantiṃ dhanasāṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ taptaṃ gharmam omyāvantam atraye |
GV01rv_hn01u:2583: RV_1,112.07c yābhiḥ pṛśnigum purukutsam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2585: RV_1,112.08a yābhiḥ śacībhir vṛṣaṇā parāvṛjam prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ cakṣasa etave kṛthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2586: RV_1,112.08c yābhir vartikāṃ grasitām amuñcataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2588: RV_1,112.09a yābhiḥ sindhum madhumantam asaścataṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ yābhir ajarāv ajinvatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2589: RV_1,112.09c yābhiḥ kutsaṃ śrutaryaṃ naryam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2591: RV_1,112.10a yābhir viśpalāṃ dhanasām atharvyaṃ sahasramīḷha ājāv
GV01rv_hn01u:2593: RV_1,112.10c yābhir vaśam aśvyam preṇim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2594: RV_1,112.11a yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije dīrghaśravase madhu kośo akṣarat |
GV01rv_hn01u:2595: RV_1,112.11c kakṣīvantaṃ stotāraṃ yābhir āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2597: RV_1,112.12a yābhī rasāṃ kṣodasodnaḥ pipinvathur anaśvaṃ yābhī ratham āvataṃ jiṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2598: RV_1,112.12c yābhis triśoka usriyā udājata tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2600: RV_1,112.13a yābhiḥ sūryam pariyāthaḥ parāvati mandhātāraṃ kṣaitrapatyeṣv
GV01rv_hn01u:2602: RV_1,112.13c yābhir vipram pra bharadvājam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2604: RV_1,112.14a yābhir mahām atithigvaṃ kaśojuvaṃ divodāsaṃ śambarahatya
GV01rv_hn01u:2606: RV_1,112.14c yābhiḥ pūrbhidye trasadasyum āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2607: RV_1,112.15a yābhir vamraṃ vipipānam upastutaṃ kaliṃ yābhir vittajāniṃ duvasyathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2608: RV_1,112.15c yābhir vyaśvam uta pṛthim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2609: RV_1,112.16a yābhir narā śayave yābhir atraye yābhiḥ purā manave gātum
GV01rv_hn01u:2611: RV_1,112.16c yābhiḥ śārīr ājataṃ syūmaraśmaye tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2613: RV_1,112.17a yābhiḥ paṭharvā jaṭharasya majmanāgnir nādīdec cita iddho ajmann ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2614: RV_1,112.17c yābhiḥ śaryātam avatho mahādhane tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2616: RV_1,112.18a yābhir aṅgiro manasā niraṇyatho 'graṃ gacchatho vivare goarṇasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2617: RV_1,112.18c yābhir manuṃ śūram iṣā samāvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2618: RV_1,112.19a yābhiḥ patnīr vimadāya nyūhathur ā gha vā yābhir aruṇīr
GV01rv_hn01u:2620: RV_1,112.19c yābhiḥ sudāsa ūhathuḥ sudevyaṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā
GV01rv_hn01u:2622: RV_1,112.20a yābhiḥ śantātī bhavatho dadāśuṣe bhujyuṃ yābhir avatho yābhir adhrigum |
GV01rv_hn01u:2623: RV_1,112.20c omyāvatīṃ subharām ṛtastubhaṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2624: RV_1,112.21a yābhiḥ kṛśānum asane duvasyatho jave yābhir yūno arvantam āvatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2625: RV_1,112.21c madhu priyam bharatho yat saraḍbhyas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:2627: RV_1,112.22a yābhir naraṃ goṣuyudhaṃ nṛṣāhye kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2628: RV_1,112.22c yābhī rathāṃ avatho yābhir arvatas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2629: RV_1,112.23a yābhiḥ kutsam ārjuneyaṃ śatakratū pra turvītim pra ca dabhītim āvatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2630: RV_1,112.23c yābhir dhvasantim puruṣantim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2631: RV_1,112.24a apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtaṃ no dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2632: RV_1,112.24c adyūtye 'vase ni hvaye vāṃ vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2633: RV_1,112.25a dyubhir aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhir aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2634: RV_1,112.25c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2636: RV_1,113.01a idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir āgāc citraḥ praketo ajaniṣṭa vibhvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2637: RV_1,113.01c yathā prasūtā savituḥ savāyaṃ evā rātry uṣase yonim āraik ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2638: RV_1,113.02a ruśadvatsā ruśatī śvetyāgād āraig u kṛṣṇā sadanāny asyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2639: RV_1,113.02c samānabandhū amṛte anūcī dyāvā varṇaṃ carata āmināne ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2640: RV_1,113.03a samāno adhvā svasror anantas tam anyānyā carato devaśiṣṭe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2641: RV_1,113.03c na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2642: RV_1,113.04a bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām aceti citrā vi duro na āvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2643: RV_1,113.04c prārpyā jagad vy u no rāyo akhyad uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2644: RV_1,113.05a jihmaśye caritave maghony ābhogaya iṣṭaye rāya u tvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2645: RV_1,113.05c dabhram paśyadbhya urviyā vicakṣa uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2646: RV_1,113.06a kṣatrāya tvaṃ śravase tvam mahīyā iṣṭaye tvam artham iva tvam ityai |
GV01rv_hn01u:2647: RV_1,113.06c visadṛśā jīvitābhipracakṣa uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2648: RV_1,113.07a eṣā divo duhitā praty adarśi vyucchantī yuvatiḥ śukravāsāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2649: RV_1,113.07c viśvasyeśānā pārthivasya vasva uṣo adyeha subhage vy uccha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2650: RV_1,113.08a parāyatīnām anv eti pātha āyatīnām prathamā śaśvatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2651: RV_1,113.08c vyucchantī jīvam udīrayanty uṣā mṛtaṃ kaṃ cana bodhayantī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2652: RV_1,113.09a uṣo yad agniṃ samidhe cakartha vi yad āvaś cakṣasā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2653: RV_1,113.09c yan mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇāṃ ajīgas tad deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadram apnaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2654: RV_1,113.10a kiyāty ā yat samayā bhavāti yā vyūṣur yāś ca nūnaṃ vyucchān |
GV01rv_hn01u:2655: RV_1,113.10c anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣam anyābhir eti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2656: RV_1,113.11a īyuṣ ṭe ye pūrvatarām apaśyan vyucchantīm uṣasam martyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2657: RV_1,113.11c asmābhir ū nu praticakṣyābhūd o te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2658: RV_1,113.12a yāvayaddveṣā ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtā īrayantī |
GV01rv_hn01u:2659: RV_1,113.12c sumaṅgalīr bibhratī devavītim ihādyoṣaḥ śreṣṭhatamā vy uccha
GV01rv_hn01u:2660: RV_1,113.13a śaśvat puroṣā vy uvāsa devy atho adyedaṃ vy āvo maghonī |
GV01rv_hn01u:2661: RV_1,113.13c atho vy ucchād uttarāṃ anu dyūn ajarāmṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2662: RV_1,113.14a vy añjibhir diva ātāsv adyaud apa kṛṣṇāṃ nirṇijaṃ devy āvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2663: RV_1,113.14c prabodhayanty aruṇebhir aśvair oṣā yāti suyujā rathena ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2664: RV_1,113.15a āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citraṃ ketuṃ kṛṇute cekitānā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2665: RV_1,113.15c īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnāṃ vibhātīnām prathamoṣā vy aśvait ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2666: RV_1,113.16a ud īrdhvaṃ jīvo asur na āgād apa prāgāt tama ā jyotir eti |
GV01rv_hn01u:2667: RV_1,113.16c āraik panthāṃ yātave sūryāyāganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2668: RV_1,113.17a syūmanā vāca ud iyarti vahni stavāno rebha uṣaso vibhātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2669: RV_1,113.17c adyā tad uccha gṛṇate maghony asme āyur ni didīhi prajāvat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2670: RV_1,113.18a yā gomatīr uṣasaḥ sarvavīrā vyucchanti dāśuṣe martyāya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2671: RV_1,113.18c vāyor iva sūnṛtānām udarke tā aśvadā aśnavat somasutvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2672: RV_1,113.19a mātā devānām aditer anīkaṃ yajñasya ketur bṛhatī vi bhāhi |
GV01rv_hn01u:2673: RV_1,113.19c praśastikṛd brahmaṇe no vy ucchā no jane janaya viśvavāre ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2674: RV_1,113.20a yac citram apna uṣaso vahantījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram |
GV01rv_hn01u:2675: RV_1,113.20c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2677: RV_1,114.01a imā rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2678: RV_1,114.01c yathā śam asad dvipade catuṣpade viśvam puṣṭaṃ grāme asminn
GV01rv_hn01u:2680: RV_1,114.02a mṛḷā no rudrota no mayas kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhema te
GV01rv_hn01u:2681: RV_1,114.02c yac chaṃ ca yoś ca manur āyeje pitā tad aśyāma tava rudra
GV01rv_hn01u:2683: RV_1,114.03a aśyāma te sumatiṃ devayajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2684: RV_1,114.03c sumnāyann id viśo asmākam ā carāriṣṭavīrā juhavāma te haviḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2685: RV_1,114.04a tveṣaṃ vayaṃ rudraṃ yajñasādhaṃ vaṅkuṃ kavim avase ni hvayāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2686: RV_1,114.04c āre asmad daivyaṃ heḷo asyatu sumatim id vayam asyā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_hn01u:2687: RV_1,114.05a divo varāham aruṣaṃ kapardinaṃ tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ namasā ni hvayāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2688: RV_1,114.05c haste bibhrad bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma cchardir asmabhyaṃ yaṃsat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2689: RV_1,114.06a idam pitre marutām ucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyo rudrāya vardhanam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2690: RV_1,114.06c rāsvā ca no amṛta martabhojanaṃ tmane tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2691: RV_1,114.07a mā no mahāntam uta mā no arbhakam mā na ukṣantam uta mā na ukṣitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2692: RV_1,114.07c mā no vadhīḥ pitaram mota mātaram mā naḥ priyās tanvo rudra rīriṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2693: RV_1,114.08a mā nas toke tanaye mā na āyau mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2694: RV_1,114.08c vīrān mā no rudra bhāmito vadhīr haviṣmantaḥ sadam it tvā havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2695: RV_1,114.09a upa te stomān paśupā ivākaraṃ rāsvā pitar marutāṃ sumnam asme
GV01rv_hn01u:2696: RV_1,114.09c bhadrā hi te sumatir mṛḷayattamāthā vayam ava it te vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_hn01u:2697: RV_1,114.10a āre te goghnam uta pūruṣaghnaṃ kṣayadvīra sumnam asme te astu
GV01rv_hn01u:2698: RV_1,114.10c mṛḷā ca no adhi ca brūhi devādhā ca naḥ śarma yaccha dvibarhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2699: RV_1,114.11a avocāma namo asmā avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu no havaṃ rudro marutvān |
GV01rv_hn01u:2700: RV_1,114.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2702: RV_1,115.01a citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2703: RV_1,115.01c āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2704: RV_1,115.02a sūryo devīm uṣasaṃ rocamānām maryo na yoṣām abhy eti paścāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:2705: RV_1,115.02c yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2706: RV_1,115.03a bhadrā aśvā haritaḥ sūryasya citrā etagvā anumādyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2707: RV_1,115.03c namasyanto diva ā pṛṣṭham asthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2708: RV_1,115.04a tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvam madhyā kartor vitataṃ saṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:2710: RV_1,115.04c yaded ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthād ād rātrī vāsas tanute simasmai ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2711: RV_1,115.05a tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyor upasthe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2712: RV_1,115.05c anantam anyad ruśad asya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyad dharitaḥ sam
GV01rv_hn01u:2714: RV_1,115.06a adyā devā uditā sūryasya nir aṃhasaḥ pipṛtā nir avadyāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:2715: RV_1,115.06c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta
GV01rv_hn01u:2717: RV_1,116.01a nāsatyābhyām barhir iva pra vṛñje stomāṃ iyarmy abhriyeva vātaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2718: RV_1,116.01c yāv arbhagāya vimadāya jāyāṃ senājuvā nyūhatū rathena ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2719: RV_1,116.02a vīḷupatmabhir āśuhemabhir vā devānāṃ vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2720: RV_1,116.02c tad rāsabho nāsatyā sahasram ājā yamasya pradhane jigāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2721: RV_1,116.03a tugro ha bhujyum aśvinodameghe rayiṃ na kaś cin mamṛvāṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:2723: RV_1,116.03c tam ūhathur naubhir ātmanvatībhir antarikṣaprudbhir apodakābhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2724: RV_1,116.04a tisraḥ kṣapas trir ahātivrajadbhir nāsatyā bhujyum ūhathuḥ pataṅgaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2725: RV_1,116.04c samudrasya dhanvann ārdrasya pāre tribhī rathaiḥ śatapadbhiḥ ṣaḷaśvaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2726: RV_1,116.05a anārambhaṇe tad avīrayethām anāsthāne agrabhaṇe samudre |
GV01rv_hn01u:2727: RV_1,116.05c yad aśvinā ūhathur bhujyum astaṃ śatāritrāṃ nāvam ātasthivāṃsam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2728: RV_1,116.06a yam aśvinā dadathuḥ śvetam aśvam aghāśvāya śaśvad it svasti |
GV01rv_hn01u:2729: RV_1,116.06c tad vāṃ dātram mahi kīrtenyam bhūt paidvo vājī sadam id dhavyo aryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2730: RV_1,116.07a yuvaṃ narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradatam purandhim |
GV01rv_hn01u:2731: RV_1,116.07c kārotarāc chaphād aśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śataṃ kumbhāṃ asiñcataṃ surāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2732: RV_1,116.08a himenāgniṃ ghraṃsam avārayethām pitumatīm ūrjam asmā adhattam
GV01rv_hn01u:2733: RV_1,116.08c ṛbīse atrim aśvināvanītam un ninyathuḥ sarvagaṇaṃ svasti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2734: RV_1,116.09a parāvataṃ nāsatyānudethām uccābudhnaṃ cakrathur jihmabāram |
GV01rv_hn01u:2735: RV_1,116.09c kṣarann āpo na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2736: RV_1,116.10a jujuruṣo nāsatyota vavrim prāmuñcataṃ drāpim iva cyavānāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:2737: RV_1,116.10c prātirataṃ jahitasyāyur dasrād it patim akṛṇutaṃ kanīnām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2738: RV_1,116.11a tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ rādhyaṃ cābhiṣṭiman nāsatyā varūtham |
GV01rv_hn01u:2739: RV_1,116.11c yad vidvāṃsā nidhim ivāpagūḷham ud darśatād ūpathur vandanāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2740: RV_1,116.12a tad vāṃ narā sanaye daṃsa ugram āviṣ kṛṇomi tanyatur na vṛṣṭim |
GV01rv_hn01u:2741: RV_1,116.12c dadhyaṅ ha yan madhv ātharvaṇo vām aśvasya śīrṣṇā pra yad īm uvāca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2742: RV_1,116.13a ajohavīn nāsatyā karā vām mahe yāman purubhujā purandhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2743: RV_1,116.13c śrutaṃ tac chāsur iva vadhrimatyā hiraṇyahastam aśvināv adattam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2744: RV_1,116.14a āsno vṛkasya vartikām abhīke yuvaṃ narā nāsatyāmumuktam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2745: RV_1,116.14c uto kavim purubhujā yuvaṃ ha kṛpamāṇam akṛṇutaṃ vicakṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2746: RV_1,116.15a caritraṃ hi ver ivācchedi parṇam ājā khelasya paritakmyāyām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2747: RV_1,116.15c sadyo jaṅghām āyasīṃ viśpalāyai dhane hite sartave praty adhattam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2748: RV_1,116.16a śatam meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvaṃ tam pitāndhaṃ cakāra |
GV01rv_hn01u:2749: RV_1,116.16c tasmā akṣī nāsatyā vicakṣa ādhattaṃ dasrā bhiṣajāv anarvan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2750: RV_1,116.17a ā vāṃ rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya kārṣmevātiṣṭhad arvatā jayantī |
GV01rv_hn01u:2751: RV_1,116.17c viśve devā anv amanyanta hṛdbhiḥ sam u śriyā nāsatyā sacethe
GV01rv_hn01u:2752: RV_1,116.18a yad ayātaṃ divodāsāya vartir bharadvājāyāśvinā hayantā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2753: RV_1,116.18c revad uvāha sacano ratho vāṃ vṛṣabhaś ca śiṃśumāraś ca yuktā
GV01rv_hn01u:2754: RV_1,116.19a rayiṃ sukṣatraṃ svapatyam āyuḥ suvīryaṃ nāsatyā vahantā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2755: RV_1,116.19c ā jahnāvīṃ samanasopa vājais trir ahno bhāgaṃ dadhatīm ayātam
GV01rv_hn01u:2756: RV_1,116.20a pariviṣṭaṃ jāhuṣaṃ viśvataḥ sīṃ sugebhir naktam ūhathū rajobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2757: RV_1,116.20c vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatāṃ ajarayū ayātam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2758: RV_1,116.21a ekasyā vastor āvataṃ raṇāya vaśam aśvinā sanaye sahasrā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2759: RV_1,116.21c nir ahataṃ ducchunā indravantā pṛthuśravaso vṛṣaṇāv arātīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2760: RV_1,116.22a śarasya cid ārcatkasyāvatād ā nīcād uccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2761: RV_1,116.22c śayave cin nāsatyā śacībhir jasuraye staryam pipyathur gām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2762: RV_1,116.23a avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2763: RV_1,116.23c paśuṃ na naṣṭam iva darśanāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathur viśvakāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2764: RV_1,116.24a daśa rātrīr aśivenā nava dyūn avanaddhaṃ śnathitam apsv antaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2765: RV_1,116.24c viprutaṃ rebham udani pravṛktam un ninyathuḥ somam iva sruveṇa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2766: RV_1,116.25a pra vāṃ daṃsāṃsy aśvināv avocam asya patiḥ syāṃ sugavaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2768: RV_1,116.25c uta paśyann aśnuvan dīrgham āyur astam ivej jarimāṇaṃ jagamyām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2769: RV_1,117.01a madhvaḥ somasyāśvinā madāya pratno hotā vivāsate vām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2770: RV_1,117.01c barhiṣmatī rātir viśritā gīr iṣā yātaṃ nāsatyopa vājaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2771: RV_1,117.02a yo vām aśvinā manaso javīyān rathaḥ svaśvo viśa ājigāti |
GV01rv_hn01u:2772: RV_1,117.02c yena gacchathaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tena narā vartir asmabhyaṃ yātam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2773: RV_1,117.03a ṛṣiṃ narāv aṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsād atrim muñcatho gaṇena |
GV01rv_hn01u:2774: RV_1,117.03c minantā dasyor aśivasya māyā anupūrvaṃ vṛṣaṇā codayantā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2775: RV_1,117.04a aśvaṃ na gūḷham aśvinā durevair ṛṣiṃ narā vṛṣaṇā rebham apsu
GV01rv_hn01u:2776: RV_1,117.04c saṃ taṃ riṇītho viprutaṃ daṃsobhir na vāṃ jūryanti pūrvyā
GV01rv_hn01u:2778: RV_1,117.05a suṣupvāṃsaṃ na nirṛter upasthe sūryaṃ na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2779: RV_1,117.05c śubhe rukmaṃ na darśataṃ nikhātam ud ūpathur aśvinā vandanāya
GV01rv_hn01u:2780: RV_1,117.06a tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyam pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman |
GV01rv_hn01u:2781: RV_1,117.06c śaphād aśvasya vājino janāya śataṃ kumbhāṃ asiñcatam madhūnām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2782: RV_1,117.07a yuvaṃ narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathur viśvakāya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2783: RV_1,117.07c ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade duroṇe patiṃ jūryantyā aśvināv adattam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2784: RV_1,117.08a yuvaṃ śyāvāya ruśatīm adattam mahaḥ kṣoṇasyāśvinā kaṇvāya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2785: RV_1,117.08c pravācyaṃ tad vṛṣaṇā kṛtaṃ vāṃ yan nārṣadāya śravo adhyadhattam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2786: RV_1,117.09a purū varpāṃsy aśvinā dadhānā ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2787: RV_1,117.09c sahasrasāṃ vājinam apratītam ahihanaṃ śravasyaṃ tarutram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2788: RV_1,117.10a etāni vāṃ śravasyā sudānū brahmāṅgūṣaṃ sadanaṃ rodasyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2789: RV_1,117.10c yad vām pajrāso aśvinā havante yātam iṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2790: RV_1,117.11a sūnor mānenāśvinā gṛṇānā vājaṃ viprāya bhuraṇā radantā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2791: RV_1,117.11c agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā saṃ viśpalāṃ nāsatyāriṇītam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2792: RV_1,117.12a kuha yāntā suṣṭutiṃ kāvyasya divo napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2793: RV_1,117.12c hiraṇyasyeva kalaśaṃ nikhātam ud ūpathur daśame aśvināhan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2794: RV_1,117.13a yuvaṃ cyavānam aśvinā jarantam punar yuvānaṃ cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2795: RV_1,117.13c yuvo rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyāvṛṇīta ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2796: RV_1,117.14a yuvaṃ tugrāya pūrvyebhir evaiḥ punarmanyāv abhavataṃ yuvānā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2797: RV_1,117.14c yuvam bhujyum arṇaso niḥ samudrād vibhir ūhathur ṛjrebhir aśvaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2798: RV_1,117.15a ajohavīd aśvinā taugryo vām proḷhaḥ samudram avyathir jaganvān |
GV01rv_hn01u:2799: RV_1,117.15c niṣ ṭam ūhathuḥ suyujā rathena manojavasā vṛṣaṇā svasti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2800: RV_1,117.16a ajohavīd aśvinā vartikā vām āsno yat sīm amuñcataṃ vṛkasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2801: RV_1,117.16c vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānv adrer jātaṃ viṣvāco ahataṃ viṣeṇa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2802: RV_1,117.17a śatam meṣān vṛkye māmahānaṃ tamaḥ praṇītam aśivena pitrā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2803: RV_1,117.17c ākṣī ṛjrāśve aśvināv adhattaṃ jyotir andhāya cakrathur vicakṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2804: RV_1,117.18a śunam andhāya bharam ahvayat sā vṛkīr aśvinā vṛṣaṇā nareti |
GV01rv_hn01u:2805: RV_1,117.18c jāraḥ kanīna iva cakṣadāna ṛjrāśvaḥ śatam ekaṃ ca meṣān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2806: RV_1,117.19a mahī vām ūtir aśvinā mayobhūr uta srāmaṃ dhiṣṇyā saṃ riṇīthaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2807: RV_1,117.19c athā yuvām id ahvayat purandhir āgacchataṃ sīṃ vṛṣaṇāv avobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2808: RV_1,117.20a adhenuṃ dasrā staryaṃ viṣaktām apinvataṃ śayave aśvinā gām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2809: RV_1,117.20c yuvaṃ śacībhir vimadāya jāyāṃ ny ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2810: RV_1,117.21a yavaṃ vṛkeṇāśvinā vapanteṣaṃ duhantā manuṣāya dasrā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2811: RV_1,117.21c abhi dasyum bakureṇā dhamantoru jyotiś cakrathur āryāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2812: RV_1,117.22a ātharvaṇāyāśvinā dadhīce 'śvyaṃ śiraḥ praty airayatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2813: RV_1,117.22c sa vām madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāv apikakṣyaṃ vām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2814: RV_1,117.23a sadā kavī sumatim ā cake vāṃ viśvā dhiyo aśvinā prāvatam me |
GV01rv_hn01u:2815: RV_1,117.23c asme rayiṃ nāsatyā bṛhantam apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2816: RV_1,117.24a hiraṇyahastam aśvinā rarāṇā putraṃ narā vadhrimatyā adattam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2817: RV_1,117.24c tridhā ha śyāvam aśvinā vikastam uj jīvasa airayataṃ sudānū
GV01rv_hn01u:2818: RV_1,117.25a etāni vām aśvinā vīryāṇi pra pūrvyāṇy āyavo 'vocan |
GV01rv_hn01u:2819: RV_1,117.25c brahma kṛṇvanto vṛṣaṇā yuvabhyāṃ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2820: RV_1,118.01a ā vāṃ ratho aśvinā śyenapatvā sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2821: RV_1,118.01c yo martyasya manaso javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā vātaraṃhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2822: RV_1,118.02a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena tricakreṇa suvṛtā yātam arvāk |
GV01rv_hn01u:2823: RV_1,118.02c pinvataṃ gā jinvatam arvato no vardhayatam aśvinā vīram asme
GV01rv_hn01u:2824: RV_1,118.03a pravadyāmanā suvṛtā rathena dasrāv imaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokam adreḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2825: RV_1,118.03c kim aṅga vām praty avartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhur viprāso aśvinā purājāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2826: RV_1,118.04a ā vāṃ śyenāso aśvinā vahantu rathe yuktāsa āśavaḥ pataṅgāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2827: RV_1,118.04c ye apturo divyāso na gṛdhrā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2828: RV_1,118.05a ā vāṃ rathaṃ yuvatis tiṣṭhad atra juṣṭvī narā duhitā sūryasya
GV01rv_hn01u:2829: RV_1,118.05c pari vām aśvā vapuṣaḥ pataṅgā vayo vahantv aruṣā abhīke ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2830: RV_1,118.06a ud vandanam airataṃ daṃsanābhir ud rebhaṃ dasrā vṛṣaṇā śacībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2831: RV_1,118.06c niṣ ṭaugryam pārayathaḥ samudrāt punaś cyavānaṃ cakrathur yuvānam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2832: RV_1,118.07a yuvam atraye 'vanītāya taptam ūrjam omānam aśvināv adhattam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2833: RV_1,118.07c yuvaṃ kaṇvāyāpiriptāya cakṣuḥ praty adhattaṃ suṣṭutiṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:2835: RV_1,118.08a yuvaṃ dhenuṃ śayave nādhitāyāpinvatam aśvinā pūrvyāya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2836: RV_1,118.08c amuñcataṃ vartikām aṃhaso niḥ prati jaṅghāṃ viśpalāyā adhattam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2837: RV_1,118.09a yuvaṃ śvetam pedava indrajūtam ahihanam aśvinādattam aśvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2838: RV_1,118.09c johūtram aryo abhibhūtim ugraṃ sahasrasāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vīḍvaṅgam
GV01rv_hn01u:2839: RV_1,118.10a tā vāṃ narā sv avase sujātā havāmahe aśvinā nādhamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2840: RV_1,118.10c ā na upa vasumatā rathena giro juṣāṇā suvitāya yātam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2841: RV_1,118.11a ā śyenasya javasā nūtanenāsme yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2842: RV_1,118.11c have hi vām aśvinā rātahavyaḥ śaśvattamāyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2843: RV_1,119.01a ā vāṃ ratham purumāyam manojuvaṃ jīrāśvaṃ yajñiyaṃ jīvase huve |
GV01rv_hn01u:2844: RV_1,119.01c sahasraketuṃ vaninaṃ śatadvasuṃ śruṣṭīvānaṃ varivodhām abhi
GV01rv_hn01u:2846: RV_1,119.02a ūrdhvā dhītiḥ praty asya prayāmany adhāyi śasman sam ayanta ā diśaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2847: RV_1,119.02c svadāmi gharmam prati yanty ūtaya ā vām ūrjānī ratham
GV01rv_hn01u:2849: RV_1,119.03a saṃ yan mithaḥ paspṛdhānāso agmata śubhe makhā amitā jāyavo
GV01rv_hn01u:2851: RV_1,119.03c yuvor aha pravaṇe cekite ratho yad aśvinā vahathaḥ sūrim ā varam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2852: RV_1,119.04a yuvam bhujyum bhuramāṇaṃ vibhir gataṃ svayuktibhir nivahantā pitṛbhya ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2853: RV_1,119.04c yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir vṛṣaṇā vijenyaṃ divodāsāya mahi ceti vām avaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2854: RV_1,119.05a yuvor aśvinā vapuṣe yuvāyujaṃ rathaṃ vāṇī yematur asya śardhyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2855: RV_1,119.05c ā vām patitvaṃ sakhyāya jagmuṣī yoṣāvṛṇīta jenyā yuvām patī
GV01rv_hn01u:2856: RV_1,119.06a yuvaṃ rebham pariṣūter uruṣyatho himena gharmam paritaptam atraye |
GV01rv_hn01u:2857: RV_1,119.06c yuvaṃ śayor avasam pipyathur gavi pra dīrgheṇa vandanas tāry
GV01rv_hn01u:2859: RV_1,119.07a yuvaṃ vandanaṃ nirṛtaṃ jaraṇyayā rathaṃ na dasrā karaṇā sam
GV01rv_hn01u:2861: RV_1,119.07c kṣetrād ā vipraṃ janatho vipanyayā pra vām atra vidhate
GV01rv_hn01u:2863: RV_1,119.08a agacchataṃ kṛpamāṇam parāvati pituḥ svasya tyajasā nibādhitam
GV01rv_hn01u:2864: RV_1,119.08c svarvatīr ita ūtīr yuvor aha citrā abhīke abhavann abhiṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2865: RV_1,119.09a uta syā vām madhuman makṣikārapan made somasyauśijo huvanyati |
GV01rv_hn01u:2866: RV_1,119.09c yuvaṃ dadhīco mana ā vivāsatho 'thā śiraḥ prati vām aśvyaṃ vadat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2867: RV_1,119.10a yuvam pedave puruvāram aśvinā spṛdhāṃ śvetaṃ tarutāraṃ duvasyathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2868: RV_1,119.10c śaryair abhidyum pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraṃ carkṛtyam indram iva carṣaṇīsaham ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2869: RV_1,120.01a kā rādhad dhotrāśvinā vāṃ ko vāṃ joṣa ubhayoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2871: RV_1,120.02a vidvāṃsāv id duraḥ pṛcched avidvān itthāparo acetāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2872: RV_1,120.02c nū cin nu marte akrau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2873: RV_1,120.03a tā vidvāṃsā havāmahe vāṃ tā no vidvāṃsā manma vocetam adya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2875: RV_1,120.04a vi pṛcchāmi pākyā na devān vaṣaṭkṛtasyādbhutasya dasrā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2876: RV_1,120.04c pātaṃ ca sahyaso yuvaṃ ca rabhyaso naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2877: RV_1,120.05a pra yā ghoṣe bhṛgavāṇe na śobhe yayā vācā yajati pajriyo vām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2879: RV_1,120.06a śrutaṃ gāyatraṃ takavānasyāhaṃ cid dhi rirebhāśvinā vām |
GV01rv_hn01u:2881: RV_1,120.07a yuvaṃ hy āstam maho ran yuvaṃ vā yan niratataṃsatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2882: RV_1,120.07c tā no vasū sugopā syātam pātaṃ no vṛkād aghāyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2883: RV_1,120.08a mā kasmai dhātam abhy amitriṇe no mākutrā no gṛhebhyo dhenavo guḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2885: RV_1,120.09a duhīyan mitradhitaye yuvāku rāye ca no mimītaṃ vājavatyai |
GV01rv_hn01u:2886: RV_1,120.09c iṣe ca no mimītaṃ dhenumatyai ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2887: RV_1,120.10a aśvinor asanaṃ ratham anaśvaṃ vājinīvatoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2889: RV_1,120.11a ayaṃ samaha mā tanūhyāte janāṃ anu |
GV01rv_hn01u:2891: RV_1,120.12a adha svapnasya nir vide 'bhuñjataś ca revataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2893: RV_1,121.01a kad itthā nṝṃḥ pātraṃ devayatāṃ śravad giro aṅgirasāṃ turaṇyan |
GV01rv_hn01u:2894: RV_1,121.01c pra yad ānaḍ viśa ā harmyasyoru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2895: RV_1,121.02a stambhīd dha dyāṃ sa dharuṇam pruṣāyad ṛbhur vājāya draviṇaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:2897: RV_1,121.02c anu svajām mahiṣaś cakṣata vrām menām aśvasya pari mātaraṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:2899: RV_1,121.03a nakṣad dhavam aruṇīḥ pūrvyaṃ rāṭ turo viśām aṅgirasām anu
GV01rv_hn01u:2901: RV_1,121.03c takṣad vajraṃ niyutaṃ tastambhad dyāṃ catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2902: RV_1,121.04a asya made svaryaṃ dā ṛtāyāpīvṛtam usriyāṇām anīkam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2903: RV_1,121.04c yad dha prasarge trikakum nivartad apa druho mānuṣasya duro
GV01rv_hn01u:2905: RV_1,121.05a tubhyam payo yat pitarāv anītāṃ rādhaḥ suretas turaṇe bhuraṇyū |
GV01rv_hn01u:2906: RV_1,121.05c śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ paya usriyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2907: RV_1,121.06a adha pra jajñe taraṇir mamattu pra rocy asyā uṣaso na sūraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2908: RV_1,121.06c indur yebhir āṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcañ jaraṇābhi dhāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2909: RV_1,121.07a svidhmā yad vanadhitir apasyāt sūro adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2910: RV_1,121.07c yad dha prabhāsi kṛtvyāṃ anu dyūn anarviśe paśviṣe turāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2911: RV_1,121.08a aṣṭā maho diva ādo harī iha dyumnāsāham abhi yodhāna utsam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2912: RV_1,121.08c hariṃ yat te mandinaṃ dukṣan vṛdhe gorabhasam adribhir vātāpyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2913: RV_1,121.09a tvam āyasam prati vartayo gor divo aśmānam upanītam ṛbhvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2914: RV_1,121.09c kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvañ chuṣṇam anantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2915: RV_1,121.10a purā yat sūras tamaso apītes tam adrivaḥ phaligaṃ hetim asya
GV01rv_hn01u:2916: RV_1,121.10c śuṣṇasya cit parihitaṃ yad ojo divas pari sugrathitaṃ tad
GV01rv_hn01u:2918: RV_1,121.11a anu tvā mahī pājasī acakre dyāvākṣāmā madatām indra karman |
GV01rv_hn01u:2919: RV_1,121.11c tvaṃ vṛtram āśayānaṃ sirāsu maho vajreṇa siṣvapo varāhum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2920: RV_1,121.12a tvam indra naryo yāṃ avo nṝn tiṣṭhā vātasya suyujo vahiṣṭhān
GV01rv_hn01u:2921: RV_1,121.12c yaṃ te kāvya uśanā mandinaṃ dād vṛtrahaṇam pāryaṃ tatakṣa
GV01rv_hn01u:2923: RV_1,121.13a tvaṃ sūro harito rāmayo nṝn bharac cakram etaśo nāyam indra |
GV01rv_hn01u:2924: RV_1,121.13c prāsya pāraṃ navatiṃ nāvyānām api kartam avartayo 'yajyūn ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2925: RV_1,121.14a tvaṃ no asyā indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivo duritād abhīke |
GV01rv_hn01u:2926: RV_1,121.14c pra no vājān rathyo aśvabudhyān iṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai
GV01rv_hn01u:2927: RV_1,121.15a mā sā te asmat sumatir vi dasad vājapramahaḥ sam iṣo varanta |
GV01rv_hn01u:2928: RV_1,121.15c ā no bhaja maghavan goṣv aryo maṃhiṣṭhās te sadhamādaḥ syāma
GV01rv_hn01u:2929: RV_1,122.01a pra vaḥ pāntaṃ raghumanyavo 'ndho yajñaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe
GV01rv_hn01u:2931: RV_1,122.01c divo astoṣy asurasya vīrair iṣudhyeva maruto rodasyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2932: RV_1,122.02a patnīva pūrvahūtiṃ vāvṛdhadhyā uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne |
GV01rv_hn01u:2933: RV_1,122.02c starīr nātkaṃ vyutaṃ vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2934: RV_1,122.03a mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vāto apāṃ vṛṣaṇvān |
GV01rv_hn01u:2935: RV_1,122.03c śiśītam indrāparvatā yuvaṃ nas tan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2936: RV_1,122.04a uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā pāntauśijo huvadhyai |
GV01rv_hn01u:2937: RV_1,122.04c pra vo napātam apāṃ kṛṇudhvam pra mātarā rāspinasyāyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2938: RV_1,122.05a ā vo ruvaṇyum auśijo huvadhyai ghoṣeva śaṃsam arjunasya naṃśe
GV01rv_hn01u:2939: RV_1,122.05c pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvana āṃ acchā voceya vasutātim agneḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2940: RV_1,122.06a śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havemota śrutaṃ sadane viśvataḥ sīm |
GV01rv_hn01u:2941: RV_1,122.06c śrotu naḥ śroturātiḥ suśrotuḥ sukṣetrā sindhur adbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2942: RV_1,122.07a stuṣe sā vāṃ varuṇa mitra rātir gavāṃ śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre
GV01rv_hn01u:2943: RV_1,122.07c śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃ nirundhānāso
GV01rv_hn01u:2945: RV_1,122.08a asya stuṣe mahimaghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ suvīrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2946: RV_1,122.08c jano yaḥ pajrebhyo vājinīvān aśvāvato rathino mahyaṃ sūriḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2947: RV_1,122.09a jano yo mitrāvaruṇāv abhidhrug apo na vāṃ sunoty akṣṇayādhruk
GV01rv_hn01u:2948: RV_1,122.09c svayaṃ sa yakṣmaṃ hṛdaye ni dhatta āpa yad īṃ hotrābhir ṛtāvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2949: RV_1,122.10a sa vrādhato nahuṣo daṃsujūtaḥ śardhastaro narāṃ gūrtaśravāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2950: RV_1,122.10c visṛṣṭarātir yāti bāḷhasṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadam ic chūraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2951: RV_1,122.11a adha gmantā nahuṣo havaṃ sūreḥ śrotā rājāno amṛtasya mandrāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:2952: RV_1,122.11c nabhojuvo yan niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinā rathavate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2953: RV_1,122.12a etaṃ śardhaṃ dhāma yasya sūrer ity avocan daśatayasya naṃśe |
GV01rv_hn01u:2954: RV_1,122.12c dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātī rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2955: RV_1,122.13a mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāser dvir yat pañca bibhrato yanty annā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2956: RV_1,122.13c kim iṣṭāśva iṣṭaraśmir eta īśānāsas taruṣa ṛñjate nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2957: RV_1,122.14a hiraṇyakarṇam maṇigrīvam arṇas tan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2958: RV_1,122.14c aryo giraḥ sadya ā jagmuṣīr osrāś cākantūbhayeṣv asme ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2959: RV_1,122.15a catvāro mā maśarśārasya śiśvas trayo rājña āyavasasya jiṣṇoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2960: RV_1,122.15c ratho vām mitrāvaruṇā dīrghāpsāḥ syūmagabhastiḥ sūro nādyaut
GV01rv_hn01u:2961: RV_1,123.01a pṛthū ratho dakṣiṇāyā ayojy ainaṃ devāso amṛtāso asthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2962: RV_1,123.01c kṛṣṇād ud asthād aryā vihāyāś cikitsantī mānuṣāya kṣayāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2963: RV_1,123.02a pūrvā viśvasmād bhuvanād abodhi jayantī vājam bṛhatī sanutrī |
GV01rv_hn01u:2964: RV_1,123.02c uccā vy akhyad yuvatiḥ punarbhūr oṣā agan prathamā pūrvahūtau
GV01rv_hn01u:2965: RV_1,123.03a yad adya bhāgaṃ vibhajāsi nṛbhya uṣo devi martyatrā sujāte |
GV01rv_hn01u:2966: RV_1,123.03c devo no atra savitā damūnā anāgaso vocati sūryāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2967: RV_1,123.04a gṛhaṃ-gṛham ahanā yāty acchā dive-dive adhi nāmā dadhānā |
GV01rv_hn01u:2968: RV_1,123.04c siṣāsantī dyotanā śaśvad āgād agram-agram id bhajate vasūnām
GV01rv_hn01u:2969: RV_1,123.05a bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmir uṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva |
GV01rv_hn01u:2970: RV_1,123.05c paścā sa daghyā yo aghasya dhātā jayema taṃ dakṣiṇayā rathena
GV01rv_hn01u:2971: RV_1,123.06a ud īratāṃ sūnṛtā ut purandhīr ud agnayaḥ śuśucānāso asthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:2972: RV_1,123.06c spārhā vasūni tamasāpagūḷhāviṣ kṛṇvanty uṣaso vibhātīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2973: RV_1,123.07a apānyad ety abhy anyad eti viṣurūpe ahanī saṃ carete |
GV01rv_hn01u:2974: RV_1,123.07c parikṣitos tamo anyā guhākar adyaud uṣāḥ śośucatā rathena ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2975: RV_1,123.08a sadṛśīr adya sadṛśīr id u śvo dīrghaṃ sacante varuṇasya dhāma
GV01rv_hn01u:2976: RV_1,123.08c anavadyās triṃśataṃ yojanāny ekaikā kratum pari yanti sadyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2977: RV_1,123.09a jānaty ahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇād ajaniṣṭa śvitīcī |
GV01rv_hn01u:2978: RV_1,123.09c ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāmāhar-ahar niṣkṛtam ācarantī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2979: RV_1,123.10a kanyeva tanvā śāśadānāṃ eṣi devi devam iyakṣamāṇam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2980: RV_1,123.10c saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastād āvir vakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2981: RV_1,123.11a susaṃkāśā mātṛmṛṣṭeva yoṣāvis tanvaṃ kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam |
GV01rv_hn01u:2982: RV_1,123.11c bhadrā tvam uṣo vitaraṃ vy uccha na tat te anyā uṣaso naśanta
GV01rv_hn01u:2983: RV_1,123.12a aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvavārā yatamānā raśmibhiḥ sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:2984: RV_1,123.12c parā ca yanti punar ā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānā uṣāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2985: RV_1,123.13a ṛtasya raśmim anuyacchamānā bhadram-bhadraṃ kratum asmāsu dhehi |
GV01rv_hn01u:2986: RV_1,123.13c uṣo no adya suhavā vy ucchāsmāsu rāyo maghavatsu ca syuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2987: RV_1,124.01a uṣā ucchantī samidhāne agnā udyan sūrya urviyā jyotir aśret |
GV01rv_hn01u:2988: RV_1,124.01c devo no atra savitā nv artham prāsāvīd dvipat pra catuṣpad ityai ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2989: RV_1,124.02a aminatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni |
GV01rv_hn01u:2990: RV_1,124.02c īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām āyatīnām prathamoṣā vy adyaut ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2991: RV_1,124.03a eṣā divo duhitā praty adarśi jyotir vasānā samanā purastāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:2992: RV_1,124.03c ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2993: RV_1,124.04a upo adarśi śundhyuvo na vakṣo nodhā ivāvir akṛta priyāṇi |
GV01rv_hn01u:2994: RV_1,124.04c admasan na sasato bodhayantī śaśvattamāgāt punar eyuṣīṇām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2995: RV_1,124.05a pūrve ardhe rajaso aptyasya gavāṃ janitry akṛta pra ketum |
GV01rv_hn01u:2996: RV_1,124.05c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīya obhā pṛṇantī pitror upasthā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2997: RV_1,124.06a eved eṣā purutamā dṛśe kaṃ nājāmiṃ na pari vṛṇakti jāmim |
GV01rv_hn01u:2998: RV_1,124.06c arepasā tanvā śāśadānā nārbhād īṣate na maho vibhātī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:2999: RV_1,124.07a abhrāteva puṃsa eti pratīcī gartārug iva sanaye dhanānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3000: RV_1,124.07c jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsā uṣā hasreva ni riṇīte apsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3001: RV_1,124.08a svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonim āraig apaity asyāḥ praticakṣyeva |
GV01rv_hn01u:3002: RV_1,124.08c vyucchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasyāñjy aṅkte samanagā iva vrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3003: RV_1,124.09a āsām pūrvāsām ahasu svasṝṇām aparā pūrvām abhy eti paścāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3004: RV_1,124.09c tāḥ pratnavan navyasīr nūnam asme revad ucchantu sudinā uṣāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3005: RV_1,124.10a pra bodhayoṣaḥ pṛṇato maghony abudhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu |
GV01rv_hn01u:3006: RV_1,124.10c revad uccha maghavadbhyo maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3007: RV_1,124.11a aveyam aśvaid yuvatiḥ purastād yuṅkte gavām aruṇānām anīkam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3008: RV_1,124.11c vi nūnam ucchād asati pra ketur gṛhaṃ-gṛham upa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3009: RV_1,124.12a ut te vayaś cid vasater apaptan naraś ca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn01u:3010: RV_1,124.12c amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3011: RV_1,124.13a astoḍhvaṃ stomyā brahmaṇā me 'vīvṛdhadhvam uśatīr uṣāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3012: RV_1,124.13c yuṣmākaṃ devīr avasā sanema sahasriṇaṃ ca śatinaṃ ca vājam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3013: RV_1,125.01a prātā ratnam prātaritvā dadhāti taṃ cikitvān pratigṛhyā ni dhatte |
GV01rv_hn01u:3014: RV_1,125.01c tena prajāṃ vardhayamāna āyū rāyas poṣeṇa sacate suvīraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3015: RV_1,125.02a sugur asat suhiraṇyaḥ svaśvo bṛhad asmai vaya indro dadhāti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3016: RV_1,125.02c yas tvāyantaṃ vasunā prātaritvo mukṣījayeva padim utsināti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3017: RV_1,125.03a āyam adya sukṛtam prātar icchann iṣṭeḥ putraṃ vasumatā rathena |
GV01rv_hn01u:3018: RV_1,125.03c aṃśoḥ sutam pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīraṃ vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3019: RV_1,125.04a upa kṣaranti sindhavo mayobhuva ījānaṃ ca yakṣyamāṇaṃ ca dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3020: RV_1,125.04c pṛṇantaṃ ca papuriṃ ca śravasyavo ghṛtasya dhārā upa yanti
GV01rv_hn01u:3022: RV_1,125.05a nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śrito yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gacchati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3023: RV_1,125.05c tasmā āpo ghṛtam arṣanti sindhavas tasmā iyaṃ dakṣiṇā pinvate
GV01rv_hn01u:3025: RV_1,125.06a dakṣiṇāvatām id imāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatāṃ divi sūryāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3026: RV_1,125.06c dakṣiṇāvanto amṛtam bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tiranta āyuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3027: RV_1,125.07a mā pṛṇanto duritam ena āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ suvratāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3028: RV_1,125.07c anyas teṣām paridhir astu kaś cid apṛṇantam abhi saṃ yantu śokāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3029: RV_1,126.01a amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhāv adhi kṣiyato bhāvyasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:3030: RV_1,126.01c yo me sahasram amimīta savān atūrto rājā śrava icchamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3031: RV_1,126.02a śataṃ rājño nādhamānasya niṣkāñ chatam aśvān prayatān sadya ādam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3032: RV_1,126.02c śataṃ kakṣīvāṃ asurasya gonāṃ divi śravo 'jaram ā tatāna ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3033: RV_1,126.03a upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattā vadhūmanto daśa rathāso asthuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3034: RV_1,126.03c ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasram anu gavyam āgāt sanat kakṣīvāṃ abhipitve ahnām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3035: RV_1,126.04a catvāriṃśad daśarathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasyāgre śreṇiṃ nayanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3036: RV_1,126.04c madacyutaḥ kṛśanāvato atyān kakṣīvanta ud amṛkṣanta pajrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3037: RV_1,126.05a pūrvām anu prayatim ā dade vas trīn yuktāṃ aṣṭāv aridhāyaso gāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3038: RV_1,126.05c subandhavo ye viśyā iva vrā anasvantaḥ śrava aiṣanta pajrāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3039: RV_1,126.06a āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkeva jaṅgahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3040: RV_1,126.06c dadāti mahyaṃ yādurī yāśūnām bhojyā śatā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3041: RV_1,126.07a upopa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3042: RV_1,126.07c sarvāham asmi romaśā gandhārīṇām ivāvikā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3043: RV_1,127.01a agniṃ hotāram manye dāsvantaṃ vasuṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ vipraṃ na jātavedasam
GV01rv_hn01u:3044: RV_1,127.01d ya ūrdhvayā svadhvaro devo devācyā kṛpā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3045: RV_1,127.01f ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭim anu vaṣṭi śociṣājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3046: RV_1,127.02a yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā yajamānā huvema jyeṣṭham aṅgirasāṃ vipra manmabhir viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3047: RV_1,127.02d parijmānam iva dyāṃ hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3048: RV_1,127.02f śociṣkeśaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ yam imā viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3049: RV_1,127.03a sa hi purū cid ojasā virukmatā dīdyāno bhavati druhantaraḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3051: RV_1,127.03d vīḷu cid yasya samṛtau śruvad vaneva yat sthiram |
GV01rv_hn01u:3052: RV_1,127.03f niḥṣahamāṇo yamate nāyate dhanvāsahā nāyate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3053: RV_1,127.04a dṛḷhā cid asmā anu dur yathā vide tejiṣṭhābhir araṇibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:3055: RV_1,127.04d pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣad vaneva śociṣā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3056: RV_1,127.04f sthirā cid annā ni riṇāty ojasā ni sthirāṇi cid ojasā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3057: RV_1,127.05a tam asya pṛkṣam uparāsu dhīmahi naktaṃ yaḥ sudarśataro divātarād aprāyuṣe divātarāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3058: RV_1,127.05d ād asyāyur grabhaṇavad vīḷu śarma na sūnave |
GV01rv_hn01u:3059: RV_1,127.05f bhaktam abhaktam avo vyanto ajarā agnayo vyanto ajarāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3060: RV_1,127.06a sa hi śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇir apnasvatīṣūrvarāsv iṣṭanir ārtanāsv iṣṭaniḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3061: RV_1,127.06d ādad dhavyāny ādadir yajñasya ketur arhaṇā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3062: RV_1,127.06f adha smāsya harṣato hṛṣīvato viśve juṣanta panthāṃ naraḥ śubhe na panthām
GV01rv_hn01u:3063: RV_1,127.07a dvitā yad īṃ kīstāso abhidyavo namasyanta upavocanta bhṛgavo mathnanto dāśā bhṛgavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3064: RV_1,127.07d agnir īśe vasūnāṃ śucir yo dharṇir eṣām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3065: RV_1,127.07f priyāṃ apidhīṃr vaniṣīṣṭa medhira ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3066: RV_1,127.08a viśvāsāṃ tvā viśām patiṃ havāmahe sarvāsāṃ samānaṃ dampatim bhuje satyagirvāhasam bhuje |
GV01rv_hn01u:3067: RV_1,127.08d atithim mānuṣāṇām pitur na yasyāsayā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3068: RV_1,127.08f amī ca viśve amṛtāsa ā vayo havyā deveṣv ā vayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3069: RV_1,127.09a tvam agne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamo jāyase devatātaye rayir na devatātaye
GV01rv_hn01u:3070: RV_1,127.09d śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3071: RV_1,127.09f adha smā te pari caranty ajara śruṣṭīvāno nājara ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3072: RV_1,127.10a pra vo mahe sahasā sahasvata uṣarbudhe paśuṣe nāgnaye stomo
GV01rv_hn01u:3074: RV_1,127.10d prati yad īṃ haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve |
GV01rv_hn01u:3075: RV_1,127.10f agre rebho na jarata ṛṣūṇāṃ jūrṇir hota ṛṣūṇām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3076: RV_1,127.11a sa no nediṣṭhaṃ dadṛśāna ā bharāgne devebhiḥ sacanāḥ sucetunā
GV01rv_hn01u:3078: RV_1,127.11d mahi śaviṣṭha nas kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai |
GV01rv_hn01u:3079: RV_1,127.11f mahi stotṛbhyo maghavan suvīryam mathīr ugro na śavasā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3080: RV_1,128.01a ayaṃ jāyata manuṣo dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭha uśijām anu vratam
GV01rv_hn01u:3082: RV_1,128.01d viśvaśruṣṭiḥ sakhīyate rayir iva śravasyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3083: RV_1,128.01f adabdho hotā ni ṣadad iḷas pade parivīta iḷas pade ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3084: RV_1,128.02a taṃ yajñasādham api vātayāmasy ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā
GV01rv_hn01u:3085: RV_1,128.02d sa na ūrjām upābhṛty ayā kṛpā na jūryati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3086: RV_1,128.02f yam mātariśvā manave parāvato devam bhāḥ parāvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3087: RV_1,128.03a evena sadyaḥ pary eti pārthivam muhurgī reto vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradad dadhad retaḥ kanikradat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3088: RV_1,128.03d śataṃ cakṣāṇo akṣabhir devo vaneṣu turvaṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3089: RV_1,128.03f sado dadhāna upareṣu sānuṣv agniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3090: RV_1,128.04a sa sukratuḥ purohito dame-dame 'gnir yajñasyādhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3091: RV_1,128.04d kratvā vedhā iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3092: RV_1,128.04f yato ghṛtaśrīr atithir ajāyata vahnir vedhā ajāyata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3093: RV_1,128.05a kratvā yad asya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate 'gner aveṇa marutāṃ na
GV01rv_hn01u:3095: RV_1,128.05d sa hi ṣmā dānam invati vasūnāṃ ca majmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3096: RV_1,128.05f sa nas trāsate duritād abhihrutaḥ śaṃsād aghād abhihrutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3097: RV_1,128.06a viśvo vihāyā aratir vasur dadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇir na
GV01rv_hn01u:3099: RV_1,128.06d viśvasmā id iṣudhyate devatrā havyam ohiṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3100: RV_1,128.06f viśvasmā it sukṛte vāram ṛṇvaty agnir dvārā vy ṛṇvati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3101: RV_1,128.07a sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamo hito 'gnir yajñeṣu jenyo na viśpatiḥ priyo yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3102: RV_1,128.07d sa havyā mānuṣāṇām iḷā kṛtāni patyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3103: RV_1,128.07f sa nas trāsate varuṇasya dhūrter maho devasya dhūrteḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3104: RV_1,128.08a agniṃ hotāram īḷate vasudhitim priyaṃ cetiṣṭham aratiṃ ny erire havyavāhaṃ ny erire |
GV01rv_hn01u:3105: RV_1,128.08d viśvāyuṃ viśvavedasaṃ hotāraṃ yajataṃ kavim |
GV01rv_hn01u:3106: RV_1,128.08f devāso raṇvam avase vasūyavo gīrbhī raṇvaṃ vasūyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3107: RV_1,129.01a yaṃ tvaṃ ratham indra medhasātaye 'pākā santam iṣira praṇayasi prānavadya nayasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3108: RV_1,129.01d sadyaś cit tam abhiṣṭaye karo vaśaś ca vājinam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3109: RV_1,129.01f sāsmākam anavadya tūtujāna vedhasām imāṃ vācaṃ na vedhasām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3110: RV_1,129.02a sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cid dakṣāyya indra
GV01rv_hn01u:3112: RV_1,129.02d yaḥ śūraiḥ svaḥ sanitā yo viprair vājaṃ tarutā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3113: RV_1,129.02f tam īśānāsa iradhanta vājinam pṛkṣam atyaṃ na vājinam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3114: RV_1,129.03a dasmo hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇam pinvasi tvacaṃ kaṃ cid yāvīr araruṃ śūra martyam parivṛṇakṣi martyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3115: RV_1,129.03d indrota tubhyaṃ tad dive tad rudrāya svayaśase |
GV01rv_hn01u:3116: RV_1,129.03f mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya saprathaḥ sumṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3117: RV_1,129.04a asmākaṃ va indram uśmasīṣṭaye sakhāyaṃ viśvāyum prāsahaṃ yujaṃ vājeṣu prāsahaṃ yujam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3118: RV_1,129.04d asmākam brahmotaye 'vā pṛtsuṣu kāsu cit |
GV01rv_hn01u:3119: RV_1,129.04f nahi tvā śatru starate stṛṇoṣi yaṃ viśvaṃ śatruṃ stṛṇoṣi yam
GV01rv_hn01u:3120: RV_1,129.05a ni ṣū namātimatiṃ kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhir araṇibhir notibhir ugrābhir ugrotibhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3121: RV_1,129.05d neṣi ṇo yathā purānenāḥ śūra manyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:3122: RV_1,129.05f viśvāni pūror apa parṣi vahnir āsā vahnir no accha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3123: RV_1,129.06a pra tad voceyam bhavyāyendave havyo na ya iṣavān manma rejati rakṣohā manma rejati
GV01rv_hn01u:3124: RV_1,129.06d svayaṃ so asmad ā nido vadhair ajeta durmatim |
GV01rv_hn01u:3125: RV_1,129.06f ava sraved aghaśaṃso 'vataram ava kṣudram iva sravet ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3126: RV_1,129.07a vanema tad dhotrayā citantyā vanema rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīryaṃ raṇvaṃ santaṃ suvīryam
GV01rv_hn01u:3127: RV_1,129.07d durmanmānaṃ sumantubhir em iṣā pṛcīmahi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3128: RV_1,129.07f ā satyābhir indraṃ dyumnahūtibhir yajatraṃ dyumnahūtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3129: RV_1,129.08a pra-prā vo asme svayaśobhir ūtī parivarga indro durmatīnāṃ darīman durmatīnām
GV01rv_hn01u:3130: RV_1,129.08d svayaṃ sā riṣayadhyai yā na upeṣe atraiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3131: RV_1,129.08f hatem asan na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇir na vakṣati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3132: RV_1,129.09a tvaṃ na indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi pathāṃ anehasā puro yāhy arakṣasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3133: RV_1,129.09d sacasva naḥ parāka ā sacasvāstamīka ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3134: RV_1,129.09f pāhi no dūrād ārād abhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhy abhiṣṭibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3135: RV_1,129.10a tvaṃ na indra rāyā tarūṣasograṃ cit tvā mahimā sakṣad avase mahe mitraṃ nāvase
GV01rv_hn01u:3136: RV_1,129.10d ojiṣṭha trātar avitā rathaṃ kaṃ cid amartya |
GV01rv_hn01u:3137: RV_1,129.10f anyam asmad ririṣeḥ kaṃ cid adrivo ririkṣantaṃ cid adrivaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3138: RV_1,129.11a pāhi na indra suṣṭuta sridho 'vayātā sadam id durmatīnāṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3140: RV_1,129.11d hantā pāpasya rakṣasas trātā viprasya māvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3141: RV_1,129.11f adhā hi tvā janitā jījanad vaso rakṣohaṇaṃ tvā jījanad vaso
GV01rv_hn01u:3142: RV_1,130.01a endra yāhy upa naḥ parāvato nāyam acchā vidathānīva satpatir
GV01rv_hn01u:3144: RV_1,130.01d havāmahe tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ sute sacā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3145: RV_1,130.01f putrāso na pitaraṃ vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vājasātaye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3146: RV_1,130.02a pibā somam indra suvānam adribhiḥ kośena siktam avataṃ na
GV01rv_hn01u:3148: RV_1,130.02d madāya haryatāya te tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:3149: RV_1,130.02f ā tvā yacchantu harito na sūryam ahā viśveva sūryam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3150: RV_1,130.03a avindad divo nihitaṃ guhā nidhiṃ ver na garbham parivītam
GV01rv_hn01u:3152: RV_1,130.03d vrajaṃ vajrī gavām iva siṣāsann aṅgirastamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3153: RV_1,130.03f apāvṛṇod iṣa indraḥ parīvṛtā dvāra iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3154: RV_1,130.04a dādṛhāṇo vajram indro gabhastyoḥ kṣadmeva tigmam asanāya saṃ śyad ahihatyāya saṃ śyat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3155: RV_1,130.04d saṃvivyāna ojasā śavobhir indra majmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3156: RV_1,130.04f taṣṭeva vṛkṣaṃ vanino ni vṛścasi paraśveva ni vṛścasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3157: RV_1,130.05a tvaṃ vṛthā nadya indra sartave 'cchā samudram asṛjo rathāṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3159: RV_1,130.05d ita ūtīr ayuñjata samānam artham akṣitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3160: RV_1,130.05f dhenūr iva manave viśvadohaso janāya viśvadohasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3161: RV_1,130.06a imāṃ te vācaṃ vasūyanta āyavo rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā
GV01rv_hn01u:3163: RV_1,130.06d śumbhanto jenyaṃ yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3164: RV_1,130.06f atyam iva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3165: RV_1,130.07a bhinat puro navatim indra pūrave divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto
GV01rv_hn01u:3167: RV_1,130.07d atithigvāya śambaraṃ girer ugro avābharat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3168: RV_1,130.07f maho dhanāni dayamāna ojasā viśvā dhanāny ojasā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3169: RV_1,130.08a indraḥ samatsu yajamānam āryam prāvad viśveṣu śatamūtir ājiṣu svarmīḷheṣv ājiṣu |
GV01rv_hn01u:3170: RV_1,130.08d manave śāsad avratān tvacaṃ kṛṣṇām arandhayat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3171: RV_1,130.08f dakṣan na viśvaṃ tatṛṣāṇam oṣati ny arśasānam oṣati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3172: RV_1,130.09a sūraś cakram pra vṛhaj jāta ojasā prapitve vācam aruṇo
GV01rv_hn01u:3174: RV_1,130.09d uśanā yat parāvato 'jagann ūtaye kave |
GV01rv_hn01u:3175: RV_1,130.09f sumnāni viśvā manuṣeva turvaṇir ahā viśveva turvaṇiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3176: RV_1,130.10a sa no navyebhir vṛṣakarmann ukthaiḥ purāṃ dartaḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3177: RV_1,130.10b divodāsebhir indra stavāno vāvṛdhīthā ahobhir iva dyauḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3178: RV_1,131.01a indrāya hi dyaur asuro anamnatendrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhir dyumnasātā varīmabhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3179: RV_1,131.01d indraṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dadhire puraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3180: RV_1,131.01f indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3181: RV_1,131.02a viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekaṃ vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svaḥ saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak |
GV01rv_hn01u:3182: RV_1,131.02d taṃ tvā nāvaṃ na parṣaṇiṃ śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3183: RV_1,131.02f indraṃ na yajñaiś citayanta āyava stomebhir indram āyavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3184: RV_1,131.03a vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3185: RV_1,131.03d yad gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3186: RV_1,131.03f āviṣ karikrad vṛṣaṇaṃ sacābhuvaṃ vajram indra sacābhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3187: RV_1,131.04a viduṣ ṭe asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puro yad indra śāradīr
GV01rv_hn01u:3189: RV_1,131.04d śāsas tam indra martyam ayajyuṃ śavasas pate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3190: RV_1,131.04f mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imā apo mandasāna imā apaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3191: RV_1,131.05a ād it te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣann uśijo yad āvitha sakhīyato yad āvitha |
GV01rv_hn01u:3192: RV_1,131.05d cakartha kāram ebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantave |
GV01rv_hn01u:3193: RV_1,131.05f te anyām-anyāṃ nadyaṃ saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3194: RV_1,131.06a uto no asyā uṣaso juṣeta hy arkasya bodhi haviṣo havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3195: RV_1,131.06d yad indra hantave mṛdho vṛṣā vajriñ ciketasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3196: RV_1,131.06f ā me asya vedhaso navīyaso manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3197: RV_1,131.07a tvaṃ tam indra vāvṛdhāno asmayur amitrayantaṃ tuvijāta martyaṃ vajreṇa śūra martyam
GV01rv_hn01u:3198: RV_1,131.07d jahi yo no aghāyati śṛṇuṣva suśravastamaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3199: RV_1,131.07f riṣṭaṃ na yāmann apa bhūtu durmatir viśvāpa bhūtu durmatiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3200: RV_1,132.01a tvayā vayam maghavan pūrvye dhana indratvotāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3201: RV_1,132.01d nediṣṭhe asminn ahany adhi vocā nu sunvate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3202: RV_1,132.01f asmin yajñe vi cayemā bhare kṛtaṃ vājayanto bhare kṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3203: RV_1,132.02a svarjeṣe bhara āprasya vakmany uṣarbudhaḥ svasminn añjasi krāṇasya svasminn añjasi
GV01rv_hn01u:3204: RV_1,132.02d ahann indro yathā vide śīrṣṇā-śīrṣṇopavācyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3205: RV_1,132.02f asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayo bhadrā bhadrasya rātayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3206: RV_1,132.03a tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanaṃ yasmin yajñe vāram
GV01rv_hn01u:3207: akṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya vār asi kṣayam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3208: RV_1,132.03d vi tad vocer adha dvitāntaḥ paśyanti raśmibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3209: RV_1,132.03f sa ghā vide anv indro gaveṣaṇo bandhukṣidbhyo gaveṣaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3210: RV_1,132.04a nū itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyaṃ yad aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apa vrajam indra śikṣann apa vrajam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3211: RV_1,132.04d aibhyaḥ samānyā diśāsmabhyaṃ jeṣi yotsi ca |
GV01rv_hn01u:3212: RV_1,132.04f sunvadbhyo randhayā kaṃ cid avrataṃ hṛṇāyantaṃ cid avratam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3213: RV_1,132.05a saṃ yaj janān kratubhiḥ śūra īkṣayad dhane hite taruṣanta
GV01rv_hn01u:3215: RV_1,132.05d tasmā āyuḥ prajāvad id bādhe arcanty ojasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3216: RV_1,132.05f indra okyaṃ didhiṣanta dhītayo devāṃ acchā na dhītayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3217: RV_1,132.06a yuvaṃ tam indrāparvatā puroyudhā yo naḥ pṛtanyād apa taṃ-tam
GV01rv_hn01u:3218: id dhataṃ vajreṇa taṃ-tam id dhatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3219: RV_1,132.06d dūre cattāya cchantsad gahanaṃ yad inakṣat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3220: RV_1,132.06f asmākaṃ śatrūn pari śūra viśvato darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3221: RV_1,133.01a ubhe punāmi rodasī ṛtena druho dahāmi sam mahīr anindrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3222: RV_1,133.01c abhivlagya yatra hatā amitrā vailasthānam pari tṛḷhā aśeran ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3223: RV_1,133.02a abhivlagyā cid adrivaḥ śīrṣā yātumatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3224: RV_1,133.02c chindhi vaṭūriṇā padā mahāvaṭūriṇā padā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3225: RV_1,133.03a avāsām maghavañ jahi śardho yātumatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3228: RV_1,133.04c tat su te manāyati takat su te manāyati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3229: RV_1,133.05a piśaṅgabhṛṣṭim ambhṛṇam piśācim indra sam mṛṇa |
GV01rv_hn01u:3231: RV_1,133.06a avar maha indra dādṛhi śrudhī naḥ śuśoca hi dyauḥ kṣā na bhīṣāṃ adrivo ghṛṇān na bhīṣāṃ adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3232: RV_1,133.06d śuṣmintamo hi śuṣmibhir vadhair ugrebhir īyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:3233: RV_1,133.06f apūruṣaghno apratīta śūra satvabhis trisaptaiḥ śūra satvabhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3234: RV_1,133.07a vanoti hi sunvan kṣayam parīṇasaḥ sunvāno hi ṣmā yajaty ava dviṣo devānām ava dviṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3235: RV_1,133.07d sunvāna it siṣāsati sahasrā vājy avṛtaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3236: RV_1,133.07f sunvānāyendro dadāty ābhuvaṃ rayiṃ dadāty ābhuvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3237: RV_1,134.01a ā tvā juvo rārahāṇā abhi prayo vāyo vahantv iha pūrvapītaye somasya pūrvapītaye
GV01rv_hn01u:3238: RV_1,134.01d ūrdhvā te anu sūnṛtā manas tiṣṭhatu jānatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:3239: RV_1,134.01f niyutvatā rathenā yāhi dāvane vāyo makhasya dāvane ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3240: RV_1,134.02a mandantu tvā mandino vāyav indavo 'smat krāṇāsaḥ sukṛtā abhidyavo gobhiḥ krāṇā abhidyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3241: RV_1,134.02d yad dha krāṇā iradhyai dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3242: RV_1,134.02f sadhrīcīnā niyuto dāvane dhiya upa bruvata īṃ dhiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3243: RV_1,134.03a vāyur yuṅkte rohitā vāyur aruṇā vāyū rathe ajirā dhuri
GV01rv_hn01u:3245: RV_1,134.03d pra bodhayā purandhiṃ jāra ā sasatīm iva |
GV01rv_hn01u:3246: RV_1,134.03f pra cakṣaya rodasī vāsayoṣasaḥ śravase vāsayoṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3247: RV_1,134.04a tubhyam uṣāsaḥ śucayaḥ parāvati bhadrā vastrā tanvate daṃsu raśmiṣu citrā navyeṣu raśmiṣu |
GV01rv_hn01u:3248: RV_1,134.04d tubhyaṃ dhenuḥ sabardughā viśvā vasūni dohate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3249: RV_1,134.04f ajanayo maruto vakṣaṇābhyo diva ā vakṣaṇābhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3250: RV_1,134.05a tubhyaṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayas turaṇyavo madeṣūgrā iṣaṇanta
GV01rv_hn01u:3252: RV_1,134.05d tvāṃ tsārī dasamāno bhagam īṭṭe takvavīye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3253: RV_1,134.05f tvaṃ viśvasmād bhuvanāt pāsi dharmaṇāsuryāt pāsi dharmaṇā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3254: RV_1,134.06a tvaṃ no vāyav eṣām apūrvyaḥ somānām prathamaḥ pītim arhasi
GV01rv_hn01u:3257: RV_1,134.06f viśvā it te dhenavo duhra āśiraṃ ghṛtaṃ duhrata āśiram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3258: RV_1,135.01a stīrṇam barhir upa no yāhi vītaye sahasreṇa niyutā niyutvate
GV01rv_hn01u:3260: RV_1,135.01d tubhyaṃ hi pūrvapītaye devā devāya yemire |
GV01rv_hn01u:3261: RV_1,135.01f pra te sutāso madhumanto asthiran madāya kratve asthiran ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3262: RV_1,135.02a tubhyāyaṃ somaḥ paripūto adribhi spārhā vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati śukrā vasāno arṣati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3263: RV_1,135.02d tavāyam bhāga āyuṣu somo deveṣu hūyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3264: RV_1,135.02f vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy asmayur juṣāṇo yāhy asmayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3265: RV_1,135.03a ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3266: RV_1,135.03d tavāyam bhāga ṛtviyaḥ saraśmiḥ sūrye sacā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3267: RV_1,135.03f adhvaryubhir bharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3268: RV_1,135.04a ā vāṃ ratho niyutvān vakṣad avase 'bhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3269: RV_1,135.04d pibatam madhvo andhasaḥ pūrvapeyaṃ hi vāṃ hitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3270: RV_1,135.04f vāyav ā candreṇa rādhasā gatam indraś ca rādhasā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3271: RV_1,135.05a ā vāṃ dhiyo vavṛtyur adhvarāṃ upemam indum marmṛjanta vājinam
GV01rv_hn01u:3273: RV_1,135.05d teṣām pibatam asmayū ā no gantam ihotyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3274: RV_1,135.05f indravāyū sutānām adribhir yuvam madāya vājadā yuvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3275: RV_1,135.06a ime vāṃ somā apsv ā sutā ihādhvaryubhir bharamāṇā ayaṃsata
GV01rv_hn01u:3277: RV_1,135.06d ete vām abhy asṛkṣata tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3278: RV_1,135.06f yuvāyavo 'ti romāṇy avyayā somāso aty avyayā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3279: RV_1,135.07a ati vāyo sasato yāhi śaśvato yatra grāvā vadati tatra
GV01rv_hn01u:3281: RV_1,135.07d vi sūnṛtā dadṛśe rīyate ghṛtam ā pūrṇayā niyutā yātho
GV01rv_hn01u:3283: RV_1,135.08a atrāha tad vahethe madhva āhutiṃ yam aśvattham upatiṣṭhanta jāyavo 'sme te santu jāyavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3284: RV_1,135.08d sākaṃ gāvaḥ suvate pacyate yavo na te vāya upa dasyanti dhenavo nāpa dasyanti dhenavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3285: RV_1,135.09a ime ye te su vāyo bāhvojaso 'ntar nadī te patayanty ukṣaṇo mahi vrādhanta ukṣaṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3286: RV_1,135.09d dhanvañ cid ye anāśavo jīrāś cid agiraukasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3287: RV_1,135.09f sūryasyeva raśmayo durniyantavo hastayor durniyantavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3288: RV_1,136.01a pra su jyeṣṭhaṃ nicirābhyām bṛhan namo havyam matim bharatā
GV01rv_hn01u:3290: RV_1,136.01d tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī yajñe-yajña upastutā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3291: RV_1,136.01f athainoḥ kṣatraṃ na kutaś canādhṛṣe devatvaṃ nū cid ādhṛṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3292: RV_1,136.02a adarśi gātur urave varīyasī panthā ṛtasya sam ayaṃsta raśmibhiś cakṣur bhagasya raśmibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3293: RV_1,136.02d dyukṣam mitrasya sādanam aryamṇo varuṇasya ca |
GV01rv_hn01u:3294: RV_1,136.02f athā dadhāte bṛhad ukthyaṃ vaya upastutyam bṛhad vayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3295: RV_1,136.03a jyotiṣmatīm aditiṃ dhārayatkṣitiṃ svarvatīm ā sacete
GV01rv_hn01u:3297: RV_1,136.03d jyotiṣmat kṣatram āśāte ādityā dānunas patī |
GV01rv_hn01u:3298: RV_1,136.03f mitras tayor varuṇo yātayajjano 'ryamā yātayajjanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3299: RV_1,136.04a ayam mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ somo bhūtv avapāneṣv ābhago devo deveṣv ābhagaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3300: RV_1,136.04d taṃ devāso juṣerata viśve adya sajoṣasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3301: RV_1,136.04f tathā rājānā karatho yad īmaha ṛtāvānā yad īmahe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3302: RV_1,136.05a yo mitrāya varuṇāyāvidhaj jano 'narvāṇaṃ tam pari pāto aṃhaso dāśvāṃsam martam aṃhasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3303: RV_1,136.05d tam aryamābhi rakṣaty ṛjūyantam anu vratam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3304: RV_1,136.05f ukthair ya enoḥ paribhūṣati vrataṃ stomair ābhūṣati vratam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3305: RV_1,136.06a namo dive bṛhate rodasībhyām mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya mīḷhuṣe sumṛḷīkāya mīḷhuṣe
GV01rv_hn01u:3306: RV_1,136.06d indram agnim upa stuhi dyukṣam aryamaṇam bhagam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3307: RV_1,136.06f jyog jīvantaḥ prajayā sacemahi somasyotī sacemahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3308: RV_1,136.07a ūtī devānāṃ vayam indravanto maṃsīmahi svayaśaso marudbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3309: RV_1,136.07c agnir mitro varuṇaḥ śarma yaṃsan tad aśyāma maghavāno vayaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3311: RV_1,137.01a suṣumā yātam adribhir gośrītā matsarā ime somāso matsarā ime
GV01rv_hn01u:3312: RV_1,137.01d ā rājānā divispṛśāsmatrā gantam upa naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3313: RV_1,137.01f ime vām mitrāvaruṇā gavāśiraḥ somāḥ śukrā gavāśiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3314: RV_1,137.02a ima ā yātam indavaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ sutāso dadhyāśiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3315: RV_1,137.02d uta vām uṣaso budhi sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3316: RV_1,137.02f suto mitrāya varuṇāya pītaye cārur ṛtāya pītaye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3317: RV_1,137.03a tāṃ vāṃ dhenuṃ na vāsarīm aṃśuṃ duhanty adribhiḥ somaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3319: RV_1,137.03d asmatrā gantam upa no 'rvāñcā somapītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3320: RV_1,137.03f ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ soma ā pītaye sutaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3321: RV_1,138.01a pra-pra pūṣṇas tuvijātasya śasyate mahitvam asya tavaso na tandate stotram asya na tandate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3322: RV_1,138.01d arcāmi sumnayann aham antyūtim mayobhuvam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3323: RV_1,138.01f viśvasya yo mana āyuyuve makho deva āyuyuve makhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3324: RV_1,138.02a pra hi tvā pūṣann ajiraṃ na yāmani stomebhiḥ kṛṇva ṛṇavo yathā mṛdha uṣṭro na pīparo mṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3325: RV_1,138.02d huve yat tvā mayobhuvaṃ devaṃ sakhyāya martyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3326: RV_1,138.02f asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninas kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninas kṛdhi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3327: RV_1,138.03a yasya te pūṣan sakhye vipanyavaḥ kratvā cit santo 'vasā
GV01rv_hn01u:3329: RV_1,138.03d tām anu tvā navīyasīṃ niyutaṃ rāya īmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3330: RV_1,138.03f aheḷamāna uruśaṃsa sarī bhava vāje-vāje sarī bhava ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3331: RV_1,138.04a asyā ū ṣu ṇa upa sātaye bhuvo 'heḷamāno rarivāṃ ajāśva śravasyatām ajāśva
GV01rv_hn01u:3332: RV_1,138.04d o ṣu tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhir dasma sādhubhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3333: RV_1,138.04f nahi tvā pūṣann atimanya āghṛṇe na te sakhyam apahnuve ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3334: RV_1,139.01a astu śrauṣaṭ puro agnīṃ dhiyā dadha ā nu tac chardho divyaṃ vṛṇīmaha indravāyū vṛṇīmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3335: RV_1,139.01d yad dha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī |
GV01rv_hn01u:3336: RV_1,139.01f adha pra sū na upa yantu dhītayo devāṃ acchā na dhītayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3337: RV_1,139.02a yad dha tyan mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtād adhy ādadāthe anṛtaṃ svena
GV01rv_hn01u:3339: RV_1,139.02d yuvor itthādhi sadmasv apaśyāma hiraṇyayam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3340: RV_1,139.02f dhībhiś cana manasā svebhir akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhir akṣabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3341: RV_1,139.03a yuvāṃ stomebhir devayanto aśvināśrāvayanta iva ślokam āyavo yuvāṃ havyābhy āyavaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3342: RV_1,139.03d yuvor viśvā adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaś ca viśvavedasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3343: RV_1,139.03f pruṣāyante vām pavayo hiraṇyaye rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3344: RV_1,139.04a aceti dasrā vy u nākam ṛṇvatho yuñjate vāṃ rathayujo
GV01rv_hn01u:3346: RV_1,139.04d adhi vāṃ sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3347: RV_1,139.04f patheva yantāv anuśāsatā rajo 'ñjasā śāsatā rajaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3348: RV_1,139.05a śacībhir naḥ śacīvasū divā naktaṃ daśasyatam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3349: RV_1,139.05c mā vāṃ rātir upa dasat kadā canāsmad rātiḥ kadā cana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3350: RV_1,139.06a vṛṣann indra vṛṣapāṇāsa indava ime sutā adriṣutāsa udbhidas tubhyaṃ sutāsa udbhidaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3351: RV_1,139.06d te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase |
GV01rv_hn01u:3352: RV_1,139.06f gīrbhir girvāha stavamāna ā gahi sumṛḷīko na ā gahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3353: RV_1,139.07a o ṣū ṇo agne śṛṇuhi tvam īḷito devebhyo bravasi yajñiyebhyo rājabhyo yajñiyebhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3354: RV_1,139.07d yad dha tyām aṅgirobhyo dhenuṃ devā adattana |
GV01rv_hn01u:3355: RV_1,139.07f vi tāṃ duhre aryamā kartarī sacāṃ eṣa tāṃ veda me sacā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3356: RV_1,139.08a mo ṣu vo asmad abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mota jāriṣur asmat purota jāriṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3357: RV_1,139.08d yad vaś citraṃ yuge-yuge navyaṃ ghoṣād amartyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3358: RV_1,139.08f asmāsu tan maruto yac ca duṣṭaraṃ didhṛtā yac ca duṣṭaram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3359: RV_1,139.09a dadhyaṅ ha me januṣam pūrvo aṅgirāḥ priyamedhaḥ kaṇvo atrir
GV01rv_hn01u:3360: manur vidus te me pūrve manur viduḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3361: RV_1,139.09d teṣāṃ deveṣv āyatir asmākaṃ teṣu nābhayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3362: RV_1,139.09f teṣām padena mahy ā name girendrāgnī ā name girā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3363: RV_1,139.10a hotā yakṣad vanino vanta vāryam bṛhaspatir yajati vena ukṣabhiḥ puruvārebhir ukṣabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3364: RV_1,139.10d jagṛbhmā dūraādiśaṃ ślokam adrer adha tmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3365: RV_1,139.10f adhārayad ararindāni sukratuḥ purū sadmāni sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3366: RV_1,139.11a ye devāso divy ekādaśa stha pṛthivyām adhy ekādaśa stha |
GV01rv_hn01u:3367: RV_1,139.11c apsukṣito mahinaikādaśa stha te devāso yajñam imaṃ juṣadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3368: RV_1,140.01a vediṣade priyadhāmāya sudyute dhāsim iva pra bharā yonim agnaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3369: RV_1,140.01c vastreṇeva vāsayā manmanā śuciṃ jyotīrathaṃ śukravarṇaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3371: RV_1,140.02a abhi dvijanmā trivṛd annam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe jagdham ī punaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3372: RV_1,140.02c anyasyāsā jihvayā jenyo vṛṣā ny anyena vanino mṛṣṭa vāraṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3373: RV_1,140.03a kṛṣṇaprutau vevije asya sakṣitā ubhā tarete abhi mātarā śiśum
GV01rv_hn01u:3374: RV_1,140.03c prācājihvaṃ dhvasayantaṃ tṛṣucyutam ā sācyaṃ kupayaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3376: RV_1,140.04a mumukṣvo manave mānavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇasītāsa ū juvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3377: RV_1,140.04c asamanā ajirāso raghuṣyado vātajūtā upa yujyanta āśavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3378: RV_1,140.05a ād asya te dhvasayanto vṛtherate kṛṣṇam abhvam mahi varpaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3380: RV_1,140.05c yat sīm mahīm avanim prābhi marmṛśad abhiśvasan stanayann eti
GV01rv_hn01u:3382: RV_1,140.06a bhūṣan na yo 'dhi babhrūṣu namnate vṛṣeva patnīr abhy eti
GV01rv_hn01u:3384: RV_1,140.06c ojāyamānas tanvaś ca śumbhate bhīmo na śṛṅgā davidhāva durgṛbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3385: RV_1,140.07a sa saṃstiro viṣṭiraḥ saṃ gṛbhāyati jānann eva jānatīr nitya ā śaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3386: RV_1,140.07c punar vardhante api yanti devyam anyad varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate
GV01rv_hn01u:3388: RV_1,140.08a tam agruvaḥ keśinīḥ saṃ hi rebhira ūrdhvās tasthur mamruṣīḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3390: RV_1,140.08c tāsāṃ jarām pramuñcann eti nānadad asum paraṃ janayañ jīvam
GV01rv_hn01u:3392: RV_1,140.09a adhīvāsam pari mātū rihann aha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhir yāti vi
GV01rv_hn01u:3394: RV_1,140.09c vayo dadhat padvate rerihat sadānu śyenī sacate vartanīr aha
GV01rv_hn01u:3395: RV_1,140.10a asmākam agne maghavatsu dīdihy adha śvasīvān vṛṣabho damūnāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3396: RV_1,140.10c avāsyā śiśumatīr adīder varmeva yutsu parijarbhurāṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3397: RV_1,140.11a idam agne sudhitaṃ durdhitād adhi priyād u cin manmanaḥ preyo astu te |
GV01rv_hn01u:3398: RV_1,140.11c yat te śukraṃ tanvo rocate śuci tenāsmabhyaṃ vanase ratnam ā tvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3399: RV_1,140.12a rathāya nāvam uta no gṛhāya nityāritrām padvatīṃ rāsy agne |
GV01rv_hn01u:3400: RV_1,140.12c asmākaṃ vīrāṃ uta no maghono janāṃś ca yā pārayāc charma yā ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3401: RV_1,140.13a abhī no agna uktham ij juguryā dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaś ca
GV01rv_hn01u:3403: RV_1,140.13c gavyaṃ yavyaṃ yanto dīrghāheṣaṃ varam aruṇyo varanta ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3404: RV_1,141.01a baḷ itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśataṃ devasya bhargaḥ sahaso
GV01rv_hn01u:3406: RV_1,141.01c yad īm upa hvarate sādhate matir ṛtasya dhenā anayanta
GV01rv_hn01u:3408: RV_1,141.02a pṛkṣo vapuḥ pitumān nitya ā śaye dvitīyam ā saptaśivāsu
GV01rv_hn01u:3410: RV_1,141.02c tṛtīyam asya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatiṃ janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3411: RV_1,141.03a nir yad īm budhnān mahiṣasya varpasa īśānāsaḥ śavasā kranta
GV01rv_hn01u:3413: RV_1,141.03c yad īm anu pradivo madhva ādhave guhā santam mātariśvā
GV01rv_hn01u:3415: RV_1,141.04a pra yat pituḥ paramān nīyate pary ā pṛkṣudho vīrudho daṃsu rohati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3416: RV_1,141.04c ubhā yad asya januṣaṃ yad invata ād id yaviṣṭho abhavad ghṛṇā śuciḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3417: RV_1,141.05a ād in mātṝr āviśad yāsv ā śucir ahiṃsyamāna urviyā vi vāvṛdhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3418: RV_1,141.05c anu yat pūrvā aruhat sanājuvo ni navyasīṣv avarāsu dhāvate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3419: RV_1,141.06a ād id dhotāraṃ vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagam iva papṛcānāsa ṛñjate
GV01rv_hn01u:3420: RV_1,141.06c devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭuto martaṃ śaṃsaṃ viśvadhā veti dhāyase ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3421: RV_1,141.07a vi yad asthād yajato vātacodito hvāro na vakvā jaraṇā
GV01rv_hn01u:3423: RV_1,141.07c tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇajaṃhasaḥ śucijanmano raja ā vyadhvanaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3424: RV_1,141.08a ratho na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛto dyām aṅgebhir aruṣebhir īyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3425: RV_1,141.08c ād asya te kṛṣṇāso dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasyeva tveṣathād īṣate
GV01rv_hn01u:3427: RV_1,141.09a tvayā hy agne varuṇo dhṛtavrato mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3428: RV_1,141.09c yat sīm anu kratunā viśvathā vibhur arān na nemiḥ paribhūr ajāyathāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3429: RV_1,141.10a tvam agne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnaṃ yaviṣṭha devatātim invasi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3430: RV_1,141.10c taṃ tvā nu navyaṃ sahaso yuvan vayam bhagaṃ na kāre mahiratna dhīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3431: RV_1,141.11a asme rayiṃ na svarthaṃ damūnasam bhagaṃ dakṣaṃ na papṛcāsi
GV01rv_hn01u:3433: RV_1,141.11c raśmīṃr iva yo yamati janmanī ubhe devānāṃ śaṃsam ṛta ā ca sukratuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3434: RV_1,141.12a uta naḥ sudyotmā jīrāśvo hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavac candrarathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3435: RV_1,141.12c sa no neṣan neṣatamair amūro 'gnir vāmaṃ suvitaṃ vasyo accha
GV01rv_hn01u:3436: RV_1,141.13a astāvy agniḥ śimīvadbhir arkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataraṃ dadhānaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3437: RV_1,141.13c amī ca ye maghavāno vayaṃ ca mihaṃ na sūro ati niṣ ṭatanyuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3438: RV_1,142.01a samiddho agna ā vaha devāṃ adya yatasruce |
GV01rv_hn01u:3439: RV_1,142.01c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ sutasomāya dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3440: RV_1,142.02a ghṛtavantam upa māsi madhumantaṃ tanūnapāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3441: RV_1,142.02c yajñaṃ viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3442: RV_1,142.03a śuciḥ pāvako adbhuto madhvā yajñam mimikṣati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3443: RV_1,142.03c narāśaṃsas trir ā divo devo deveṣu yajñiyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3444: RV_1,142.04a īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3445: RV_1,142.04c iyaṃ hi tvā matir mamācchā sujihva vacyate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3446: RV_1,142.05a stṛṇānāso yatasruco barhir yajñe svadhvare |
GV01rv_hn01u:3447: RV_1,142.05c vṛñje devavyacastamam indrāya śarma saprathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3448: RV_1,142.06a vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyo mahīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3449: RV_1,142.06c pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3450: RV_1,142.07a ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3451: RV_1,142.07c yahvī ṛtasya mātarā sīdatām barhir ā sumat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3452: RV_1,142.08a mandrajihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī |
GV01rv_hn01u:3453: RV_1,142.08c yajñaṃ no yakṣatām imaṃ sidhram adya divispṛśam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3454: RV_1,142.09a śucir deveṣv arpitā hotrā marutsu bhāratī |
GV01rv_hn01u:3455: RV_1,142.09c iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3456: RV_1,142.10a tan nas turīpam adbhutam puru vāram puru tmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3457: RV_1,142.10c tvaṣṭā poṣāya vi ṣyatu rāye nābhā no asmayuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3458: RV_1,142.11a avasṛjann upa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3459: RV_1,142.11c agnir havyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3461: RV_1,142.12c svāhā gāyatravepase havyam indrāya kartana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3462: RV_1,142.13a svāhākṛtāny ā gahy upa havyāni vītaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3463: RV_1,142.13c indrā gahi śrudhī havaṃ tvāṃ havante adhvare ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3464: RV_1,143.01a pra tavyasīṃ navyasīṃ dhītim agnaye vāco matiṃ sahasaḥ sūnave
GV01rv_hn01u:3466: RV_1,143.01c apāṃ napād yo vasubhiḥ saha priyo hotā pṛthivyāṃ ny asīdad ṛtviyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3467: RV_1,143.02a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomany āvir agnir abhavan mātariśvane |
GV01rv_hn01u:3468: RV_1,143.02c asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3469: RV_1,143.03a asya tveṣā ajarā asya bhānavaḥ susaṃdṛśaḥ supratīkasya sudyutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3470: RV_1,143.03c bhātvakṣaso aty aktur na sindhavo 'gne rejante asasanto ajarāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3471: RV_1,143.04a yam erire bhṛgavo viśvavedasaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā bhuvanasya majmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3472: RV_1,143.04c agniṃ taṃ gīrbhir hinuhi sva ā dame ya eko vasvo varuṇo na
GV01rv_hn01u:3474: RV_1,143.05a na yo varāya marutām iva svanaḥ seneva sṛṣṭā divyā yathāśaniḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3475: RV_1,143.05c agnir jambhais tigitair atti bharvati yodho na śatrūn sa vanā ny ṛñjate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3476: RV_1,143.06a kuvin no agnir ucathasya vīr asad vasuṣ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3477: RV_1,143.06c codaḥ kuvit tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śucipratīkaṃ tam ayā dhiyā
GV01rv_hn01u:3479: RV_1,143.07a ghṛtapratīkaṃ va ṛtasya dhūrṣadam agnim mitraṃ na samidhāna ṛñjate |
GV01rv_hn01u:3480: RV_1,143.07c indhāno akro vidatheṣu dīdyac chukravarṇām ud u no yaṃsate
