GV01rv_hn01u:3482: RV_1,143.08a aprayucchann aprayucchadbhir agne śivebhir naḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3483: RV_1,143.08c adabdhebhir adṛpitebhir iṣṭe 'nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi no jāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3484: RV_1,144.01a eti pra hotā vratam asya māyayordhvāṃ dadhānaḥ śucipeśasaṃ dhiyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3485: RV_1,144.01c abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇāvṛto yā asya dhāma prathamaṃ ha
GV01rv_hn01u:3487: RV_1,144.02a abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3488: RV_1,144.02c apām upasthe vibhṛto yad āvasad adha svadhā adhayad yābhir
GV01rv_hn01u:3490: RV_1,144.03a yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tad id vapuḥ samānam arthaṃ vitaritratā mithaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3491: RV_1,144.03c ād īm bhago na havyaḥ sam asmad ā voḷhur na raśmīn sam
GV01rv_hn01u:3493: RV_1,144.04a yam īṃ dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3494: RV_1,144.04c divā na naktam palito yuvājani purū carann ajaro mānuṣā yugā
GV01rv_hn01u:3495: RV_1,144.05a tam īṃ hinvanti dhītayo daśa vriśo devam martāsa ūtaye
GV01rv_hn01u:3497: RV_1,144.05c dhanor adhi pravata ā sa ṛṇvaty abhivrajadbhir vayunā navādhita ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3498: RV_1,144.06a tvaṃ hy agne divyasya rājasi tvam pārthivasya paśupā iva
GV01rv_hn01u:3500: RV_1,144.06c enī ta ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhir āśāte ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3501: RV_1,144.07a agne juṣasva prati harya tad vaco mandra svadhāva ṛtajāta
GV01rv_hn01u:3503: RV_1,144.07c yo viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ asi darśato raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumāṃ iva
GV01rv_hn01u:3505: RV_1,145.01a tam pṛcchatā sa jagāmā sa veda sa cikitvāṃ īyate sā nv īyate
GV01rv_hn01u:3506: RV_1,145.01c tasmin santi praśiṣas tasminn iṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇas patiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3507: RV_1,145.02a tam it pṛcchanti na simo vi pṛcchati sveneva dhīro manasā yad agrabhīt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3508: RV_1,145.02c na mṛṣyate prathamaṃ nāparaṃ vaco 'sya kratvā sacate apradṛpitaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3509: RV_1,145.03a tam id gacchanti juhvas tam arvatīr viśvāny ekaḥ śṛṇavad
GV01rv_hn01u:3511: RV_1,145.03c purupraiṣas taturir yajñasādhano 'cchidrotiḥ śiśur ādatta saṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3513: RV_1,145.04a upasthāyaṃ carati yat samārata sadyo jātas tatsāra yujyebhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3514: RV_1,145.04c abhi śvāntam mṛśate nāndye mude yad īṃ gacchanty uśatīr
GV01rv_hn01u:3516: RV_1,145.05a sa īm mṛgo apyo vanargur upa tvacy upamasyāṃ ni dhāyi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3517: RV_1,145.05c vy abravīd vayunā martyebhyo 'gnir vidvāṃ ṛtacid dhi satyaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3518: RV_1,146.01a trimūrdhānaṃ saptaraśmiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nūnam agnim pitror upasthe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3519: RV_1,146.01c niṣattam asya carato dhruvasya viśvā divo rocanāpaprivāṃsam
GV01rv_hn01u:3520: RV_1,146.02a ukṣā mahāṃ abhi vavakṣa ene ajaras tasthāv itaūtir ṛṣvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3521: RV_1,146.02c urvyāḥ pado ni dadhāti sānau rihanty ūdho aruṣāso asya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3522: RV_1,146.03a samānaṃ vatsam abhi saṃcarantī viṣvag dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke
GV01rv_hn01u:3523: RV_1,146.03c anapavṛjyāṃ adhvano mimāne viśvān ketāṃ adhi maho dadhāne ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3524: RV_1,146.04a dhīrāsaḥ padaṃ kavayo nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇā ajuryam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3525: RV_1,146.04c siṣāsantaḥ pary apaśyanta sindhum āvir ebhyo abhavat sūryo nṝn ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3526: RV_1,146.05a didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenya īḷenyo maho arbhāya jīvase |
GV01rv_hn01u:3527: RV_1,146.05c purutrā yad abhavat sūr ahaibhyo garbhebhyo maghavā viśvadarśataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3528: RV_1,147.01a kathā te agne śucayanta āyor dadāśur vājebhir āśuṣāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3529: RV_1,147.01c ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānā ṛtasya sāman raṇayanta devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3530: RV_1,147.02a bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3531: RV_1,147.02c pīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇāti vandārus te tanvaṃ vande agne ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3532: RV_1,147.03a ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan |
GV01rv_hn01u:3533: RV_1,147.03c rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3534: RV_1,147.04a yo no agne ararivāṃ aghāyur arātīvā marcayati dvayena |
GV01rv_hn01u:3535: RV_1,147.04c mantro guruḥ punar astu so asmā anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvaṃ duruktaiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3536: RV_1,147.05a uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān marto martam marcayati dvayena |
GV01rv_hn01u:3537: RV_1,147.05c ataḥ pāhi stavamāna stuvantam agne mākir no duritāya dhāyīḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3538: RV_1,148.01a mathīd yad īṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3539: RV_1,148.01c ni yaṃ dadhur manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar ṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam
GV01rv_hn01u:3540: RV_1,148.02a dadānam in na dadabhanta manmāgnir varūtham mama tasya cākan
GV01rv_hn01u:3541: RV_1,148.02c juṣanta viśvāny asya karmopastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3542: RV_1,148.03a nitye cin nu yaṃ sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhir dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3543: RV_1,148.03c pra sū nayanta gṛbhayanta iṣṭāv aśvāso na rathyo rārahāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3544: RV_1,148.04a purūṇi dasmo ni riṇāti jambhair ād rocate vana ā vibhāvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3545: RV_1,148.04c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir astur na śaryām asanām anu dyūn
GV01rv_hn01u:3546: RV_1,148.05a na yaṃ ripavo na riṣaṇyavo garbhe santaṃ reṣaṇā reṣayanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3547: RV_1,148.05c andhā apaśyā na dabhann abhikhyā nityāsa īm pretāro arakṣan
GV01rv_hn01u:3548: RV_1,149.01a mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate patir dann ina inasya vasunaḥ pada ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3549: RV_1,149.01c upa dhrajantam adrayo vidhann it ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3550: RV_1,149.02a sa yo vṛṣā narāṃ na rodasyoḥ śravobhir asti jīvapītasargaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3551: RV_1,149.02c pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3552: RV_1,149.03a ā yaḥ puraṃ nārmiṇīm adīded atyaḥ kavir nabhanyo nārvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3554: RV_1,149.04a abhi dvijanmā trī rocanāni viśvā rajāṃsi śuśucāno asthāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3556: RV_1,149.05a ayaṃ sa hotā yo dvijanmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3557: RV_1,149.05c marto yo asmai sutuko dadāśa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3558: RV_1,150.01a puru tvā dāśvān voce 'rir agne tava svid ā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3560: RV_1,150.02a vy aninasya dhaninaḥ prahoṣe cid araruṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3562: RV_1,150.03a sa candro vipra martyo maho vrādhantamo divi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3563: RV_1,150.03c pra-pret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3564: RV_1,151.01a mitraṃ na yaṃ śimyā goṣu gavyavaḥ svādhyo vidathe apsu
GV01rv_hn01u:3566: RV_1,151.01c arejetāṃ rodasī pājasā girā prati priyaṃ yajataṃ januṣām avaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3567: RV_1,151.02a yad dha tyad vām purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāso na dadhire svābhuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3568: RV_1,151.02c adha kratuṃ vidataṃ gātum arcata uta śrutaṃ vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3569: RV_1,151.03a ā vām bhūṣan kṣitayo janma rodasyoḥ pravācyaṃ vṛṣaṇā dakṣase
GV01rv_hn01u:3571: RV_1,151.03c yad īm ṛtāya bharatho yad arvate pra hotrayā śimyā vītho adhvaram ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3572: RV_1,151.04a pra sā kṣitir asura yā mahi priya ṛtāvānāv ṛtam ā ghoṣatho bṛhat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3573: RV_1,151.04c yuvaṃ divo bṛhato dakṣam ābhuvaṃ gāṃ na dhury upa yuñjāthe apaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3574: RV_1,151.05a mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvatho 'reṇavas tuja ā sadman
GV01rv_hn01u:3576: RV_1,151.05c svaranti tā uparatāti sūryam ā nimruca uṣasas takvavīr iva ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3577: RV_1,151.06a ā vām ṛtāya keśinīr anūṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātum arcathaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3578: RV_1,151.06c ava tmanā sṛjatam pinvataṃ dhiyo yuvaṃ viprasya manmanām irajyathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3579: RV_1,151.07a yo vāṃ yajñaiḥ śaśamāno ha dāśati kavir hotā yajati
GV01rv_hn01u:3581: RV_1,151.07c upāha taṃ gacchatho vītho adhvaram acchā giraḥ sumatiṃ gantam
GV01rv_hn01u:3583: RV_1,151.08a yuvāṃ yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhir añjata ṛtāvānā manaso na prayuktiṣu |
GV01rv_hn01u:3584: RV_1,151.08c bharanti vām manmanā saṃyatā giro 'dṛpyatā manasā revad āśāthe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3585: RV_1,151.09a revad vayo dadhāthe revad āśāthe narā māyābhir itaūti māhinam
GV01rv_hn01u:3586: RV_1,151.09c na vāṃ dyāvo 'habhir nota sindhavo na devatvam paṇayo nānaśur
GV01rv_hn01u:3588: RV_1,152.01a yuvaṃ vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe yuvor acchidrā mantavo ha sargāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3589: RV_1,152.01c avātiratam anṛtāni viśva ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3590: RV_1,152.02a etac cana tvo vi ciketad eṣāṃ satyo mantraḥ kaviśasta ṛghāvān
GV01rv_hn01u:3591: RV_1,152.02c triraśriṃ hanti caturaśrir ugro devanido ha prathamā ajūryan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3592: RV_1,152.03a apād eti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kas tad vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa |
GV01rv_hn01u:3593: RV_1,152.03c garbho bhāram bharaty ā cid asya ṛtam piparty anṛtaṃ ni tārīt ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3594: RV_1,152.04a prayantam it pari jāraṃ kanīnām paśyāmasi nopanipadyamānam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3595: RV_1,152.04c anavapṛgṇā vitatā vasānam priyam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3596: RV_1,152.05a anaśvo jāto anabhīśur arvā kanikradat patayad ūrdhvasānuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3597: RV_1,152.05c acittam brahma jujuṣur yuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇe gṛṇantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3598: RV_1,152.06a ā dhenavo māmateyam avantīr brahmapriyam pīpayan sasminn ūdhan |
GV01rv_hn01u:3599: RV_1,152.06c pitvo bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvān āsāvivāsann aditim uruṣyet ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3600: RV_1,152.07a ā vām mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ namasā devāv avasā vavṛtyām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3601: RV_1,152.07c asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu sahyā asmākaṃ vṛṣṭir divyā supārā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3602: RV_1,153.01a yajāmahe vām mahaḥ sajoṣā havyebhir mitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3603: RV_1,153.01c ghṛtair ghṛtasnū adha yad vām asme adhvaryavo na dhītibhir
GV01rv_hn01u:3605: RV_1,153.02a prastutir vāṃ dhāma na prayuktir ayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3606: RV_1,153.02c anakti yad vāṃ vidatheṣu hotā sumnaṃ vāṃ sūrir vṛṣaṇāv
GV01rv_hn01u:3608: RV_1,153.03a pīpāya dhenur aditir ṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā havirde |
GV01rv_hn01u:3609: RV_1,153.03c hinoti yad vāṃ vidathe saparyan sa rātahavyo mānuṣo na hotā
GV01rv_hn01u:3610: RV_1,153.04a uta vāṃ vikṣu madyāsv andho gāva āpaś ca pīpayanta devīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3611: RV_1,153.04c uto no asya pūrvyaḥ patir dan vītam pātam payasa usriyāyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3612: RV_1,154.01a viṣṇor nu kaṃ vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi
GV01rv_hn01u:3613: RV_1,154.01c yo askabhāyad uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇas tredhorugāyaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3614: RV_1,154.02a pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryeṇa mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3615: RV_1,154.02c yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣv adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3616: RV_1,154.03a pra viṣṇave śūṣam etu manma girikṣita urugāyāya vṛṣṇe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3617: RV_1,154.03c ya idaṃ dīrgham prayataṃ sadhastham eko vimame tribhir it
GV01rv_hn01u:3619: RV_1,154.04a yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padāny akṣīyamāṇā svadhayā madanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3620: RV_1,154.04c ya u tridhātu pṛthivīm uta dyām eko dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_hn01u:3621: RV_1,154.05a tad asya priyam abhi pātho aśyāṃ naro yatra devayavo madanti
GV01rv_hn01u:3622: RV_1,154.05c urukramasya sa hi bandhur itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva
GV01rv_hn01u:3624: RV_1,154.06a tā vāṃ vāstūny uśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūriśṛṅgā ayāsaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3625: RV_1,154.06c atrāha tad urugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramam padam ava bhāti bhūri ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3626: RV_1,155.01a pra vaḥ pāntam andhaso dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave cārcata
GV01rv_hn01u:3627: RV_1,155.01c yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā mahas tasthatur arvateva sādhunā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3628: RV_1,155.02a tveṣam itthā samaraṇaṃ śimīvator indrāviṣṇū sutapā vām uruṣyati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3629: RV_1,155.02c yā martyāya pratidhīyamānam it kṛśānor astur asanām uruṣyathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3630: RV_1,155.03a tā īṃ vardhanti mahy asya pauṃsyaṃ ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje |
GV01rv_hn01u:3631: RV_1,155.03c dadhāti putro 'varam param pitur nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane
GV01rv_hn01u:3633: RV_1,155.04a tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasīnasya trātur avṛkasya
GV01rv_hn01u:3635: RV_1,155.04c yaḥ pārthivāni tribhir id vigāmabhir uru kramiṣṭorugāyāya jīvase ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3636: RV_1,155.05a dve id asya kramaṇe svardṛśo 'bhikhyāya martyo bhuraṇyati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3637: RV_1,155.05c tṛtīyam asya nakir ā dadharṣati vayaś cana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3638: RV_1,155.06a caturbhiḥ sākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiś cakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīṃr
GV01rv_hn01u:3640: RV_1,155.06c bṛhaccharīro vimimāna ṛkvabhir yuvākumāraḥ praty ety āhavam
GV01rv_hn01u:3641: RV_1,156.01a bhavā mitro na śevyo ghṛtāsutir vibhūtadyumna evayā u saprathāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3642: RV_1,156.01c adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cid ardhya stomo yajñaś ca rādhyo haviṣmatā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3643: RV_1,156.02a yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumajjānaye viṣṇave dadāśati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3644: RV_1,156.02c yo jātam asya mahato mahi bravat sed u śravobhir yujyaṃ cid abhy asat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3645: RV_1,156.03a tam u stotāraḥ pūrvyaṃ yathā vida ṛtasya garbhaṃ januṣā
GV01rv_hn01u:3647: RV_1,156.03c āsya jānanto nāma cid vivaktana mahas te viṣṇo sumatim
GV01rv_hn01u:3649: RV_1,156.04a tam asya rājā varuṇas tam aśvinā kratuṃ sacanta mārutasya
GV01rv_hn01u:3651: RV_1,156.04c dādhāra dakṣam uttamam aharvidaṃ vrajaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivāṃ aporṇute ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3652: RV_1,156.05a ā yo vivāya sacathāya daivya indrāya viṣṇuḥ sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3653: RV_1,156.05c vedhā ajinvat triṣadhastha āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānam ābhajat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3654: RV_1,157.01a abodhy agnir jma ud eti sūryo vy uṣāś candrā mahy āvo arciṣā
GV01rv_hn01u:3655: RV_1,157.01c āyukṣātām aśvinā yātave ratham prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3656: RV_1,157.02a yad yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇam aśvinā rathaṃ ghṛtena no madhunā kṣatram
GV01rv_hn01u:3658: RV_1,157.02c asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu jinvataṃ vayaṃ dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3659: RV_1,157.03a arvāṅ tricakro madhuvāhano ratho jīrāśvo aśvinor yātu suṣṭutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3660: RV_1,157.03c trivandhuro maghavā viśvasaubhagaḥ śaṃ na ā vakṣad dvipade catuṣpade ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3661: RV_1,157.04a ā na ūrjaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvam madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā
GV01rv_hn01u:3663: RV_1,157.04c prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3664: RV_1,157.05a yuvaṃ ha garbhaṃ jagatīṣu dhattho yuvaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3665: RV_1,157.05c yuvam agniṃ ca vṛṣaṇāv apaś ca vanaspatīṃr aśvināv airayethām
GV01rv_hn01u:3666: RV_1,157.06a yuvaṃ ha stho bhiṣajā bheṣajebhir atho ha stho rathyā
GV01rv_hn01u:3668: RV_1,157.06c atho ha kṣatram adhi dhattha ugrā yo vāṃ haviṣmān manasā dadāśa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3669: RV_1,158.01a vasū rudrā purumantū vṛdhantā daśasyataṃ no vṛṣaṇāv abhiṣṭau |
GV01rv_hn01u:3670: RV_1,158.01c dasrā ha yad rekṇa aucathyo vām pra yat sasrāthe akavābhir ūtī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3671: RV_1,158.02a ko vāṃ dāśat sumataye cid asyai vasū yad dhethe namasā pade goḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3672: RV_1,158.02c jigṛtam asme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇeva manasā carantā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3673: RV_1,158.03a yukto ha yad vāṃ taugryāya perur vi madhye arṇaso dhāyi pajraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3674: RV_1,158.03c upa vām avaḥ śaraṇaṃ gameyaṃ śūro nājma patayadbhir evaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3675: RV_1,158.04a upastutir aucathyam uruṣyen mā mām ime patatriṇī vi dugdhām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3676: RV_1,158.04c mā mām edho daśatayaś cito dhāk pra yad vām baddhas tmani khādati kṣām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3677: RV_1,158.05a na mā garan nadyo mātṛtamā dāsā yad īṃ susamubdham avādhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3678: RV_1,158.05c śiro yad asya traitano vitakṣat svayaṃ dāsa uro aṃsāv api gdha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3679: RV_1,158.06a dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuge |
GV01rv_hn01u:3680: RV_1,158.06c apām arthaṃ yatīnām brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3681: RV_1,159.01a pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3682: RV_1,159.01c devebhir ye devaputre sudaṃsasetthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3683: RV_1,159.02a uta manye pitur adruho mano mātur mahi svatavas tad
GV01rv_hn01u:3685: RV_1,159.02c suretasā pitarā bhūma cakratur uru prajāyā amṛtaṃ varīmabhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3686: RV_1,159.03a te sūnavaḥ svapasaḥ sudaṃsaso mahī jajñur mātarā pūrvacittaye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3687: RV_1,159.03c sthātuś ca satyaṃ jagataś ca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padam
GV01rv_hn01u:3689: RV_1,159.04a te māyino mamire supracetaso jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3690: RV_1,159.04c navyaṃ-navyaṃ tantum ā tanvate divi samudre antaḥ kavayaḥ sudītayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3691: RV_1,159.05a tad rādho adya savitur vareṇyaṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave manāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3692: RV_1,159.05c asmabhyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantaṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3694: RV_1,160.01a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuva ṛtāvarī rajaso dhārayatkavī
GV01rv_hn01u:3695: RV_1,160.01c sujanmanī dhiṣaṇe antar īyate devo devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3696: RV_1,160.02a uruvyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3697: RV_1,160.02c sudhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīm abhi rūpair
GV01rv_hn01u:3699: RV_1,160.03a sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīro bhuvanāni māyayā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3700: RV_1,160.03c dhenuṃ ca pṛśniṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suretasaṃ viśvāhā śukram payo asya
GV01rv_hn01u:3702: RV_1,160.04a ayaṃ devānām apasām apastamo yo jajāna rodasī viśvaśambhuvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3703: RV_1,160.04c vi yo mame rajasī sukratūyayājarebhi skambhanebhiḥ sam ānṛce ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3704: RV_1,160.05a te no gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatraṃ dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsatho
GV01rv_hn01u:3706: RV_1,160.05c yenābhi kṛṣṭīs tatanāma viśvahā panāyyam ojo asme sam invatam
GV01rv_hn01u:3707: RV_1,161.01a kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagan kim īyate dūtyaṃ kad yad ūcima |
GV01rv_hn01u:3708: RV_1,161.01c na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākulo 'gne bhrātar druṇa id bhūtim ūdima ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3709: RV_1,161.02a ekaṃ camasaṃ caturaḥ kṛṇotana tad vo devā abruvan tad va āgamam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3710: RV_1,161.02c saudhanvanā yady evā kariṣyatha sākaṃ devair yajñiyāso bhaviṣyatha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3711: RV_1,161.03a agniṃ dūtam prati yad abravītanāśvaḥ kartvo ratha uteha kartvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3712: RV_1,161.03c dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātar anu vaḥ kṛtvy emasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3713: RV_1,161.04a cakṛvāṃsa ṛbhavas tad apṛcchata kved abhūd yaḥ sya dūto na ājagan |
GV01rv_hn01u:3714: RV_1,161.04c yadāvākhyac camasāñ caturaḥ kṛtān ād it tvaṣṭā gnāsv antar ny ānaje ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3715: RV_1,161.05a hanāmaināṃ iti tvaṣṭā yad abravīc camasaṃ ye devapānam anindiṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3716: RV_1,161.05c anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacāṃ anyair enān kanyā nāmabhi
GV01rv_hn01u:3718: RV_1,161.06a indro harī yuyuje aśvinā ratham bṛhaspatir viśvarūpām upājata |
GV01rv_hn01u:3719: RV_1,161.06c ṛbhur vibhvā vājo devāṃ agacchata svapaso yajñiyam bhāgam aitana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3720: RV_1,161.07a niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta dhītibhir yā jarantā yuvaśā tākṛṇotana |
GV01rv_hn01u:3721: RV_1,161.07c saudhanvanā aśvād aśvam atakṣata yuktvā ratham upa devāṃ ayātana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3722: RV_1,161.08a idam udakam pibatety abravītanedaṃ vā ghā pibatā muñjanejanam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3723: RV_1,161.08c saudhanvanā yadi tan neva haryatha tṛtīye ghā savane mādayādhvai ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3724: RV_1,161.09a āpo bhūyiṣṭhā ity eko abravīd agnir bhūyiṣṭha ity anyo
GV01rv_hn01u:3726: RV_1,161.09c vadharyantīm bahubhyaḥ praiko abravīd ṛtā vadantaś camasāṃ apiṃśata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3727: RV_1,161.10a śroṇām eka udakaṃ gām avājati māṃsam ekaḥ piṃśati sūnayābhṛtam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3728: RV_1,161.10c ā nimrucaḥ śakṛd eko apābharat kiṃ svit putrebhyaḥ pitarā
GV01rv_hn01u:3730: RV_1,161.11a udvatsv asmā akṛṇotanā tṛṇaṃ nivatsv apaḥ svapasyayā naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3731: RV_1,161.11c agohyasya yad asastanā gṛhe tad adyedam ṛbhavo nānu gacchatha
GV01rv_hn01u:3732: RV_1,161.12a sammīlya yad bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svit tātyā pitarā va
GV01rv_hn01u:3734: RV_1,161.12c aśapata yaḥ karasnaṃ va ādade yaḥ prābravīt pro tasmā
GV01rv_hn01u:3736: RV_1,161.13a suṣupvāṃsa ṛbhavas tad apṛcchatāgohya ka idaṃ no abūbudhat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3737: RV_1,161.13c śvānam basto bodhayitāram abravīt saṃvatsara idam adyā vy akhyata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3738: RV_1,161.14a divā yānti maruto bhūmyāgnir ayaṃ vāto antarikṣeṇa yāti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3739: RV_1,161.14c adbhir yāti varuṇaḥ samudrair yuṣmāṃ icchantaḥ śavaso napātaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3740: RV_1,162.01a mā no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā marutaḥ pari khyan
GV01rv_hn01u:3741: RV_1,162.01c yad vājino devajātasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmo vidathe vīryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3742: RV_1,162.02a yan nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya rātiṃ gṛbhītām mukhato nayanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3743: RV_1,162.02c suprāṅ ajo memyad viśvarūpa indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam apy eti pāthaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3744: RV_1,162.03a eṣa cchāgaḥ puro aśvena vājinā pūṣṇo bhāgo nīyate viśvadevyaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3745: RV_1,162.03c abhipriyaṃ yat puroḷāśam arvatā tvaṣṭed enaṃ sauśravasāya jinvati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3746: RV_1,162.04a yad dhaviṣyam ṛtuśo devayānaṃ trir mānuṣāḥ pary aśvaṃ nayanti
GV01rv_hn01u:3747: RV_1,162.04c atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamo bhāga eti yajñaṃ devebhyaḥ prativedayann ajaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3748: RV_1,162.05a hotādhvaryur āvayā agnimindho grāvagrābha uta śaṃstā suvipraḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3749: RV_1,162.05c tena yajñena svaraṅkṛtena sviṣṭena vakṣaṇā ā pṛṇadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3750: RV_1,162.06a yūpavraskā uta ye yūpavāhāś caṣālaṃ ye aśvayūpāya takṣati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3751: RV_1,162.06c ye cārvate pacanaṃ sambharanty uto teṣām abhigūrtir na invatu
GV01rv_hn01u:3752: RV_1,162.07a upa prāgāt suman me 'dhāyi manma devānām āśā upa vītapṛṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3753: RV_1,162.07c anv enaṃ viprā ṛṣayo madanti devānām puṣṭe cakṛmā subandhum
GV01rv_hn01u:3754: RV_1,162.08a yad vājino dāma saṃdānam arvato yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanā rajjur
GV01rv_hn01u:3756: RV_1,162.08c yad vā ghāsya prabhṛtam āsye tṛṇaṃ sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3757: RV_1,162.09a yad aśvasya kraviṣo makṣikāśa yad vā svarau svadhitau riptam
GV01rv_hn01u:3759: RV_1,162.09c yad dhastayoḥ śamitur yan nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3760: RV_1,162.10a yad ūvadhyam udarasyāpavāti ya āmasya kraviṣo gandho asti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3761: RV_1,162.10c sukṛtā tac chamitāraḥ kṛṇvantūta medhaṃ śṛtapākam pacantu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3762: RV_1,162.11a yat te gātrād agninā pacyamānād abhi śūlaṃ nihatasyāvadhāvati |
GV01rv_hn01u:3763: RV_1,162.11c mā tad bhūmyām ā śriṣan mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyas tad uśadbhyo rātam astu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3764: RV_1,162.12a ye vājinam paripaśyanti pakvaṃ ya īm āhuḥ surabhir nir hareti
GV01rv_hn01u:3765: RV_1,162.12c ye cārvato māṃsabhikṣām upāsata uto teṣām abhigūrtir na invatu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3766: RV_1,162.13a yan nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyā ukhāyā yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇa āsecanāni |
GV01rv_hn01u:3767: RV_1,162.13c ūṣmaṇyāpidhānā carūṇām aṅkāḥ sūnāḥ pari bhūṣanty aśvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3768: RV_1,162.14a nikramaṇaṃ niṣadanaṃ vivartanaṃ yac ca paḍbīśam arvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3769: RV_1,162.14c yac ca papau yac ca ghāsiṃ jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣv
GV01rv_hn01u:3771: RV_1,162.15a mā tvāgnir dhvanayīd dhūmagandhir mokhā bhrājanty abhi vikta jaghriḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3772: RV_1,162.15c iṣṭaṃ vītam abhigūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ taṃ devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇanty aśvam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3773: RV_1,162.16a yad aśvāya vāsa upastṛṇanty adhīvāsaṃ yā hiraṇyāny asmai |
GV01rv_hn01u:3774: RV_1,162.16c saṃdānam arvantam paḍbīśam priyā deveṣv ā yāmayanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3775: RV_1,162.17a yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda |
GV01rv_hn01u:3776: RV_1,162.17c sruceva tā haviṣo adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3777: RV_1,162.18a catustriṃśad vājino devabandhor vaṅkrīr aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3778: RV_1,162.18c acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruṣ-parur anughuṣyā vi śasta
GV01rv_hn01u:3779: RV_1,162.19a ekas tvaṣṭur aśvasyā viśastā dvā yantārā bhavatas tatha ṛtuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3780: RV_1,162.19c yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tā-tā piṇḍānām pra juhomy agnau
GV01rv_hn01u:3781: RV_1,162.20a mā tvā tapat priya ātmāpiyantam mā svadhitis tanva ā
GV01rv_hn01u:3783: RV_1,162.20c mā te gṛdhnur aviśastātihāya chidrā gātrāṇy asinā mithū kaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3784: RV_1,162.21a na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devāṃ id eṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3785: RV_1,162.21c harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthād vājī dhuri rāsabhasya
GV01rv_hn01u:3786: RV_1,162.22a sugavyaṃ no vājī svaśvyam puṃsaḥ putrāṃ uta viśvāpuṣaṃ rayim
GV01rv_hn01u:3787: RV_1,162.22c anāgāstvaṃ no aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatraṃ no aśvo vanatāṃ haviṣmān
GV01rv_hn01u:3788: RV_1,163.01a yad akrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāna udyan samudrād uta vā purīṣāt
GV01rv_hn01u:3789: RV_1,163.01c śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū upastutyam mahi jātaṃ te arvan
GV01rv_hn01u:3790: RV_1,163.02a yamena dattaṃ trita enam āyunag indra eṇam prathamo adhy
GV01rv_hn01u:3792: RV_1,163.02c gandharvo asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrād aśvaṃ vasavo nir ataṣṭa
GV01rv_hn01u:3793: RV_1,163.03a asi yamo asy ādityo arvann asi trito guhyena vratena |
GV01rv_hn01u:3794: RV_1,163.03c asi somena samayā vipṛkta āhus te trīṇi divi bandhanāni ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3795: RV_1,163.04a trīṇi ta āhur divi bandhanāni trīṇy apsu trīṇy antaḥ samudre
GV01rv_hn01u:3796: RV_1,163.04c uteva me varuṇaś chantsy arvan yatrā ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitram
GV01rv_hn01u:3797: RV_1,163.05a imā te vājinn avamārjanānīmā śaphānāṃ sanitur nidhānā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3798: RV_1,163.05c atrā te bhadrā raśanā apaśyam ṛtasya yā abhirakṣanti gopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3799: RV_1,163.06a ātmānaṃ te manasārād ajānām avo divā patayantam pataṅgam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3800: RV_1,163.06c śiro apaśyam pathibhiḥ sugebhir areṇubhir jehamānam patatri
GV01rv_hn01u:3801: RV_1,163.07a atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyaṃ jigīṣamāṇam iṣa ā pade goḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3802: RV_1,163.07c yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḷ ād id grasiṣṭha oṣadhīr ajīgaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3803: RV_1,163.08a anu tvā ratho anu maryo arvann anu gāvo 'nu bhagaḥ kanīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3804: RV_1,163.08c anu vrātāsas tava sakhyam īyur anu devā mamire vīryaṃ te ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3805: RV_1,163.09a hiraṇyaśṛṅgo 'yo asya pādā manojavā avara indra āsīt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3806: RV_1,163.09c devā id asya haviradyam āyan yo arvantam prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3807: RV_1,163.10a īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ saṃ śūraṇāso divyāso atyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3808: RV_1,163.10c haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatante yad ākṣiṣur divyam ajmam aśvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3809: RV_1,163.11a tava śarīram patayiṣṇv arvan tava cittaṃ vāta iva dhrajīmān |
GV01rv_hn01u:3810: RV_1,163.11c tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrāraṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3811: RV_1,163.12a upa prāgāc chasanaṃ vājy arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3812: RV_1,163.12c ajaḥ puro nīyate nābhir asyānu paścāt kavayo yanti rebhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3813: RV_1,163.13a upa prāgāt paramaṃ yat sadhastham arvāṃ acchā pitaram mātaraṃ
GV01rv_hn01u:3815: RV_1,163.13c adyā devāñ juṣṭatamo hi gamyā athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3816: RV_1,164.01a asya vāmasya palitasya hotus tasya bhrātā madhyamo asty aśnaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3817: RV_1,164.01c tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asyātrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram
GV01rv_hn01u:3818: RV_1,164.02a sapta yuñjanti ratham ekacakram eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3819: RV_1,164.02c trinābhi cakram ajaram anarvaṃ yatremā viśvā bhuvanādhi tasthuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3820: RV_1,164.03a imaṃ ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahanty
GV01rv_hn01u:3822: RV_1,164.03c sapta svasāro abhi saṃ navante yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāma
GV01rv_hn01u:3823: RV_1,164.04a ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānam asthanvantaṃ yad anasthā bibharti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3824: RV_1,164.04c bhūmyā asur asṛg ātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3825: RV_1,164.05a pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasāvijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni |
GV01rv_hn01u:3826: RV_1,164.05c vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavā u ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3827: RV_1,164.06a acikitvāñ cikituṣaś cid atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān
GV01rv_hn01u:3828: RV_1,164.06c vi yas tastambha ṣaḷ imā rajāṃsy ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3829: RV_1,164.07a iha bravītu ya īm aṅga vedāsya vāmasya nihitam padaṃ veḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3830: RV_1,164.07c śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakam padāpuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3831: RV_1,164.08a mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhīty agre manasā saṃ hi jagme |
GV01rv_hn01u:3832: RV_1,164.08c sā bībhatsur garbharasā nividdhā namasvanta id upavākam īyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3833: RV_1,164.09a yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣv antaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3834: RV_1,164.09c amīmed vatso anu gām apaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3835: RV_1,164.10a tisro mātṝs trīn pitṝn bibhrad eka ūrdhvas tasthau nem ava glāpayanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3836: RV_1,164.10c mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācam aviśvaminvām
GV01rv_hn01u:3837: RV_1,164.11a dvādaśāraṃ nahi taj jarāya varvarti cakram pari dyām ṛtasya |
GV01rv_hn01u:3838: RV_1,164.11c ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiś ca tasthuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3839: RV_1,164.12a pañcapādam pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3840: RV_1,164.12c atheme anya upare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḷara āhur arpitam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3841: RV_1,164.13a pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminn ā tasthur bhuvanāni viśvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3842: RV_1,164.13c tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na śīryate sanābhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3843: RV_1,164.14a sanemi cakram ajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3844: RV_1,164.14c sūryasya cakṣū rajasaity āvṛtaṃ tasminn ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3845: RV_1,164.15a sākañjānāṃ saptatham āhur ekajaṃ ṣaḷ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti
GV01rv_hn01u:3846: RV_1,164.15c teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśa sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3847: RV_1,164.16a striyaḥ satīs tāṃ u me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyad akṣaṇvān na vi cetad
GV01rv_hn01u:3849: RV_1,164.16c kavir yaḥ putraḥ sa īm ā ciketa yas tā vijānāt sa pituṣ
GV01rv_hn01u:3851: RV_1,164.17a avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gaur ud
GV01rv_hn01u:3853: RV_1,164.17c sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardham parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3854: RV_1,164.18a avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asyānuveda para enāvareṇa |
GV01rv_hn01u:3855: RV_1,164.18c kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devam manaḥ kuto adhi prajātam
GV01rv_hn01u:3856: RV_1,164.19a ye arvāñcas tāṃ u parāca āhur ye parāñcas tāṃ u arvāca āhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3857: RV_1,164.19c indraś ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajaso vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3858: RV_1,164.20a dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣam pari ṣasvajāte |
GV01rv_hn01u:3859: RV_1,164.20c tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo abhi cākaśīti
GV01rv_hn01u:3860: RV_1,164.21a yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhāgam animeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3861: RV_1,164.21c ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa
GV01rv_hn01u:3862: RV_1,164.22a yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve |
GV01rv_hn01u:3863: RV_1,164.22c tasyed āhuḥ pippalaṃ svādv agre tan non naśad yaḥ pitaraṃ na veda ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3864: RV_1,164.23a yad gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata |
GV01rv_hn01u:3865: RV_1,164.23c yad vā jagaj jagaty āhitam padaṃ ya it tad vidus te amṛtatvam
GV01rv_hn01u:3867: RV_1,164.24a gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3868: RV_1,164.24c vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadākṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3869: RV_1,164.25a jagatā sindhuṃ divy astabhāyad rathantare sūryam pary apaśyat |
GV01rv_hn01u:3870: RV_1,164.25c gāyatrasya samidhas tisra āhus tato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā
GV01rv_hn01u:3871: RV_1,164.26a upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenum etāṃ suhasto godhug uta dohad enām
GV01rv_hn01u:3872: RV_1,164.26c śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitā sāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmas tad u ṣu pra vocam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3873: RV_1,164.27a hiṅkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsam icchantī manasābhy āgāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3874: RV_1,164.27c duhām aśvibhyām payo aghnyeyaṃ sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3875: RV_1,164.28a gaur amīmed anu vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānaṃ hiṅṅ akṛṇon mātavā
GV01rv_hn01u:3877: RV_1,164.28c sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3878: RV_1,164.29a ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaur abhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāv adhi śritā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3879: RV_1,164.29c sā cittibhir ni hi cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati
GV01rv_hn01u:3881: RV_1,164.30a anac chaye turagātu jīvam ejad dhruvam madhya ā pastyānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3882: RV_1,164.30c jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhir amartyo martyenā sayoniḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3883: RV_1,164.31a apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3884: RV_1,164.31c sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3885: RV_1,164.32a ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirug in nu tasmāt |
GV01rv_hn01u:3886: RV_1,164.32c sa mātur yonā parivīto antar bahuprajā nirṛtim ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3887: RV_1,164.33a dyaur me pitā janitā nābhir atra bandhur me mātā pṛthivī mahīyam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3888: RV_1,164.33c uttānayoś camvor yonir antar atrā pitā duhitur garbham ādhāt
GV01rv_hn01u:3889: RV_1,164.34a pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi yatra bhuvanasya nābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3890: RV_1,164.34c pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma
GV01rv_hn01u:3891: RV_1,164.35a iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3892: RV_1,164.35c ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyaṃ vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3893: RV_1,164.36a saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇos tiṣṭhanti pradiśā
GV01rv_hn01u:3895: RV_1,164.36c te dhītibhir manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3896: RV_1,164.37a na vi jānāmi yad ivedam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddho manasā carāmi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3897: RV_1,164.37c yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasyād id vāco aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3898: RV_1,164.38a apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3899: RV_1,164.38c tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ny anyaṃ cikyur na ni cikyur anyam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3900: RV_1,164.39a ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3901: RV_1,164.39c yas tan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidus ta ime sam āsate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3902: RV_1,164.40a sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma |
GV01rv_hn01u:3903: RV_1,164.40c addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3904: RV_1,164.41a gaurīr mimāya salilāni takṣaty ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī |
GV01rv_hn01u:3905: RV_1,164.41c aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā parame vyoman ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3906: RV_1,164.42a tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3907: RV_1,164.42c tataḥ kṣaraty akṣaraṃ tad viśvam upa jīvati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3908: RV_1,164.43a śakamayaṃ dhūmam ārād apaśyaṃ viṣūvatā para enāvareṇa |
GV01rv_hn01u:3909: RV_1,164.43c ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3910: RV_1,164.44a trayaḥ keśina ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapata eka eṣām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3911: RV_1,164.44c viśvam eko abhi caṣṭe śacībhir dhrājir ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam
GV01rv_hn01u:3912: RV_1,164.45a catvāri vāk parimitā padāni tāni vidur brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3913: RV_1,164.45c guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3914: RV_1,164.46a indram mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhur atho divyaḥ sa suparṇo
GV01rv_hn01u:3916: RV_1,164.46c ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadanty agniṃ yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3917: RV_1,164.47a kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:3918: RV_1,164.47c ta āvavṛtran sadanād ṛtasyād id ghṛtena pṛthivī vy udyate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3919: RV_1,164.48a dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa
GV01rv_hn01u:3920: RV_1,164.48c tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ ṣaṣṭir na calācalāsaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3921: RV_1,164.49a yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi |
GV01rv_hn01u:3922: RV_1,164.49c yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ sarasvati tam iha dhātave
GV01rv_hn01u:3924: RV_1,164.50a yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan |
GV01rv_hn01u:3925: RV_1,164.50c te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3926: RV_1,164.51a samānam etad udakam uc caity ava cāhabhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3927: RV_1,164.51c bhūmim parjanyā jinvanti divaṃ jinvanty agnayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3928: RV_1,164.52a divyaṃ suparṇaṃ vāyasam bṛhantam apāṃ garbhaṃ darśatam oṣadhīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:3929: RV_1,164.52c abhīpato vṛṣṭibhis tarpayantaṃ sarasvantam avase johavīmi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3930: RV_1,165.01a kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3931: RV_1,165.01c kayā matī kuta etāsa ete 'rcanti śuṣmaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasūyā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3932: RV_1,165.02a kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣur yuvānaḥ ko adhvare maruta ā vavarta |
GV01rv_hn01u:3933: RV_1,165.02c śyenāṃ iva dhrajato antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3934: RV_1,165.03a kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ sann eko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3935: RV_1,165.03c sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānair voces tan no harivo yat te asme ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3936: RV_1,165.04a brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śaṃ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me
GV01rv_hn01u:3938: RV_1,165.04c ā śāsate prati haryanty ukthemā harī vahatas tā no accha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3939: RV_1,165.05a ato vayam antamebhir yujānāḥ svakṣatrebhis tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3940: RV_1,165.05c mahobhir etāṃ upa yujmahe nv indra svadhām anu hi no babhūtha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3941: RV_1,165.06a kva syā vo marutaḥ svadhāsīd yan mām ekaṃ samadhattāhihatye |
GV01rv_hn01u:3942: RV_1,165.06c ahaṃ hy ugras taviṣas tuviṣmān viśvasya śatror anamaṃ vadhasnaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3943: RV_1,165.07a bhūri cakartha yujyebhir asme samānebhir vṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3944: RV_1,165.07c bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭhendra kratvā maruto yad vaśāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3945: RV_1,165.08a vadhīṃ vṛtram maruta indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣo babhūvān |
GV01rv_hn01u:3946: RV_1,165.08c aham etā manave viśvaścandrāḥ sugā apaś cakara vajrabāhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3947: RV_1,165.09a anuttam ā te maghavan nakir nu na tvāvāṃ asti devatā vidānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3948: RV_1,165.09c na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3949: RV_1,165.10a ekasya cin me vibhv astv ojo yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3950: RV_1,165.10c ahaṃ hy ugro maruto vidāno yāni cyavam indra id īśa eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3951: RV_1,165.11a amandan mā maruta stomo atra yan me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra |
GV01rv_hn01u:3952: RV_1,165.11c indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyaṃ sakhye sakhāyas tanve tanūbhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3953: RV_1,165.12a eved ete prati mā rocamānā anedyaḥ śrava eṣo dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3954: RV_1,165.12c saṃcakṣyā marutaś candravarṇā acchānta me chadayāthā ca nūnam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3955: RV_1,165.13a ko nv atra maruto māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīṃr acchā sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3956: RV_1,165.13c manmāni citrā apivātayanta eṣām bhūta navedā ma ṛtānām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3957: RV_1,165.14a ā yad duvasyād duvase na kārur asmāñ cakre mānyasya medhā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3958: RV_1,165.14c o ṣu vartta maruto vipram acchemā brahmāṇi jaritā vo arcat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3959: RV_1,165.15a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3960: RV_1,165.15c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3961: RV_1,166.01a tan nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvam mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya ketave |
GV01rv_hn01u:3962: RV_1,166.01c aidheva yāman marutas tuviṣvaṇo yudheva śakrās taviṣāṇi kartana ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3963: RV_1,166.02a nityaṃ na sūnum madhu bibhrata upa krīḷanti krīḷā vidatheṣu
GV01rv_hn01u:3965: RV_1,166.02c nakṣanti rudrā avasā namasvinaṃ na mardhanti svatavaso haviṣkṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3966: RV_1,166.03a yasmā ūmāso amṛtā arāsata rāyas poṣaṃ ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:3967: RV_1,166.03c ukṣanty asmai maruto hitā iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3968: RV_1,166.04a ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhir avyata pra va evāsaḥ svayatāso
GV01rv_hn01u:3970: RV_1,166.04c bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citro vo yāmaḥ prayatāsv ṛṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3971: RV_1,166.05a yat tveṣayāmā nadayanta parvatān divo vā pṛṣṭhaṃ naryā acucyavuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3972: RV_1,166.05c viśvo vo ajman bhayate vanaspatī rathīyantīva pra jihīta oṣadhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3973: RV_1,166.06a yūyaṃ na ugrā marutaḥ sucetunāriṣṭagrāmāḥ sumatim pipartana |
GV01rv_hn01u:3974: RV_1,166.06c yatrā vo didyud radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhiteva barhaṇā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3975: RV_1,166.07a pra skambhadeṣṇā anavabhrarādhaso 'lātṛṇāso vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3976: RV_1,166.07c arcanty arkam madirasya pītaye vidur vīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3977: RV_1,166.08a śatabhujibhis tam abhihruter aghāt pūrbhī rakṣatā maruto yam āvata |
GV01rv_hn01u:3978: RV_1,166.08c janaṃ yam ugrās tavaso virapśinaḥ pāthanā śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3979: RV_1,166.09a viśvāni bhadrā maruto ratheṣu vo mithaspṛdhyeva taviṣāṇy āhitā |
GV01rv_hn01u:3980: RV_1,166.09c aṃseṣv ā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayo 'kṣo vaś cakrā samayā vi vāvṛte ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3981: RV_1,166.10a bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāso añjayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3982: RV_1,166.10c aṃseṣv etāḥ paviṣu kṣurā adhi vayo na pakṣān vy anu śriyo dhire ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3983: RV_1,166.11a mahānto mahnā vibhvo vibhūtayo dūredṛśo ye divyā iva stṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:3984: RV_1,166.11c mandrāḥ sujihvāḥ svaritāra āsabhiḥ sammiślā indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3985: RV_1,166.12a tad vaḥ sujātā maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ vo dātram aditer iva vratam |
GV01rv_hn01u:3986: RV_1,166.12c indraś cana tyajasā vi hruṇāti taj janāya yasmai sukṛte
GV01rv_hn01u:3988: RV_1,166.13a tad vo jāmitvam marutaḥ pare yuge purū yac chaṃsam amṛtāsa āvata |
GV01rv_hn01u:3989: RV_1,166.13c ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭim āvyā sākaṃ naro daṃsanair ā
GV01rv_hn01u:3991: RV_1,166.14a yena dīrgham marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3992: RV_1,166.14c ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsa ebhir yajñebhis tad abhīṣṭim
GV01rv_hn01u:3994: RV_1,166.15a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3995: RV_1,166.15c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3996: RV_1,167.01a sahasraṃ ta indrotayo naḥ sahasram iṣo harivo gūrtatamāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:3997: RV_1,167.01c sahasraṃ rāyo mādayadhyai sahasriṇa upa no yantu vājāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:3998: RV_1,167.02a ā no 'vobhir maruto yāntv acchā jyeṣṭhebhir vā bṛhaddivaiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4000: RV_1,167.02c adha yad eṣāṃ niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya cid dhanayanta pāre
GV01rv_hn01u:4001: RV_1,167.03a mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇyanirṇig uparā na ṛṣṭiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4002: RV_1,167.03c guhā carantī manuṣo na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyeva saṃ vāk ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4003: RV_1,167.04a parā śubhrā ayāso yavyā sādhāraṇyeva maruto mimikṣuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4004: RV_1,167.04c na rodasī apa nudanta ghorā juṣanta vṛdhaṃ sakhyāya devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4005: RV_1,167.05a joṣad yad īm asuryā sacadhyai viṣitastukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4006: RV_1,167.05c ā sūryeva vidhato rathaṃ gāt tveṣapratīkā nabhaso netyā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4007: RV_1,167.06a āsthāpayanta yuvatiṃ yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiślāṃ vidatheṣu pajrām
GV01rv_hn01u:4008: RV_1,167.06c arko yad vo maruto haviṣmān gāyad gāthaṃ sutasomo duvasyan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4009: RV_1,167.07a pra taṃ vivakmi vakmyo ya eṣām marutām mahimā satyo asti |
GV01rv_hn01u:4010: RV_1,167.07c sacā yad īṃ vṛṣamaṇā ahaṃyu sthirā cij janīr vahate subhāgāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4011: RV_1,167.08a pānti mitrāvaruṇāv avadyāc cayata īm aryamo apraśastān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4012: RV_1,167.08c uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdha īm maruto dātivāraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4013: RV_1,167.09a nahī nu vo maruto anty asme ārāttāc cic chavaso antam āpuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4014: RV_1,167.09c te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃso 'rṇo na dveṣo dhṛṣatā pari ṣṭhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4015: RV_1,167.10a vayam adyendrasya preṣṭhā vayaṃ śvo vocemahi samarye |
GV01rv_hn01u:4016: RV_1,167.10c vayam purā mahi ca no anu dyūn tan na ṛbhukṣā narām anu ṣyāt
GV01rv_hn01u:4017: RV_1,167.11a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4018: RV_1,167.11c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4019: RV_1,168.01a yajñā-yajñā vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇir dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ vo devayā u
GV01rv_hn01u:4021: RV_1,168.01c ā vo 'rvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyor mahe vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4022: RV_1,168.02a vavrāso na ye svajāḥ svatavasa iṣaṃ svar abhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4023: RV_1,168.02c sahasriyāso apāṃ normaya āsā gāvo vandyāso nokṣaṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4024: RV_1,168.03a somāso na ye sutās tṛptāṃśavo hṛtsu pītāso duvaso nāsate |
GV01rv_hn01u:4025: RV_1,168.03c aiṣām aṃseṣu rambhiṇīva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiś ca kṛtiś ca
GV01rv_hn01u:4027: RV_1,168.04a ava svayuktā diva ā vṛthā yayur amartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā
GV01rv_hn01u:4028: RV_1,168.04c areṇavas tuvijātā acucyavur dṛḷhāni cin maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4029: RV_1,168.05a ko vo 'ntar maruta ṛṣṭividyuto rejati tmanā hanveva jihvayā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4030: RV_1,168.05c dhanvacyuta iṣāṃ na yāmani purupraiṣā ahanyo naitaśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4031: RV_1,168.06a kva svid asya rajaso mahas paraṃ kvāvaram maruto yasminn
GV01rv_hn01u:4033: RV_1,168.06c yac cyāvayatha vithureva saṃhitaṃ vy adriṇā patatha tveṣam arṇavam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4034: RV_1,168.07a sātir na vo 'mavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:4035: RV_1,168.07c bhadrā vo rātiḥ pṛṇato na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryeva jañjatī
GV01rv_hn01u:4036: RV_1,168.08a prati ṣṭobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyo yad abhriyāṃ vācam udīrayanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:4037: RV_1,168.08c ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yadī ghṛtam marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4038: RV_1,168.09a asūta pṛśnir mahate raṇāya tveṣam ayāsām marutām anīkam |
GV01rv_hn01u:4039: RV_1,168.09c te sapsarāso 'janayantābhvam ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4040: RV_1,168.10a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4041: RV_1,168.10c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4042: RV_1,169.01a mahaś cit tvam indra yata etān mahaś cid asi tyajaso varūtā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4043: RV_1,169.01c sa no vedho marutāṃ cikitvān sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣṭhā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4044: RV_1,169.02a ayujran ta indra viśvakṛṣṭīr vidānāso niṣṣidho martyatrā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4045: RV_1,169.02c marutām pṛtsutir hāsamānā svarmīḷhasya pradhanasya sātau ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4046: RV_1,169.03a amyak sā ta indra ṛṣṭir asme sanemy abhvam maruto junanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:4047: RV_1,169.03c agniś cid dhi ṣmātase śuśukvān āpo na dvīpaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi
GV01rv_hn01u:4048: RV_1,169.04a tvaṃ tū na indra taṃ rayiṃ dā ojiṣṭhayā dakṣiṇayeva rātim |
GV01rv_hn01u:4049: RV_1,169.04c stutaś ca yās te cakananta vāyo stanaṃ na madhvaḥ pīpayanta vājaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4050: RV_1,169.05a tve rāya indra tośatamāḥ praṇetāraḥ kasya cid ṛtāyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4051: RV_1,169.05c te ṣu ṇo maruto mṛḷayantu ye smā purā gātūyantīva devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4052: RV_1,169.06a prati pra yāhīndra mīḷhuṣo nṝn mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva
GV01rv_hn01u:4053: RV_1,169.06c adha yad eṣām pṛthubudhnāsa etās tīrthe nāryaḥ pauṃsyāni tasthuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4054: RV_1,169.07a prati ghorāṇām etānām ayāsām marutāṃ śṛṇva āyatām upabdiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4055: RV_1,169.07c ye martyam pṛtanāyantam ūmair ṛṇāvānaṃ na patayanta sargaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4056: RV_1,169.08a tvam mānebhya indra viśvajanyā radā marudbhiḥ śurudho goagrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4057: RV_1,169.08c stavānebhi stavase deva devair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
GV01rv_hn01u:4058: RV_1,170.01a na nūnam asti no śvaḥ kas tad veda yad adbhutam |
GV01rv_hn01u:4059: RV_1,170.01c anyasya cittam abhi saṃcareṇyam utādhītaṃ vi naśyati ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4060: RV_1,170.02a kiṃ na indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaro marutas tava |
GV01rv_hn01u:4061: RV_1,170.02c tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4062: RV_1,170.03a kiṃ no bhrātar agastya sakhā sann ati manyase |
GV01rv_hn01u:4063: RV_1,170.03c vidmā hi te yathā mano 'smabhyam in na ditsasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4064: RV_1,170.04a araṃ kṛṇvantu vediṃ sam agnim indhatām puraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4065: RV_1,170.04c tatrāmṛtasya cetanaṃ yajñaṃ te tanavāvahai ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4066: RV_1,170.05a tvam īśiṣe vasupate vasūnāṃ tvam mitrāṇām mitrapate dheṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4067: RV_1,170.05c indra tvam marudbhiḥ saṃ vadasvādha prāśāna ṛtuthā havīṃṣi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4068: RV_1,171.01a prati va enā namasāham emi sūktena bhikṣe sumatiṃ turāṇām |
GV01rv_hn01u:4069: RV_1,171.01c rarāṇatā maruto vedyābhir ni heḷo dhatta vi mucadhvam aśvān
GV01rv_hn01u:4070: RV_1,171.02a eṣa va stomo maruto namasvān hṛdā taṣṭo manasā dhāyi devāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4071: RV_1,171.02c upem ā yāta manasā juṣāṇā yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā namasa id vṛdhāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4072: RV_1,171.03a stutāso no maruto mṛḷayantūta stuto maghavā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4073: RV_1,171.03c ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanāny ahāni viśvā maruto jigīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4074: RV_1,171.04a asmād ahaṃ taviṣād īṣamāṇa indrād bhiyā maruto rejamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4075: RV_1,171.04c yuṣmabhyaṃ havyā niśitāny āsan tāny āre cakṛmā mṛḷatā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4076: RV_1,171.05a yena mānāsaś citayanta usrā vyuṣṭiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:4077: RV_1,171.05c sa no marudbhir vṛṣabha śravo dhā ugra ugrebhi sthaviraḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4079: RV_1,171.06a tvam pāhīndra sahīyaso nṝn bhavā marudbhir avayātaheḷāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4080: RV_1,171.06c supraketebhiḥ sāsahir dadhāno vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4081: RV_1,172.01a citro vo 'stu yāmaś citra ūtī sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4083: RV_1,172.02a āre sā vaḥ sudānavo maruta ṛñjatī śaruḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4085: RV_1,172.03a tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4087: RV_1,173.01a gāyat sāma nabhanyaṃ yathā ver arcāma tad vāvṛdhānaṃ svarvat
GV01rv_hn01u:4088: RV_1,173.01c gāvo dhenavo barhiṣy adabdhā ā yat sadmānaṃ divyaṃ vivāsān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4089: RV_1,173.02a arcad vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyair mṛgo nāśno ati yaj juguryāt
GV01rv_hn01u:4090: RV_1,173.02c pra mandayur manāṃ gūrta hotā bharate maryo mithunā yajatraḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4091: RV_1,173.03a nakṣad dhotā pari sadma mitā yan bharad garbham ā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4092: RV_1,173.03c krandad aśvo nayamāno ruvad gaur antar dūto na rodasī carad vāk ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4093: RV_1,173.04a tā karmāṣatarāsmai pra cyautnāni devayanto bharante |
GV01rv_hn01u:4094: RV_1,173.04c jujoṣad indro dasmavarcā nāsatyeva sugmyo ratheṣṭhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4095: RV_1,173.05a tam u ṣṭuhīndraṃ yo ha satvā yaḥ śūro maghavā yo ratheṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4096: RV_1,173.05c pratīcaś cid yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān vavavruṣaś cit tamaso vihantā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4097: RV_1,173.06a pra yad itthā mahinā nṛbhyo asty araṃ rodasī kakṣye nāsmai |
GV01rv_hn01u:4098: RV_1,173.06c saṃ vivya indro vṛjanaṃ na bhūmā bharti svadhāvāṃ opaśam iva dyām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4099: RV_1,173.07a samatsu tvā śūra satām urāṇam prapathintamam paritaṃsayadhyai
GV01rv_hn01u:4100: RV_1,173.07c sajoṣasa indram made kṣoṇīḥ sūriṃ cid ye anumadanti vājaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4101: RV_1,173.08a evā hi te śaṃ savanā samudra āpo yat ta āsu madanti devīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4102: RV_1,173.08c viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūd gauḥ sūrīṃś cid yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān
GV01rv_hn01u:4103: RV_1,173.09a asāma yathā suṣakhāya ena svabhiṣṭayo narāṃ na śaṃsaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4104: RV_1,173.09c asad yathā na indro vandaneṣṭhās turo na karma nayamāna ukthā
GV01rv_hn01u:4105: RV_1,173.10a viṣpardhaso narāṃ na śaṃsair asmākāsad indro vajrahastaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4106: RV_1,173.10c mitrāyuvo na pūrpatiṃ suśiṣṭau madhyāyuva upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4107: RV_1,173.11a yajño hi ṣmendraṃ kaś cid ṛndhañ juhurāṇaś cin manasā pariyan
GV01rv_hn01u:4108: RV_1,173.11c tīrthe nācchā tātṛṣāṇam oko dīrgho na sidhram ā kṛṇoty adhvā
GV01rv_hn01u:4109: RV_1,173.12a mo ṣū ṇa indrātra pṛtsu devair asti hi ṣmā te śuṣminn avayāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4110: RV_1,173.12c mahaś cid yasya mīḷhuṣo yavyā haviṣmato maruto vandate gīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4111: RV_1,173.13a eṣa stoma indra tubhyam asme etena gātuṃ harivo vido naḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4112: RV_1,173.13c ā no vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4113: RV_1,174.01a tvaṃ rājendra ye ca devā rakṣā nṝn pāhy asura tvam asmān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4114: RV_1,174.01c tvaṃ satpatir maghavā nas tarutras tvaṃ satyo vasavānaḥ sahodāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4115: RV_1,174.02a dano viśa indra mṛdhravācaḥ sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīr
GV01rv_hn01u:4117: RV_1,174.02c ṛṇor apo anavadyārṇā yūne vṛtram purukutsāya randhīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4118: RV_1,174.03a ajā vṛta indra śūrapatnīr dyāṃ ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam |
GV01rv_hn01u:4119: RV_1,174.03c rakṣo agnim aśuṣaṃ tūrvayāṇaṃ siṃho na dame apāṃsi vastoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4120: RV_1,174.04a śeṣan nu ta indra sasmin yonau praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4121: RV_1,174.04c sṛjad arṇāṃsy ava yad yudhā gās tiṣṭhad dharī dhṛṣatā mṛṣṭa vājān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4122: RV_1,174.05a vaha kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasyāśvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4123: RV_1,174.05c pra sūraś cakraṃ vṛhatād abhīke 'bhi spṛdho yāsiṣad vajrabāhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4124: RV_1,174.06a jaghanvāṃ indra mitrerūñ codapravṛddho harivo adāśūn |
GV01rv_hn01u:4125: RV_1,174.06c pra ye paśyann aryamaṇaṃ sacāyos tvayā śūrtā vahamānā apatyam
GV01rv_hn01u:4126: RV_1,174.07a rapat kavir indrārkasātau kṣāṃ dāsāyopabarhaṇīṃ kaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4127: RV_1,174.07c karat tisro maghavā dānucitrā ni duryoṇe kuyavācam mṛdhi śret
GV01rv_hn01u:4128: RV_1,174.08a sanā tā ta indra navyā āguḥ saho nabho 'viraṇāya pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4129: RV_1,174.08c bhinat puro na bhido adevīr nanamo vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4130: RV_1,174.09a tvaṃ dhunir indra dhunimatīr ṛṇor apaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4131: RV_1,174.09c pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti
GV01rv_hn01u:4132: RV_1,174.10a tvam asmākam indra viśvadha syā avṛkatamo narāṃ nṛpātā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4133: RV_1,174.10c sa no viśvāsāṃ spṛdhāṃ sahodā vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4134: RV_1,175.01a matsy apāyi te mahaḥ pātrasyeva harivo matsaro madaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4135: RV_1,175.01c vṛṣā te vṛṣṇa indur vājī sahasrasātamaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4136: RV_1,175.02a ā nas te gantu matsaro vṛṣā mado vareṇyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4137: RV_1,175.02c sahāvāṃ indra sānasiḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amartyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4138: RV_1,175.03a tvaṃ hi śūraḥ sanitā codayo manuṣo ratham |
GV01rv_hn01u:4139: RV_1,175.03c sahāvān dasyum avratam oṣaḥ pātraṃ na śociṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4140: RV_1,175.04a muṣāya sūryaṃ kave cakram īśāna ojasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4141: RV_1,175.04c vaha śuṣṇāya vadhaṃ kutsaṃ vātasyāśvaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4142: RV_1,175.05a śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4144: RV_1,175.06a yathā pūrvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha |
GV01rv_hn01u:4145: RV_1,175.06c tām anu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4146: RV_1,176.01a matsi no vasyaiṣṭaya indram indo vṛṣā viśa |
GV01rv_hn01u:4147: RV_1,176.01c ṛghāyamāṇa invasi śatrum anti na vindasi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4148: RV_1,176.02a tasminn ā veśayā giro ya ekaś carṣaṇīnām |
GV01rv_hn01u:4149: RV_1,176.02c anu svadhā yam upyate yavaṃ na carkṛṣad vṛṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4150: RV_1,176.03a yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ pañca kṣitīnāṃ vasu |
GV01rv_hn01u:4151: RV_1,176.03c spāśayasva yo asmadhrug divyevāśanir jahi ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4152: RV_1,176.04a asunvantaṃ samaṃ jahi dūṇāśaṃ yo na te mayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4153: RV_1,176.04c asmabhyam asya vedanaṃ daddhi sūriś cid ohate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4154: RV_1,176.05a āvo yasya dvibarhaso 'rkeṣu sānuṣag asat |
GV01rv_hn01u:4155: RV_1,176.05c ājāv indrasyendo prāvo vājeṣu vājinam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4156: RV_1,176.06a yathā pūrvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha |
GV01rv_hn01u:4157: RV_1,176.06c tām anu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4158: RV_1,177.01a ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūta indraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4159: RV_1,177.01c stutaḥ śravasyann avasopa madrig yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇā yāhy arvāṅ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4160: RV_1,177.02a ye te vṛṣaṇo vṛṣabhāsa indra brahmayujo vṛṣarathāso atyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4161: RV_1,177.02c tāṃ ā tiṣṭha tebhir ā yāhy arvāṅ havāmahe tvā suta indra some
GV01rv_hn01u:4162: RV_1,177.03a ā tiṣṭha rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vṛṣā te sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni
GV01rv_hn01u:4163: RV_1,177.03c yuktvā vṛṣabhyāṃ vṛṣabha kṣitīnāṃ haribhyāṃ yāhi pravatopa madrik ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4164: RV_1,177.04a ayaṃ yajño devayā ayam miyedha imā brahmāṇy ayam indra somaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4165: RV_1,177.04c stīrṇam barhir ā tu śakra pra yāhi pibā niṣadya vi mucā harī
GV01rv_hn01u:4167: RV_1,177.05a o suṣṭuta indra yāhy arvāṅ upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4168: RV_1,177.05c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4169: RV_1,178.01a yad dha syā ta indra śruṣṭir asti yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhya ūtī |
GV01rv_hn01u:4170: RV_1,178.01c mā naḥ kāmam mahayantam ā dhag viśvā te aśyām pary āpa āyoḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4171: RV_1,178.02a na ghā rājendra ā dabhan no yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau |
GV01rv_hn01u:4172: RV_1,178.02c āpaś cid asmai sutukā aveṣan gaman na indraḥ sakhyā vayaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4173: RV_1,178.03a jetā nṛbhir indraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ śrotā havaṃ nādhamānasya kāroḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4174: RV_1,178.03c prabhartā rathaṃ dāśuṣa upāka udyantā giro yadi ca tmanā bhūt
GV01rv_hn01u:4175: RV_1,178.04a evā nṛbhir indraḥ suśravasyā prakhādaḥ pṛkṣo abhi mitriṇo bhūt |
GV01rv_hn01u:4176: RV_1,178.04c samarya iṣa stavate vivāci satrākaro yajamānasya śaṃsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4177: RV_1,178.05a tvayā vayam maghavann indra śatrūn abhi ṣyāma mahato manyamānān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4178: RV_1,178.05c tvaṃ trātā tvam u no vṛdhe bhūr vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
GV01rv_hn01u:4179: RV_1,179.01a pūrvīr ahaṃ śaradaḥ śaśramāṇā doṣā vastor uṣaso jarayantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4180: RV_1,179.01c mināti śriyaṃ jarimā tanūnām apy ū nu patnīr vṛṣaṇo jagamyuḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4181: RV_1,179.02a ye cid dhi pūrva ṛtasāpa āsan sākaṃ devebhir avadann ṛtāni |
GV01rv_hn01u:4182: RV_1,179.02c te cid avāsur nahy antam āpuḥ sam ū nu patnīr vṛṣabhir jagamyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4183: RV_1,179.03a na mṛṣā śrāntaṃ yad avanti devā viśvā it spṛdho abhy aśnavāva |
GV01rv_hn01u:4184: RV_1,179.03c jayāved atra śatanītham ājiṃ yat samyañcā mithunāv abhy ajāva
GV01rv_hn01u:4185: RV_1,179.04a nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāma āgann ita ājāto amutaḥ kutaś cit |
GV01rv_hn01u:4186: RV_1,179.04c lopāmudrā vṛṣaṇaṃ nī riṇāti dhīram adhīrā dhayati śvasantam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4187: RV_1,179.05a imaṃ nu somam antito hṛtsu pītam upa bruve |
GV01rv_hn01u:4188: RV_1,179.05c yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā tat su mṛḷatu pulukāmo hi martyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4189: RV_1,179.06a agastyaḥ khanamānaḥ khanitraiḥ prajām apatyam balam
GV01rv_hn01u:4191: RV_1,179.06c ubhau varṇāv ṛṣir ugraḥ pupoṣa satyā deveṣv āśiṣo jagāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4192: RV_1,180.01a yuvo rajāṃsi suyamāso aśvā ratho yad vām pary arṇāṃsi dīyat |
GV01rv_hn01u:4193: RV_1,180.01c hiraṇyayā vām pavayaḥ pruṣāyan madhvaḥ pibantā uṣasaḥ sacethe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4194: RV_1,180.02a yuvam atyasyāva nakṣatho yad vipatmano naryasya prayajyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4195: RV_1,180.02c svasā yad vāṃ viśvagūrtī bharāti vājāyeṭṭe madhupāv iṣe ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4196: RV_1,180.03a yuvam paya usriyāyām adhattam pakvam āmāyām ava pūrvyaṃ goḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4197: RV_1,180.03c antar yad vanino vām ṛtapsū hvāro na śucir yajate haviṣmān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4198: RV_1,180.04a yuvaṃ ha gharmam madhumantam atraye 'po na kṣodo 'vṛṇītam eṣe
GV01rv_hn01u:4199: RV_1,180.04c tad vāṃ narāv aśvinā paśvaiṣṭī rathyeva cakrā prati yanti
GV01rv_hn01u:4201: RV_1,180.05a ā vāṃ dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā gor oheṇa taugryo na jivriḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4202: RV_1,180.05c apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vāṃ jūrṇo vām akṣur aṃhaso yajatrā
GV01rv_hn01u:4203: RV_1,180.06a ni yad yuvethe niyutaḥ sudānū upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ purandhim |
GV01rv_hn01u:4204: RV_1,180.06c preṣad veṣad vāto na sūrir ā mahe dade suvrato na vājam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4205: RV_1,180.07a vayaṃ cid dhi vāṃ jaritāraḥ satyā vipanyāmahe vi paṇir
GV01rv_hn01u:4207: RV_1,180.07c adhā cid dhi ṣmāśvināv anindyā pātho hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇāv antidevam
GV01rv_hn01u:4208: RV_1,180.08a yuvāṃ cid dhi ṣmāśvināv anu dyūn virudrasya prasravaṇasya sātau |
GV01rv_hn01u:4209: RV_1,180.08c agastyo narāṃ nṛṣu praśastaḥ kārādhunīva citayat sahasraiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4210: RV_1,180.09a pra yad vahethe mahinā rathasya pra syandrā yātho manuṣo na hotā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4211: RV_1,180.09c dhattaṃ sūribhya uta vā svaśvyaṃ nāsatyā rayiṣācaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4212: RV_1,180.10a taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema stomair aśvinā suvitāya
GV01rv_hn01u:4214: RV_1,180.10c ariṣṭanemim pari dyām iyānaṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4215: RV_1,181.01a kad u preṣṭāv iṣāṃ rayīṇām adhvaryantā yad unninītho apām |
GV01rv_hn01u:4216: RV_1,181.01c ayaṃ vāṃ yajño akṛta praśastiṃ vasudhitī avitārā janānām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4217: RV_1,181.02a ā vām aśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspā vātaraṃhaso divyāso atyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4218: RV_1,181.02c manojuvo vṛṣaṇo vītapṛṣṭhā eha svarājo aśvinā vahantu ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4219: RV_1,181.03a ā vāṃ ratho 'vanir na pravatvān sṛpravandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4220: RV_1,181.03c vṛṣṇa sthātārā manaso javīyān ahampūrvo yajato dhiṣṇyā yaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4221: RV_1,181.04a iheha jātā sam avāvaśītām arepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4222: RV_1,181.04c jiṣṇur vām anyaḥ sumakhasya sūrir divo anyaḥ subhagaḥ putra
GV01rv_hn01u:4224: RV_1,181.05a pra vāṃ niceruḥ kakuho vaśāṃ anu piśaṅgarūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4225: RV_1,181.05c harī anyasya pīpayanta vājair mathrā rajāṃsy aśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4226: RV_1,181.06a pra vāṃ śaradvān vṛṣabho na niṣṣāṭ pūrvīr iṣaś carati madhva iṣṇan |
GV01rv_hn01u:4227: RV_1,181.06c evair anyasya pīpayanta vājair veṣantīr ūrdhvā nadyo na āguḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4228: RV_1,181.07a asarji vāṃ sthavirā vedhasā gīr bāḷhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī
GV01rv_hn01u:4229: RV_1,181.07c upastutāv avataṃ nādhamānaṃ yāmann ayāmañ chṛṇutaṃ havam me ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4230: RV_1,181.08a uta syā vāṃ ruśato vapsaso gīs tribarhiṣi sadasi pinvate nṝn
GV01rv_hn01u:4231: RV_1,181.08c vṛṣā vām megho vṛṣaṇā pīpāya gor na seke manuṣo daśasyan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4232: RV_1,181.09a yuvām pūṣevāśvinā purandhir agnim uṣāṃ na jarate haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4233: RV_1,181.09c huve yad vāṃ varivasyā gṛṇāno vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4234: RV_1,182.01a abhūd idaṃ vayunam o ṣu bhūṣatā ratho vṛṣaṇvān madatā
GV01rv_hn01u:4236: RV_1,182.01c dhiyañjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalāvasū divo napātā sukṛte śucivratā
GV01rv_hn01u:4237: RV_1,182.02a indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā dasrā daṃsiṣṭhā rathyā rathītamā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4238: RV_1,182.02c pūrṇaṃ rathaṃ vahethe madhva ācitaṃ tena dāśvāṃsam upa yātho
GV01rv_hn01u:4240: RV_1,182.03a kim atra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kim āsāthe jano yaḥ kaś cid ahavir mahīyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:4241: RV_1,182.03c ati kramiṣṭaṃ juratam paṇer asuṃ jyotir viprāya kṛṇutaṃ vacasyave ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4242: RV_1,182.04a jambhayatam abhito rāyataḥ śuno hatam mṛdho vidathus tāny aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4243: RV_1,182.04c vācaṃ-vācaṃ jaritū ratninīṃ kṛtam ubhā śaṃsaṃ nāsatyāvatam
GV01rv_hn01u:4245: RV_1,182.05a yuvam etaṃ cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavam ātmanvantam pakṣiṇaṃ taugryāya kam |
GV01rv_hn01u:4246: RV_1,182.05c yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ supaptanī petathuḥ kṣodaso mahaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4247: RV_1,182.06a avaviddhaṃ taugryam apsv antar anārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham
GV01rv_hn01u:4248: RV_1,182.06c catasro nāvo jaṭhalasya juṣṭā ud aśvibhyām iṣitāḥ pārayanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4249: RV_1,182.07a kaḥ svid vṛkṣo niṣṭhito madhye arṇaso yaṃ taugryo nādhitaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4251: RV_1,182.07c parṇā mṛgasya pataror ivārabha ud aśvinā ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4252: RV_1,182.08a tad vāṃ narā nāsatyāv anu ṣyād yad vām mānāsa ucatham avocan |
GV01rv_hn01u:4253: RV_1,182.08c asmād adya sadasaḥ somyād ā vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4254: RV_1,183.01a taṃ yuñjāthām manaso yo javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā yas tricakraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4255: RV_1,183.01c yenopayāthaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tridhātunā patatho vir na parṇaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4256: RV_1,183.02a suvṛd ratho vartate yann abhi kṣāṃ yat tiṣṭhathaḥ kratumantānu pṛkṣe |
GV01rv_hn01u:4257: RV_1,183.02c vapur vapuṣyā sacatām iyaṃ gīr divo duhitroṣasā sacethe ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4258: RV_1,183.03a ā tiṣṭhataṃ suvṛtaṃ yo ratho vām anu vratāni vartate haviṣmān
GV01rv_hn01u:4259: RV_1,183.03c yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartir yāthas tanayāya tmane ca ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4260: RV_1,183.04a mā vāṃ vṛko mā vṛkīr ā dadharṣīn mā pari varktam uta māti
GV01rv_hn01u:4262: RV_1,183.04c ayaṃ vām bhāgo nihita iyaṃ gīr dasrāv ime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4263: RV_1,183.05a yuvāṃ gotamaḥ purumīḷho atrir dasrā havate 'vase haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4264: RV_1,183.05c diśaṃ na diṣṭām ṛjūyeva yantā me havaṃ nāsatyopa yātam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4265: RV_1,183.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināv adhāyi |
GV01rv_hn01u:4266: RV_1,183.06c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
GV01rv_hn01u:4267: RV_1,184.01a tā vām adya tāv aparaṃ huvemocchantyām uṣasi vahnir ukthaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4268: RV_1,184.01c nāsatyā kuha cit santāv aryo divo napātā sudāstarāya ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4269: RV_1,184.02a asme ū ṣu vṛṣaṇā mādayethām ut paṇīṃr hatam ūrmyā madantā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4270: RV_1,184.02c śrutam me acchoktibhir matīnām eṣṭā narā nicetārā ca karṇaiḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4271: RV_1,184.03a śriye pūṣann iṣukṛteva devā nāsatyā vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4272: RV_1,184.03c vacyante vāṃ kakuhā apsu jātā yugā jūrṇeva varuṇasya bhūreḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4273: RV_1,184.04a asme sā vām mādhvī rātir astu stomaṃ hinotam mānyasya kāroḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4274: RV_1,184.04c anu yad vāṃ śravasyā sudānū suvīryāya carṣaṇayo madanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4275: RV_1,184.05a eṣa vāṃ stomo aśvināv akāri mānebhir maghavānā suvṛkti |
GV01rv_hn01u:4276: RV_1,184.05c yātaṃ vartis tanayāya tmane cāgastye nāsatyā madantā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4277: RV_1,184.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināv adhāyi |
GV01rv_hn01u:4278: RV_1,184.06c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
GV01rv_hn01u:4279: RV_1,185.01a katarā pūrvā katarāparāyoḥ kathā jāte kavayaḥ ko vi veda |
GV01rv_hn01u:4280: RV_1,185.01c viśvaṃ tmanā bibhṛto yad dha nāma vi vartete ahanī cakriyeva
GV01rv_hn01u:4281: RV_1,185.02a bhūriṃ dve acarantī carantam padvantaṃ garbham apadī dadhāte |
GV01rv_hn01u:4282: RV_1,185.02c nityaṃ na sūnum pitror upasthe dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no
GV01rv_hn01u:4284: RV_1,185.03a aneho dātram aditer anarvaṃ huve svarvad avadhaṃ namasvat |
GV01rv_hn01u:4285: RV_1,185.03c tad rodasī janayataṃ jaritre dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt
GV01rv_hn01u:4286: RV_1,185.04a atapyamāne avasāvantī anu ṣyāma rodasī devaputre |
GV01rv_hn01u:4287: RV_1,185.04c ubhe devānām ubhayebhir ahnāṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4288: RV_1,185.05a saṃgacchamāne yuvatī samante svasārā jāmī pitror upasthe |
GV01rv_hn01u:4289: RV_1,185.05c abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhiṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4290: RV_1,185.06a urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena huve devānām avasā janitrī |
GV01rv_hn01u:4291: RV_1,185.06c dadhāte ye amṛtaṃ supratīke dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt
GV01rv_hn01u:4292: RV_1,185.07a urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin |
GV01rv_hn01u:4293: RV_1,185.07c dadhāte ye subhage supratūrtī dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4294: RV_1,185.08a devān vā yac cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ sakhāyaṃ vā sadam ij jāspatiṃ vā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4295: RV_1,185.08c iyaṃ dhīr bhūyā avayānam eṣāṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no
GV01rv_hn01u:4297: RV_1,185.09a ubhā śaṃsā naryā mām aviṣṭām ubhe mām ūtī avasā sacetām |
GV01rv_hn01u:4298: RV_1,185.09c bhūri cid aryaḥ sudāstarāyeṣā madanta iṣayema devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4299: RV_1,185.10a ṛtaṃ dive tad avocam pṛthivyā abhiśrāvāya prathamaṃ sumedhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4300: RV_1,185.10c pātām avadyād duritād abhīke pitā mātā ca rakṣatām avobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4301: RV_1,185.11a idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī satyam astu pitar mātar yad ihopabruve vām
GV01rv_hn01u:4302: RV_1,185.11c bhūtaṃ devānām avame avobhir vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4303: RV_1,186.01a ā na iḷābhir vidathe suśasti viśvānaraḥ savitā deva etu |
GV01rv_hn01u:4304: RV_1,186.01c api yathā yuvāno matsathā no viśvaṃ jagad abhipitve manīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4305: RV_1,186.02a ā no viśva āskrā gamantu devā mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4306: RV_1,186.02c bhuvan yathā no viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karan suṣāhā vithuraṃ na śavaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4307: RV_1,186.03a preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'gniṃ śastibhis turvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4308: RV_1,186.03c asad yathā no varuṇaḥ sukīrtir iṣaś ca parṣad arigūrtaḥ sūriḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4309: RV_1,186.04a upa va eṣe namasā jigīṣoṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4310: RV_1,186.04c samāne ahan vimimāno arkaṃ viṣurūpe payasi sasminn ūdhan ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4311: RV_1,186.05a uta no 'hir budhnyo mayas kaḥ śiśuṃ na pipyuṣīva veti sindhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4312: RV_1,186.05c yena napātam apāṃ junāma manojuvo vṛṣaṇo yaṃ vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4313: RV_1,186.06a uta na īṃ tvaṣṭā gantv acchā smat sūribhir abhipitve sajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4314: RV_1,186.06c ā vṛtrahendraś carṣaṇiprās tuviṣṭamo narāṃ na iha gamyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4315: RV_1,186.07a uta na īm matayo 'śvayogāḥ śiśuṃ na gāvas taruṇaṃ rihanti |
GV01rv_hn01u:4316: RV_1,186.07c tam īṃ giro janayo na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamaṃ narāṃ nasanta ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4317: RV_1,186.08a uta na īm maruto vṛddhasenāḥ smad rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu |
GV01rv_hn01u:4318: RV_1,186.08c pṛṣadaśvāso 'vanayo na rathā riśādaso mitrayujo na devāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4319: RV_1,186.09a pra nu yad eṣām mahinā cikitre pra yuñjate prayujas te suvṛkti |
GV01rv_hn01u:4320: RV_1,186.09c adha yad eṣāṃ sudine na śarur viśvam eriṇam pruṣāyanta senāḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4321: RV_1,186.10a pro aśvināv avase kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇaṃ svatavaso hi santi |
GV01rv_hn01u:4322: RV_1,186.10c adveṣo viṣṇur vāta ṛbhukṣā acchā sumnāya vavṛtīya devān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4323: RV_1,186.11a iyaṃ sā vo asme dīdhitir yajatrā apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4324: RV_1,186.11c ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyur vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4325: RV_1,187.01a pituṃ nu stoṣam maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm |
GV01rv_hn01u:4326: RV_1,187.01c yasya trito vy ojasā vṛtraṃ viparvam ardayat ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4327: RV_1,187.02a svādo pito madho pito vayaṃ tvā vavṛmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:4329: RV_1,187.03a upa naḥ pitav ā cara śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4330: RV_1,187.03c mayobhur adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā suśevo advayāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4331: RV_1,187.04a tava tye pito rasā rajāṃsy anu viṣṭhitāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4333: RV_1,187.05a tava tye pito dadatas tava svādiṣṭha te pito |
GV01rv_hn01u:4334: RV_1,187.05c pra svādmāno rasānāṃ tuvigrīvā iverate ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4335: RV_1,187.06a tve pito mahānāṃ devānām mano hitam |
GV01rv_hn01u:4336: RV_1,187.06c akāri cāru ketunā tavāhim avasāvadhīt ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4337: RV_1,187.07a yad ado pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām |
GV01rv_hn01u:4338: RV_1,187.07c atrā cin no madho pito 'ram bhakṣāya gamyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4339: RV_1,187.08a yad apām oṣadhīnām pariṃśam āriśāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:4341: RV_1,187.09a yat te soma gavāśiro yavāśiro bhajāmahe |
GV01rv_hn01u:4343: RV_1,187.10a karambha oṣadhe bhava pīvo vṛkka udārathiḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4345: RV_1,187.11a taṃ tvā vayam pito vacobhir gāvo na havyā suṣūdima |
GV01rv_hn01u:4346: RV_1,187.11c devebhyas tvā sadhamādam asmabhyaṃ tvā sadhamādam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4347: RV_1,188.01a samiddho adya rājasi devo devaiḥ sahasrajit |
GV01rv_hn01u:4349: RV_1,188.02a tanūnapād ṛtaṃ yate madhvā yajñaḥ sam ajyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:4351: RV_1,188.03a ājuhvāno na īḍyo devāṃ ā vakṣi yajñiyān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4353: RV_1,188.04a prācīnam barhir ojasā sahasravīram astṛṇan |
GV01rv_hn01u:4355: RV_1,188.05a virāṭ samrāḍ vibhvīḥ prabhvīr bahvīś ca bhūyasīś ca yāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4357: RV_1,188.06a surukme hi supeśasādhi śriyā virājataḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4359: RV_1,188.07a prathamā hi suvācasā hotārā daivyā kavī |
GV01rv_hn01u:4361: RV_1,188.08a bhāratīḷe sarasvati yā vaḥ sarvā upabruve |
GV01rv_hn01u:4363: RV_1,188.09a tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ paśūn viśvān samānaje |
GV01rv_hn01u:4364: RV_1,188.09c teṣāṃ na sphātim ā yaja ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4365: RV_1,188.10a upa tmanyā vanaspate pātho devebhyaḥ sṛja |
GV01rv_hn01u:4367: RV_1,188.11a purogā agnir devānāṃ gāyatreṇa sam ajyate |
GV01rv_hn01u:4369: RV_1,189.01a agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4370: RV_1,189.01c yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4371: RV_1,189.02a agne tvam pārayā navyo asmān svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4372: RV_1,189.02c pūś ca pṛthvī bahulā na urvī bhavā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4373: RV_1,189.03a agne tvam asmad yuyodhy amīvā anagnitrā abhy amanta kṛṣṭīḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4374: RV_1,189.03c punar asmabhyaṃ suvitāya deva kṣāṃ viśvebhir amṛtebhir yajatra ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4375: RV_1,189.04a pāhi no agne pāyubhir ajasrair uta priye sadana ā śuśukvān |
GV01rv_hn01u:4376: RV_1,189.04c mā te bhayaṃ jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha nūnaṃ vidan māparaṃ sahasvaḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4377: RV_1,189.05a mā no agne 'va sṛjo aghāyāviṣyave ripave ducchunāyai |
GV01rv_hn01u:4378: RV_1,189.05c mā datvate daśate mādate no mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4379: RV_1,189.06a vi gha tvāvāṃ ṛtajāta yaṃsad gṛṇāno agne tanve varūtham |
GV01rv_hn01u:4380: RV_1,189.06c viśvād ririkṣor uta vā ninitsor abhihrutām asi hi deva viṣpaṭ
GV01rv_hn01u:4381: RV_1,189.07a tvaṃ tāṃ agna ubhayān vi vidvān veṣi prapitve manuṣo yajatra
GV01rv_hn01u:4382: RV_1,189.07c abhipitve manave śāsyo bhūr marmṛjenya uśigbhir nākraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4383: RV_1,189.08a avocāma nivacanāny asmin mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau |
GV01rv_hn01u:4384: RV_1,189.08c vayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4385: RV_1,190.01a anarvāṇaṃ vṛṣabham mandrajihvam bṛhaspatiṃ vardhayā navyam
GV01rv_hn01u:4387: RV_1,190.01c gāthānyaḥ suruco yasya devā āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4388: RV_1,190.02a tam ṛtviyā upa vācaḥ sacante sargo na yo devayatām asarji |
GV01rv_hn01u:4389: RV_1,190.02c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hy añjo varāṃsi vibhvābhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā
GV01rv_hn01u:4390: RV_1,190.03a upastutiṃ namasa udyatiṃ ca ślokaṃ yaṃsat saviteva pra bāhū |
GV01rv_hn01u:4391: RV_1,190.03c asya kratvāhanyo yo asti mṛgo na bhīmo arakṣasas tuviṣmān ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4392: RV_1,190.04a asya śloko divīyate pṛthivyām atyo na yaṃsad yakṣabhṛd vicetāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4393: RV_1,190.04c mṛgāṇāṃ na hetayo yanti cemā bṛhaspater ahimāyāṃ abhi dyūn ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4394: RV_1,190.05a ye tvā devosrikam manyamānāḥ pāpā bhadram upajīvanti pajrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4395: RV_1,190.05c na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmam bṛhaspate cayasa it piyārum ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4396: RV_1,190.06a supraituḥ sūyavaso na panthā durniyantuḥ pariprīto na mitraḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4397: RV_1,190.06c anarvāṇo abhi ye cakṣate no 'pīvṛtā aporṇuvanto asthuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4398: RV_1,190.07a saṃ yaṃ stubho 'vanayo na yanti samudraṃ na sravato rodhacakrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4399: RV_1,190.07c sa vidvāṃ ubhayaṃ caṣṭe antar bṛhaspatis tara āpaś ca gṛdhraḥ
GV01rv_hn01u:4400: RV_1,190.08a evā mahas tuvijātas tuviṣmān bṛhaspatir vṛṣabho dhāyi devaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4401: RV_1,190.08c sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
GV01rv_hn01u:4403: RV_1,191.01c dvāv iti pluṣī iti ny adṛṣṭā alipsata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4404: RV_1,191.02a adṛṣṭān hanty āyaty atho hanti parāyatī |
GV01rv_hn01u:4405: RV_1,191.02c atho avaghnatī hanty atho pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4406: RV_1,191.03a śarāsaḥ kuśarāso darbhāsaḥ sairyā uta |
GV01rv_hn01u:4407: RV_1,191.03c mauñjā adṛṣṭā vairiṇāḥ sarve sākaṃ ny alipsata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4408: RV_1,191.04a ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata |
GV01rv_hn01u:4409: RV_1,191.04c ni ketavo janānāṃ ny adṛṣṭā alipsata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4410: RV_1,191.05a eta u tye praty adṛśran pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva |
GV01rv_hn01u:4412: RV_1,191.06a dyaur vaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somo bhrātāditiḥ svasā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4413: RV_1,191.06c adṛṣṭā viśvadṛṣṭās tiṣṭhatelayatā su kam ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4414: RV_1,191.07a ye aṃsyā ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkā ye prakaṅkatāḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4415: RV_1,191.07c adṛṣṭāḥ kiṃ caneha vaḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4416: RV_1,191.08a ut purastāt sūrya eti viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4417: RV_1,191.08c adṛṣṭān sarvāñ jambhayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4418: RV_1,191.09a ud apaptad asau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan |
GV01rv_hn01u:4420: RV_1,191.10a sūrye viṣam ā sajāmi dṛtiṃ surāvato gṛhe |
GV01rv_hn01u:4421: RV_1,191.10c so cin nu na marāti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4422: RV_1,191.11a iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam |
GV01rv_hn01u:4423: RV_1,191.11c so cin nu na marāti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4424: RV_1,191.12a triḥ sapta viṣpuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣyam akṣan |
GV01rv_hn01u:4425: RV_1,191.12c tāś cin nu na maranti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4427: RV_1,191.13c sarvāsām agrabhaṃ nāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4428: RV_1,191.14a triḥ sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4429: RV_1,191.14c tās te viṣaṃ vi jabhrira udakaṃ kumbhinīr iva ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4430: RV_1,191.15a iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakas takam bhinadmy aśmanā |
GV01rv_hn01u:4431: RV_1,191.15c tato viṣam pra vāvṛte parācīr anu saṃvataḥ ||
GV01rv_hn01u:4432: RV_1,191.16a kuṣumbhakas tad abravīd gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ |
GV01rv_hn01u:4433: RV_1,191.16c vṛścikasyārasaṃ viṣam arasaṃ vṛścika te viṣam ||
